1a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyud pa pa bzhugs so//
1b1(rgyud): @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad
1b2(rgyud): du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog
1b3(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
1b4(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na
2a1(rgyud): bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni/ byang chub sems
2a2(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / sgrib pa thams
2a3(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag
2a4(rgyud): na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba' zhig dang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems
2a5(rgyud): d pa' byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
2b1(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
2b2(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za ma rungs pa dag
2b3(rgyud): gis mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / yams nad dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i
2b4(rgyud): 'chi ba dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser ba dang / sa
2b5(rgyud): g.yos pa la sogs pa byung ste/ de dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
2b6(rgyud): 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sku'i ba spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer me lce rab tu 'bar ba byung ste/
3a1(rgyud): 'dod pa dang / gzugs
3a2(rgyud): dang / gzugs med pa la thug pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to/ /de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i
3a3(rgyud): 'od kyang lham me dang / lhan ne dang / lhang nge ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lham me dang / lhan ne
3a4(rgyud): dang / lhang nge ma yin no/ /klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams ni/ rlung drag pos
3a5(rgyud): bdas pa'i shing bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya
3a6(rgyud): b a'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bshig nas zhabs kyi pus mo sa la brdabs
3b1(rgyud): pas thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa dag byung ste/ thabs las byung ba'i khro ba'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas
3b2(rgyud): nas nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa'o/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs pa tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / drag po chen po
3b3(rgyud): bzhi po dag ha hUM hri zhes bya bas skrag par byed pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ser sna dag 'joms pa/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za
3b4(rgyud): yi dwags la sogs pa hAM maM zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to/ /gsung gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can zhabs phyed sa la pus mo dang mthe bong
3b5(rgyud): btsugs pa/ zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khro bo brtan pa'i sku can/ shes rab kyi bdag nyid ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas 'od
3b6(rgyud): kyis 'gengs pa dag sprul to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi sngags smras pa/ na maHsan+ta badzrA NAM/ a tsa la ka
3b7(rgyud): na tsan+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM badzra d+h+r-i ka khaD+ga/ hUM maM hUM maM zhes brjod do/ /phyag rgya ni/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs
4a1(rgyud): pa ni/ ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas bskor du mtshams gcad do/ /na maHsa man+ta badzra nAM/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/
4a2(rgyud): a mr-i ta hUM hUM zhes brjod do/ /phyag rgya ni/ lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa ni/ rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas nas bskor
4a3(rgyud): la bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba gsungs pa ni/ dmar po'i yi ge raM spyi bor bsam ste/
4a4(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'dis brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus me 'od dang bcas par bsgom ste/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro
4a5(rgyud): Sha Na ka te b+h+ya/ sarba bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga ta hAM maM rak+Sha zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab
4a6(rgyud): tu sbyar te smin mtshams su bca' bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pa chen po'i srung ba gsungs pa ni/ hUM dang gzhi'i rnam
4a7(rgyud): pas bltas te/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ka te b+h+yaH/ sarba bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA ga ta hAM maM/ rak+Sha ma hA ba le/
4b1(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta pra me ni rga rdza hUM hUM phaT T+ra tha T+ra tha/ a pra ti ha te swA hA zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la gung mo rtse sprad
4b2(rgyud): de srin lag gnyis brkyang nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug la snying gar bcas te srung ba ni/ yum gyi ste/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / ma rungs
4b3(rgyud): pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te kha zas kyi bye brag
4b4(rgyud): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / gzhib pa dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa la sogs pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro'i bye brag la byin gyis
4b5(rgyud): brlab pa mdzad de/ oM sarba d+harma tA si ta hUM zhes bya bas dag par byas te/ oM a mr-i ta oM hUM hrIHzhes bya bas ni/ 'dod pa'i don du'o/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga
4b6(rgyud): ta a ba lo ki te sam+b+ha ra hUM zhes bya bas lan bdun bdun btab ste bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya ni/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan
4b7(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa/ ldang bar 'dod na/ sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na trA yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ DaM Sh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a si
5a1(rgyud): mu sa la pa ra shu pA shA hasta ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ gardza
5a2(rgyud): gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bi g+h+naM bi nA ya kA nAM ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra na swA hA zhes bya ba brjod do/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la kha nang du bstan
5a3(rgyud): te mdzub mo bsgrengs la brang du bsnol la phyag rgya bcings te gtor ma btang zhing 'chag pa'i dus su yang de bzhin no/ /nye reg bya ba dang khrus bya ba ni/ rin po che'i
5a4(rgyud): bum par dri zhim po'i chu la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ a tsa la ka na ya a mr-i ta zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste lag pa g.yon pas bum pa bzung nas g.yas
5a5(rgyud): pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la ri mo can gyi nang du a bsam la chu blugs te/ oM shud+d+ha dun+te sho d+ha na ye swA hA/ zhes bya bas khrus bya'o/ /de
5a6(rgyud): skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' byams pa la'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
5a7(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang / rnga dang /
5b1(rgyud): bdug spos dang / lha'i zhal zas dang / lha'i bu pho dang / bu mo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta dpag tu med pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med
5b2(rgyud): pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / bskor ba rgya chen po dag byas te byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs cig tu 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub
5b3(rgyud): sems dpa' byams pa spro pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po la
5b4(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag ste 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te/ dga' bar rtog pa tsam mo/ /de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rtse gcig pa'i
5b5(rgyud): rtog dpyod spangs te/ dga' bde tsam mo/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa nas gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs te/ bde ba tsam mo/ /de nas
5b6(rgyud): bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/ tshor ba nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba tsam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin
5b7(rgyud): de dag dang ldan na/ rnam par dag pa'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o/ /de bzhin du
6a1(rgyud): chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha' ltar mtha' bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma kou0f85haM/
6a2(rgyud): zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni/ 'di'o/ /lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o/ /'phags pa mi
6a3(rgyud): g.yo ba'i gzungs las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te snying
6a4(rgyud): gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi sa bon gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun khengs par bsams te/ sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang
6a5(rgyud): bral ba'o/ zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'o/ /de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdan 'dam nas skyes pa dri ma
6a6(rgyud): med cing yongs su rgyas par tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba/ 'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du nam mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs
6a7(rgyud): kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyi sa 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur te de dag las bdud dang
6b1(rgyud): ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po rnam rtog thams cad yongs su bcom pa/ dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o/ /de yang gzhon zhing sku'i sha rgyas pa ni/ dper
6b2(rgyud): na/ bus pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa'i lus lta bu ste/ de'i sku mdog ni/ mthing nag tu gnas te/ dper na/ dbyar gyi char sprin nag po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o//
6b3(rgyud): nam mkha' ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni/ dper na/ rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no/ /dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni/
6b4(rgyud): dper na/ shing a la ka'i 'bras bu bzhin no/ /sku cung zhig 'gying pa dang / g.yo ba ni/ dper na/ dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du sa rtol bzhin no/ /zhabs brkyang bskum du
6b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa ni/ dper na/ gyad kyi 'gros bzhin no/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ni/ dper na/ pa la sha'i me tog bzhin no/ /spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni/ steng 'og gi
6b6(rgyud): bgegs sreg pa ste/ dper na/ lha ma yin gyi bya gtor ma za ba bzhin no/ /mche ba gtsigs pa ni/ dper na/ zla ba phyed pa bzhin no/ /ljags shin tu 'khyug pa ni/ dper
6b7(rgyud): na/ nam mkha'i klog bzhin no/ /smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni/ dper na/ shing pa lak+Sha'i lo ma bzhin no/ /phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni/ dper na/ gza'
7a1(rgyud): chen po'i 'od ltung ba bzhin no/ /sprul gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni/ dper na/ rgya mtsho'i mching bzhin no/ /de lta bu'i sku des
7a2(rgyud): ni/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po'i chen po bzhi dag dang / phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa brnams dbang du sdud pa/ lha dang / klu ma rung pas dang / srin
7a3(rgyud): mo dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dag go/ de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA
7a4(rgyud): NAM/ tra Ta/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM/ tra ta hAM maM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des ni/ 'tshe ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang /
7a5(rgyud): sdang ba dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / log 'dren dang / rnam par log 'dren dang / srin po dang / lha dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / sha za la sogs pa thams
7a6(rgyud): cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'brum
7a7(rgyud): bu dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / ldang dub pa dang / yud tsam pa'i rims dang / rtag pa'i rims
7b1(rgyud): las thar par 'gyur ro/ /seng+ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul dug can dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / bung ba'i gnod pa las thar ro/ /rgyal
7b2(rgyud): po'i chad pa dang / dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las thar ro/ /rkun po dang / bran dang / bza' mi 'thab cing rtsod pa las thar ro/ /chu yis 'jigs pa dang / me yis
7b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa las thar ro/ /ral gri dang / shak+ti dang / dgra sta dang / mdung dang / mda' dang / mda'
7b4(rgyud): bo che dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las thar ro/ /'chi ba dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa
7b5(rgyud): kun dag par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yul mtha' 'khob dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / lha tshe ring
7b6(rgyud): po dang / log par lta bar 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba las mnyes pa med pa dag tu mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags 'di ni/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
7b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsungs te/ lan gcig brjod pas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro/ /'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni/ chos nyid kyi lam rdo rje lta bu
8a1(rgyud): myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rta bdun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa
8a2(rgyud): bsams te byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir haM ser po mig tu'o/ /srog gi lam du ni/ /maM nag po bsam par bya'o/ /spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yi ge
8a3(rgyud): bsams te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA pA Ni tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te gung mo bsgrengs pa'i rgyab tu mdzub mo cung
8a4(rgyud): zad bkug pa/ srin lag kyang de bzhin bya ste/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs
8a5(rgyud): pa'o/ /gser la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye brag nas dang / 'bras dang / gro dang / so ba dang / til la sogs pa dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
8a6(rgyud): khar dang / gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dag blugs te 'bru gsum pa'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par
8a7(rgyud): bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta ta thA ga te b+h+yoHbi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA khaM ud ga te/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /phyag rgya ni/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//
8b1(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te oM saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya bas 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM tsaN+Da
8b2(rgyud): ma hA ro Sha Na a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ya/ sarba pA paM swa hA/ phyag rgya thal mo sbyar la gsol ba gdab ste/ dam tshig gso ba'o/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs
8b3(rgyud): las/ le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas dam tshig ni/ 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun ni/ 'bras bu dang / lam dang /
8b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i khyad par te/ gang nas brtsams te khyad par gyis mchod cing nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ /tshad med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu bsgom zhing
8b5(rgyud): smon lam rgya chen por gdab par bya'o/ /sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i rten rgyun du bcang zhing bral bar mi bya'o/ /lha dang / bla ma dang / byang chub
8b6(rgyud): kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang ngo / /srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje sngon du song bas gnod pa dang / rnam par
8b7(rgyud): 'tshe ba spangs te nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /ser sna spangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can la gnod pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba spangs pa'i
9a1(rgyud): tshul khrims bsten pa'o/ /rang la rnam par 'tshe ba la bzod par bya'o/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o/ /rnam
9a2(rgyud): par g.yeng ba spangs te bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go/ /nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i don la ma g.yeng bar bya'o/ dam
9a3(rgyud): tshig med cing mi gnas pa la bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa kun bsten cing bshad par mi bya'o/ /srog gcod
9a4(rgyud): pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la phyin ci log pa dang / brdzun du smra ba ni/ tshangs par spyod pa dang / spyad par 'dod pas spang par bya'o/ /dge slong
9a5(rgyud): rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dam tshig dang ldan pa gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o/ /thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o/ /khro
9a6(rgyud): ba dang bab col du smra ba dang / lad lud dang / bshang gci 'dor ba dang / dri ma 'khru ba dang / skra dang / sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang / dri nga ba
9a7(rgyud): dang / dri mi zhim pa bku zhing mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o/ /khang pa ni/ spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong ba gtsang zhing dri ma med pa dag bkra shis pa'i
9b1(rgyud): sgo shar du bstan pa/ gseng skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa'am/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/ lha khang ngam/ ri bo'i rtse'am/ bya skad
9b2(rgyud): sgrog pa'i sa'am/ dgon pa'am/ bas mtha'am/ spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus skyang nul byas la rtswa'i stan bting ste gnas par bya'o/ /khri la 'dug pa
9b3(rgyud): spang bar bya'o/ /zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / la du dang / la ban dang / snum 'khur dang / 'khur skya dang / 'bras dang / 'bras zan la sogs pa
9b4(rgyud): dag smyung ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o/ /sha dang / chang dang / sgog pa la sogs pa dku ba'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o/ /zla ba dang / skar ma dang /
9b5(rgyud): tshes grangs la sogs pa ni/ yar gyi ngo dag la dkon mchog la gsol ba btab pa bsgrub par bya'o/ re ba dang / rnga ma dang / rtsub pa dag ni/ ma yin no/ /'dod pa'i
9b6(rgyud): don du 'jam zhing gnag pa la ni/ 'gal ba med do/ /dus rtag tu yi dam la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /sprul pa'i
9b7(rgyud): khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni/ kha dog shin tu nag pa ste/ nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje chags chen ni/ mdog
10a1(rgyud): dmar po chags pa dang chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o/ /rdo rje rnon po ni/ ljang gu ste/ 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin
10a2(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba ni/ mdog dmar po ste/ mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'joms pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje'i grags 'dzin pa'o/
10a3(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo ni/ ser po ste/ khro ba dang khro bo'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje gtum chen ni/ mdog ljang nag ste/ btang snyoms dang
10a4(rgyud): btang snyoms su gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje thabs bdag ni/ du ba'i mdog can bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje bsnams
10a5(rgyud): pa'o/ /rdo rje stobs chen po ni/ mthing ga ste/ dman pa dang dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyu'i stobs ni/ dmar
10a6(rgyud): nag ste/ rten 'brel dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi be con 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rab 'byed ni/ sna tshogs 'phrin las mdog can mtha' dang
10a7(rgyud): mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o/ /de dag ni/ sa bcu'i bdag nyid can me 'bar ba'i sku las rab tu 'phro ba'o/ /'phags
10b1(rgyud): pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las/ le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la thun mong
10b2(rgyud): du de dag pa'i phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa/ gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la maN+Dal mda' gang ba byas te ba'i rnam lnga'i skyang nul byas la me
10b3(rgyud): tog sngon po dgram par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi ched du byas te/ der rin po che gser dang / dngul dang /
10b4(rgyud): zangs dang / byi ru dang / mu tig dang rnam par lnga gzhug par bya'o/ /sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang / kha ra dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /
10b5(rgyud): nas dang / 'bras dang / so ba dang / til dang / gro dang / cu rtse rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /cu gang dang / gur gum dang / dzA+e ti dang / sug mel dang / ka ko la dang /
10b6(rgyud): li shi rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos dang / ga bur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyang gzhug par bya'o/ /mtsho dang /
10b7(rgyud): rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / lu ma bkod pa rnams kyi chu yang blugs la/ ba bla'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas mgul pa bcings te gzhag par bya'o//
11a1(rgyud): dri dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan byas te dri dang / spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / lha
11a2(rgyud): bshos dang / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o/ /'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang cha bdun nam lnga la sogs pa bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ a
11a3(rgyud): tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ sarba big+h+naM s+pho Ta ya/ badzra D+h+r-i ka khaD+ga hUM zhes bya bas mtshams rnams bcing bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du srung ba'i cho ga rdzogs par bya ste/ bum
11a4(rgyud): pa la gzungs kyi thag pa btags nas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgyur ba'i bum pa la b+h+ruM zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha dog dang / tshad dang ldan pa'i
11a5(rgyud): bum pa'o/ /thugs kyi sa bon las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das don de kho na nyid las mnyam par bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas
11a6(rgyud): dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa gdan seng+ge'i steng na sna tshogs pa'i gdan pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa
11a7(rgyud): drug gis bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya'o/ /chos nyid dang / sems dang / sems kyi rnam pa dang / sgra dang / sgra brnyan dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
11b1(rgyud): brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur nyi ma'i gdan pad+ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sna'i steng du bsam ste/ thugs kyi sa bon las ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas nam mkha' kun
11b2(rgyud): tu khebs pa'o/ /de las bdud tshar gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsams te mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM
11b3(rgyud): AHhUM/ pra ba ra sata ka ra pra tI ts+tsha hUM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM AHhUM/ sarba de ba tA a tsi na t+ya a mr-i ta d+ha rA ya swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/ /na
11b4(rgyud): maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM ha ra b+ha ga wa na/ sarba bid+ya d+ha ra pU dzi te swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM AHhUM/ d+harma d+ha tu a nu ga te d+hUM pe hUM swA hA zhes
11b5(rgyud): brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA mai tri b+h+yo ga te puSh+pe hUM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM AHhUM/ sarba thA ga ta a tsi pra Na a
11b6(rgyud): b+hA ba ga ga na b+h+ya ni R+ya A lo ke hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM AHhUM/ ga ga na sa ma ya gan+d+he hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha
11b7(rgyud): nAM/ A hA ra sarba ta thA ga te nai wi d+yai pU dza na s+pha ra Na ye hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a b+hi sma ra ya/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM/ d+harma d+hA tu A shA
12a1(rgyud): ya sa man+tA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri shud+d+ha maN+ta le ma ma pra Ni d+hi pU dza na ma be len d+harma d+ha tu/ a d+hiSh+Tha na pa tsa hUM swA hA zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje
12a2(rgyud): dang dril bu gsil bar bya'o/ /thal mo bkan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu cung zhig bkug pa sbyar/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol la mthe bong
12a3(rgyud): cung zhig bkug pa ni/ yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo rnams gung mo la brten te cung zad bkug la gung mo bsgreng ba ni/ bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo
12a4(rgyud): rnams phan tshun bsnol te nang du bcug nas mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni/ me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor mo rtse sprad de lhag ma khu tshur
12a5(rgyud): bcangs pa ni/ mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya lag pa g.yon pas mkhrig ma bteg pa ni/ dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo bkan pa'i zur sbyar te
12a6(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs nas bsgreng ba ni/ lha bshos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /spyi bor lag pa bskor te thal mo khong stong sbyar nas dkrol ba/ rgya chen po'i mchod pa
12a7(rgyud): ste/ mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha mos rdzas sbyangs pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba mud ga tA nAM/ nA ma pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha AR+ya
12b1(rgyud): shra ba ka nAM/ na mo bo d+hi satwa nAM/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te sha ra NAM/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi duSh+Ta swA hA/ kA ma kra a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha sta ya/
12b2(rgyud): tsa tur+b+hUdza/ tsa turmu kha/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ gats+tsha ya/ sarba big+h+naM g+hA ta bi kr-i tI nAM/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra aT+Ta hA sa ni ri te byA g+h+ra tsarma ni ba sa ni/ ku ru ku ru sarba d+harmA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da
12b3(rgyud): sarba man+ta/ b+hin+da bind/ pa ra man+ta/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba b+hu ta/ nirma ta nirma tha/ sarba duSh+Ta na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Dal ma d+h+ye b+h+yai ba sa t+ya dzI bi ti na/ ka ra
12b4(rgyud): ka ra ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAR+yaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma bi lam+ba/ sa ma yaM/ a nu sma ra hUM hUM/ s+pho Ta ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sarba Sha Ta pa ri pU ra ka /he b+ha ga wAn/ kiny+tsi
12b5(rgyud): rA ya si/ ma ma sarba r+thaM sarba sA d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha/ tsaN+Da g+ha/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NA s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma tra ma hAM maM zhes pa bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang
12b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la las dang / rnam par smin pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang /
12b7(rgyud): nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs te bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas gtong bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i
13a1(rgyud): gzungs las/ le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ shing bal shin tu
13a2(rgyud): dri ma med pa la bram ze'am gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'i khrus byas te dkon mchog gsum la gsol ba btab la brtag par bya'o/ /rigs ngan dmangs rigs
13a3(rgyud): la sogs pa'i ras dag ni/ spang bar bya'o/ /ras de gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / a ga ru la sogs pa'i chus bkrus te dag par bya'o/ /de nas sngags 'di
13a4(rgyud): gro ga'am ras la bris nas gdags par bya'o/ /a A/ i I u'i U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta
13a5(rgyud): tha da d+ha dang / pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ Sha Sha sa haHk+ShaHzhes bya ba bris te dgod par bya'o/ /de nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa
13a6(rgyud): man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra tha hAM maM/ oM wA kye daM na maHzhes bya ba las thams cad 'grub pa ste/ gur gum dang / tsan+dan dang / gla rtsi'i
13a7(rgyud): chu la bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par byas te bram ze'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o/ /tshon ni/ gser dang / dngul dang /
13b1(rgyud): zangs dang / lcags rang gis bri bar bya ba'am/ yang na dkar rtsi dang / mtshal dang / ldong ros dang / ba bla dang / spang ma dang / mthing shun dang / rgya skyegs
13b2(rgyud): dang / rdo sol dang / snag tsha dang / de la sogs pa'i mtshon rnams la a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan+dan dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos la sogs pa rnams
13b3(rgyud): dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan bdun brjod de bri bar bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho ta ya hAM/ tra tha hAM maM/ wA kye hUM/ oM AHbi ra hUM/
13b4(rgyud): khe tsa ra maM zhes brjod la bri bar bya ste/ khyad par bzang po 'dzoms pa'i dus su tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dag pa la kha zas byin te spyan dbye bar bya'o/ /
13b5(rgyud): bri ba yang de bzhin te/ spyan 'byed pa'i dus su sngags 'di brjod do/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsan+da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra tha hUM maM/ ga ga na ba ra la k+Sha Na/
13b6(rgyud): ka ru Na ma ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsak+ShuHoM AHhUM swA hA zhes sbrang rtsi gser gyi thur ma la byugs la lan gsum du byug par bya'o/ /bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongs
13b7(rgyud): su zin pa dang / 'bri mkhan la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sam/ rwa'am/ rdo ba dag las byed na yang de bzhin du
14a1(rgyud): bya'o/ /gzugs dang sku'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin dang rang bzhin ma yin pas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya ste/ rang bzhin dang /
14a2(rgyud): ldan pa la bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni/ yongs su bsgyur nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas khyad par bzang po'i dus su khang
14a3(rgyud): pa ba'i rnam lngas byugs par byas te ras ris dang / thang ga dang / po ti dang / glegs bam la sogs pa maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhugs su gsol te/ spos
14a4(rgyud): dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / dri dang / lha bshos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa bshams te/ gtor ma yang de bzhin du'o/ /
14a5(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re la sogs pa yang bri bar bya'o/ /de nas khro bo'i sku dang ldan pas sngags brjod par bya ste/ na maH
14a6(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a mo g+ha e hi/ a pra ti ha ta a tsa la tse ta e naM ta ka nAM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ta di ta di/ ta Ta ta Ta/ big+h+naM g+ha ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khA
14a7(rgyud): da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa taM tsa me/ a nu ban+d+ha ya/ a dz+hAM ku ru/ a d+ha ha d+ha ha naM kra/ ka ta ka ta/ ma ta ma ta/ haM haM maM maM/ e ta pa la e te ba la/ e hi ma hA nu ni
14b1(rgyud): bi sha na/ naT+Ta naT+Ta/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ za tsa le tse ha/ ta Ta ta Ta/ da ma da ma/ phaT phaT ces 'bum brjod par bya ste/ lha'i sku gnyes la ni/ bye ba'o/ /zhi ba
14b2(rgyud): ni/ sbrul pa'i sku ste/ sngon du ni/ de bzhin shes par bya'o/ /a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos kyi chu la/ na mo rat+na tra yA
14b3(rgyud): ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha da b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni ma hA mu ni/ oM dza ye dza ye/ wA kye she swA hA/ oM bA kye baM dza ya/
14b4(rgyud): oM wA kye niSh+Te ye/ oM bA kye na ma/ oM bA kye daM na maHoM AHhUM hAM maM zhes bya bas sku khrus bya'o/ /de nas rol mo bsgrag par bya ste/ rdzas la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
14b5(rgyud): nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nA/ haM maM/ oM A d+ya nut+pan na twata pra b+ha swa ra su bi shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+ha tu/ swa b+hA wa At+ma kou0f85haM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa
14b6(rgyud): dpag tu med pas mchod de/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig tu brjod pa'i gzungs sngags so/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA naM
14b7(rgyud): tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ ba la ba la/ ba tra ba tra/ shAn+te shAn+te/ ha la ha la/ ba ra ba ra/ ma rA Na ma rA Na/ badzra da la s+pho Ta ma/ li ti ta shi kha ra/ sa man+ta badzrA Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/
15a1(rgyud): na mostu te/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa saM ra Na ra Na/ haM hUM la badzra s+pho Ta maM swA hA/ na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM ta thA ga tA nAM sarba tra ya pra ti ha ta tAp+tA
15a2(rgyud): d+harma tA ba lI nAM/ aM a/ sa ma sa man+to a nAM ta tAp+tI shA sa ni/ ha ra ha ra/ sma ra sma ra Na/ pi ka ta rA ga /bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ba lA/ ha sa ha sa/ tra
15a3(rgyud): ya tra ya/ ga ga na ma hA ba ra lak+Sha Ne dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twa nAM/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze/ ma hA bi ra dze/ ma hA bi
15a4(rgyud): ra dze/ swa ra te swa ra te/ tra yi tra yi/ bi d+ha mi na/ saM b+haM dza ni ra ma ti/ sid+d+ha a treM traM swA hA zhes brjod do/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
15a5(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs te/ lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur
15a6(rgyud): ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'dis lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya bcings pa rnams nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
15a7(rgyud): lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis ltas dang mtshan ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ /srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
15b1(rgyud): gi gzungs 'di rjes su brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum pa bkod pa'i khrus 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta du d+ha nAM/ tad+ya thA/
15b2(rgyud): oM i ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ maM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ raM ho aM shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a shu maM bi shud+d+he shud+d+he sa ma ya swA hA zhes brjod do/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
15b3(rgyud): tshig gsum bkod pa'i gzungs te/ chu la sngags bzlas nas khrus byas na/ sdig pa kun 'dag par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mtshan
15b4(rgyud): ma ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rims dang / 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / 'og ba'i nad
15b5(rgyud): dang / 'tshe ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las/ le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang / klu dang /
15b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa gsungs pa/ dang po chos kyi dbyings
15b7(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin gyi e'i rnam pa can gyi nam mkha'o/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu ba dan can yaM las byung ba'o/ /chu'i dkyil 'khor gangs ltar dkar ba'i
16a1(rgyud): zlum po bum pa can baM las so/ /sa'i dkyil 'khor gser gyi mdog can gru bzhi rdo rje can laM las byung ba'o/ /de'i steng du ri rab rin po che
16a2(rgyud): sna bzhi las grub pa'i tshad dang ldan pa oM las byung ba'o/ /me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa raM las so/ /de'i nang du b+h+ruM kha dog
16a3(rgyud): sna tshogs las byung ba'i khang bu brtsegs pa gru bzhi dang bcas pa'i rin po che smra lnga las grub pa ni/ shel dang / bai DUR+ya dang / byi ru dang / in+d+ra nI la dang /
16a4(rgyud): gser las grub pa'o/ /de'i nang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i gdan no/ /shar gyi 'dab ma ni/ shel las grub pa'o/ /lho'i 'dab ma ni/ bai DUR+ya
16a5(rgyud): las grub pa'o/ /nub kyi 'dab ma ni/ phyi ru las grub pa'o/ /byang gi 'dab ma ni/ in+d+ra nI la las grub pa'o/ /mtshams rnams kyang shel dang / bai DUR+ya dang / byi
16a6(rgyud): ru dang / in+d+ra nI la las grub pa'o/ /dbus su ni/ tshogs bdag glang sna'i steng du sna tshogs pa'i 'dam skyes dang nyi ma'i gdan no/ /shar du brgya byin/ lhor lha chen
16a7(rgyud): po/ /nub tu khyab 'jug /byang du thags bzang ris so/ /shar lho mtshams su tshangs pa/ lho nub mtshams su gzhon nu/ nub byang du dga' byed/ byang shar du kun
16b1(rgyud): rgyal ba ste/ lha chen po brgyad kyi steng du pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan no/ /yi ge raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang / maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma maM dang ldan pa las bcom
16b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi g.yo ba nam mkha'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa'o/ /rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan
16b3(rgyud): pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri pa snams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ phu phu
16b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o/ /shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi ge tsaM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma tsam dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das
16b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba shel gyi mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la bus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
16b6(rgyud): nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu nor rgyas bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don
16b7(rgyud): ba'o/ /lhor bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs yi ge d+hI las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma d+hI dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag nyid
17a1(rgyud): mi g.yo ba bai DUR+ya'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam
17a2(rgyud): mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don
17a3(rgyud): pa'o/ /nub tu bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs yi ge maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma maM dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid
17a4(rgyud): can gyi mi g.yo ba byi ru'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la phus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus
17a5(rgyud): pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu chu lha bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o/ /byang du bcom ldan 'das
17a6(rgyud): l as kyi rigs yi ge haM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma haM dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba in+d+ra nI
17a7(rgyud): la'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis
17b1(rgyud): 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu rigs ldan bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o/ /shar lho mtshams su raM las byung ba'i tri
17b2(rgyud): shU la raM gyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba g.yas kyi dang po na tri shU la/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu mtha' yas kyi
17b3(rgyud): bu/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams su ShaM las byung ba'i dbyug tho ShaM gyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag
17b4(rgyud): bzhi pa'i gshin rje'i gshed po bai DUR+ya'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje'i dbyug tho/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu dga' bo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas g.yon gyi
17b5(rgyud): 'og ma gnyis na tho ba phur bu bsnams pa/ nub byang mtshams su Na las byung ba'i kha T+wAM ga Nas mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i rta mgrin
17b6(rgyud): byi ru'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang po na kha T+wAM ga /g.yon gyi dang po na klu pad+ma chen po bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o/ /byang
17b7(rgyud): shar mtshams su hUM las byung ba'i be con hUM gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/ g.yas dang po na
18a1(rgyud): be con/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu stobs kyi rgyu bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi tha ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o/ /shar lho'i gru
18a2(rgyud): chad la lha mo bdug pa ma mdog mthing ga pog phor 'dzin pa dang ldan pa/ lho nub tu lha mo me tog ma mdog dkar mo me tog 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nub byang du lha
18a3(rgyud): mo mar me ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa/ byang shar du lha mo dri chab ma ljang gu dri chu bsnams pa'o/ /de dag ni/ gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa/ mdzes pa'i tshul
18a4(rgyud): can hUM las bskyed par bya'o/ /shar phyogs su lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar po lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs su lha mo gser gyi mdog can
18a5(rgyud): zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs su lha mo dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs su lha mo ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /de dag ni/ cung zhig
18a6(rgyud): khros pa'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la yongs su gnas par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
18a7(rgyud): kyis yang dag par brjod pa'i gzungs 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA nAM/ trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/
18b1(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ a kro d+he ka ya man+ta ka hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ tra tha a mo g+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li
18b2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha badzra/ a tsa la tse ta da ha da ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha rat+na a tsa la pa tsa hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha pad+ma a tsa
18b3(rgyud): la tsa la ban+d+hA hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha a mo g+ha karma a tsa la ha na ha na hUM phaT ces bya ba gsungs te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
18b4(rgyud): chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdig pa dman pa'i las rnams 'dag par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mi g.yo
18b5(rgyud): ba'i gzungs las/ le'u drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi nang du gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to/ /na maHsa
18b6(rgyud): man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a tsa la ka na/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ na ta na ta/ ma ta Ta ma ta Ta/ mo Ta ta mo Ta ta/ sha ta sha ta/ Ta ta Ta ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/
18b7(rgyud): mo ha sarba pA paM ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badzra ha sa a mo g+ha ku ru/ ha sa ha sa/ marta marta/ gardza gardza/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha ya A bi sha ya/ ma hA
19a1(rgyud): man+t+ra pa la ka / du na du na/ ti ni ti ni/ kha da kha da/ sarba big+h+nAM/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba duSh+TAM/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba big+h+nAM/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA
19a2(rgyud): bi shwa/ sarba pA paM/ ma hA badzra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hIHba li ta ra g+ha na ta ka/ hUM hUM maM maM haM haM/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ma hA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NA ya/ a mo g+ha e hi/
19a3(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta e hi/ a tsa le tse ta a nan+ta ka nAM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsa ru tsa ru/ ta di ta di/ ta Ta ta Ta/ big+h+nA g+hA ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khA da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa tsa me/ a nu ban+d+ha
19a4(rgyud): A dz+nyA ku ru ku ru/ a ha sa/ a da na/ kra ka ta ma Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ haM haM/ a ti pa la i ti ma hA gu Na ba shi na/ naT+Ta naT+Ta ta/ A bi sha ya/ a tsa la tse ta/ sarba tra
19a5(rgyud): a nut+ta re/ ka tse ta ta Ta ta Ta/ Da ma Da ma/ haM haM maM maM phaT phaT hUM/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ tra a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM tra Ta/
19a6(rgyud): haM maM/ oM ba li taM te dzo ba liM swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a tsa la tse ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM/ a sa man+ti ka tra ta/ ma hA pa la/ Sha Ta pA
19a7(rgyud): ra man+t+raM/ aM aM hUM haM/ shud+d+ha trai lo kya tu sh+yeM tu badzra/ a pra ta ha te bi li b+h+yaHna mo dza la ya tra ta/ aT+Ta ha sa na maM hAM swA hA zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling na
19b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa thams cad sreg cing sa la 'gyel bar gyur
19b2(rgyud): to/ /de nas cho ga gsungs so/ /lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i ral gri khru tshad gsum pa byas te sngags kyi phreng ba maM haM zhes bya ba bkod la/ khru do dang ldan pa'i spos
19b3(rgyud): kyi maN+Dal byas te mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dri bzhag ste gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag tu brjod cing bzlas na/ ral gri nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur
19b4(rgyud): ro/ /de nas g.yul du zhugs na dpag bsam gyi shing yang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te/ g.yul las rgyal bar byed do/ /lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i
19b5(rgyud): lhung bzed byas te maM haM zhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u
19b6(rgyud): dang / me tog dang / 'khor lo dang / nya dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba rnams dang / byi ru bcug pa'am/ yang na zangs la byi ru bcug par byas la gzungs
19b7(rgyud): sngags 'di gro ga'am ras la bris te khong pa'am mgul du btags nas gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na/ lhung bzed nam mkha' la 'phags te/ gsol ba
20a1(rgyud): btab na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste/ ljon pa'i shing bzhin no/ /nam mkha'i tri ta'i lce dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang gnyis cha
20a2(rgyud): mnyam pa dang / lcags sna gsum gyi phye ma la khwa ta'i khrag gis ril bu bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags haM maM zhes
20a3(rgyud): byas pas pad+ma la bskor te gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+ma nam mkha' la 'phags te/ de mi dbugs dang bral ma thag tu snying gi khrag rlangs dang sbyar te/ mig ni snang
20a4(rgyud): byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na/ thams cad mthong zhing thos la/ khar bcug na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /na maHsa man+ta
20a5(rgyud): bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te dza ya dza ya/ bA kye daM na wa ni tsak+Shu ra bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ rnga lpags la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas mnyes te lham byas la/ haM
20a6(rgyud): d ang maM rang gi rkang mthil la phris te gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lham nam mkha' la 'phags te rkang pa la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas go na na gar 'dod
20a7(rgyud): par phyin no/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM bruM ma hA ye gr-i ta swA hA zhes bya bas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'phags te bya rgod bzhin du'o/ /skye ba bdun
20b1(rgyud): ba'i sha dang / bya rgod kyi sha dang / rtsangs pa'i sha dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la lde gu byas te gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs nas ram nye ba dang /
20b2(rgyud): nye'u shing pa dang / bra ma ka ra'i mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu rnams nang re la srang re cha sbrang rtsi dang / ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na/ nam
20b3(rgyud): mkha' la thogs pa med do/ /rta nag po mig gnyis dkar po 'am/ byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar po'am/ pha bang dkar po rnams mi mngal nas skra dkar po'i srog
20b4(rgyud): chags la rma bya'i chu kham phor du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas te blud la/ de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar bton pa grib ma la bskams nas ma rul pa'i phye
20b5(rgyud): ma la sngags 'di btab te g.yas g.yon ma nor bar byugs na/ thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mon spos dang / gi'u wang
20b6(rgyud): dang / stag ma'i shun pa dang / nya mkhris dang / ru rta dang / phug ron gyi mig dang / lce dang / go ro tsa na dang / rtug pa rnams la ril bu byas te kham pa'i ga'ur ril bu
20b7(rgyud): re re la gzungs sngags ham mam zhes bya ba brjod de ga'u nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na ma/ yaM na ma hA ri bi ni nat+ti hrIHzhes lan bdun btab nas
21a1(rgyud): byin na/ gang 'dong pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bya rgod dang / bya gag dang / khra dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / wa dang / de rnams kyi
21a2(rgyud): mche ba dang / sder mo dang / bram ze'i rus pa'i thal ba la gzungs sngags bzlas te sgrub pa byas nas dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / ser ba dag la gtor na sprin
21a3(rgyud): rnams 'thor zhing / ser ba dang / 'brug dang / thog la sogs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gcan gzan thams cad dang / sha za thams cad dang / khyi dang / phag
21a4(rgyud): dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa dang / gu gul dang sbyar te dud pas bdugs na/ dom kun 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las/ le'u
21a5(rgyud): bdun pa'o/ / //oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ gzungs sngags 'di ni/ sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ lan gcig brjod pas kyang 'dzam
21a6(rgyud): bu'i gling gi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin gcig pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / ldang dub
21a7(rgyud): pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa las thar ro/ /'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / shu ba dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyur ro//
21b1(rgyud): lan gcig brjod pas kyang mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rig byed tshig gi dang po dang / /gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni/ /gsum pa
21b2(rgyud): dag ni lnga par ldan/ /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa dag gi lnga pa'o/ /uSh+ma'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa ni/ /o yis mtshan pa
21b3(rgyud): bri bya ste/ /uSh+ma rnams kyi gnyis pa dang / /bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang / /uSh+ma'i yi ge bzhi pa la/ /u yis brgyan cing thig ler bcas/ /sde tshan lnga pa dag gi ni//
21b4(rgyud): dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang / /bzhi pa dang por bcas pa ni/ /snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag /'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te khyi nag po'i
21b5(rgyud): thod pa'i nang du bcug la gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te nyungs kar gyis brab par bya'o/ /de nas klu yod pa'i gnas su khyer la rang gi lus la gla rtsis
21b6(rgyud): byugs te chu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsh+tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ na mo b+ha ga te bud+d+ha bA rI ya/ tad+ya thA/
21b7(rgyud): phu Ta phu Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ mi li mi li/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phyag rgya ni/ sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung bkug la mthe bos mnan te bskor bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA
22a1(rgyud): ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba na mi mi li tsi li d+hoM/ /ban+d+ha ya/ kro d+ha ya/ badzra la ma ya/ ma ka na ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la
22a2(rgyud): pra dz+wa la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ sarba na ga ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ nA ga na si ra sa ra/ bi sa ra sarba du Sh+TAM hri da ya/ sho Sha Na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phyag rgya ni/ lag pa'i zur gnyis gshibs te
22a3(rgyud): s rin lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs bsgreng la gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis gshibs te spyi bor
22a4(rgyud): bzhag nas sngags lan bdun brjod de ldang bar bya'o/ /gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / dri chen dang / nya'i mkhris pa dang / sgog skya dang /
22a5(rgyud): shu dag rnams sbyar te lus la byugs na rdzas kyis srung ba'o/ /rgya sol gyi me la bsregs te bdugs na/ ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams zhi bar
22a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang / kha ra dang / 'bras yos dang / dung dang / mtshal
22a7(rgyud): dang / rgya mtsho'i lbu ba la sogs pa dag 'khar gzhong du blugs te yungs kar la gzungs sngags 'di brjod cing klu mchod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma
22b1(rgyud): sh+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA hUM hUM/ tad+ya thA/ oM a nan+ta ka /tak+Sha ka/ shaM kha pA la/ bA su ki /mahA pat+ma/ oM ga ta pa la wa ta/ karko Ta phu swAhA zhes brjod pas klu rnams bde ba dang
22b2(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro/ /char dbab par 'dod na/ dri zhim po'i chus maN+Dal byas te spra tshil la klu'i gzugs sor mo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas maN+Dal gyi steng du me tog
22b3(rgyud): gtor la gzungs thag btags te gzhag par bya'o/ /snying gar gong gi de gro ga la gi'u wang gis bris la bzhugs par byas/ nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po
22b4(rgyud): se'u'i lcug mas khyab par byas nas gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM suM su pra ti badzra dun+te mi li mi li ba ri sha ya swAhA zhes brjod de/ rang smyung bar gnas par
22b5(rgyud): bya'o/ /gal te klu rnams kyis char mi 'bebs na/ klu rnams kyi mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /spos kyi maN+Dal byas te rgya spos kyi me la
22b6(rgyud): gzugs bsro zhing gzungs sngags brjod pa ni/ spogs pa'i cho ga'o/ /dri zhim po'i me la bu ram dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / til la sogs pa'i dgang blugs
22b7(rgyud): kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ste/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las/
23a1(rgyud): le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'dam skyes pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi steng du a las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil
23a2(rgyud): 'khor/ de'i steng du mu gyi sa bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma muM dang ldan pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal mgon po'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis
23a3(rgyud): lon pa lta bu/ gser btso ma' ma gur gum gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas
23a4(rgyud): pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pas po ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'o/ /shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha ba la gur
23a5(rgyud): gum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/
23a6(rgyud): g.yon pa na ut+pa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o/ /lho'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug sku mdog mthing zhal gcig phyag
23a7(rgyud): gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa na 'khor lo thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o/ /nub
23b1(rgyud): kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog byi ru bcag pa lta bu/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis na ut+pal
23b2(rgyud): gnyis bsnams pa'o/ /byang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal shes rab ral gri sku mdog ljang gu/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
23b3(rgyud): pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon gyi dang po na ut+pa la sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kar 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas kyi 'og ma na mnga' 'dzin
23b4(rgyud): pa/ g.yon gyi 'og ma na rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /sku de dag ni/ ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i nam mkha' ma lus pa'i 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i sku'o//
23b5(rgyud): oM d+harma d+hA tu wA gi shwa ri muM zhes brjod pas shes rab ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i bum pa cu gang dang / gur gum dang / a
23b6(rgyud): ga ru dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi la sogs pa dri zhim po'i chu blugs te/ na maHsa man+ta ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ sa myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ d+hA
23b7(rgyud): ra Ni/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ a gats+tsha ya a gats+tsha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ bruM bruM bruM/ hUM hUM dzi na dzi ka /many+dzu shri ye/ su shri ye/ ta ra ya maM haM/ sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ a mr-i tod b+ha ba sa
24a1(rgyud): ma ya sa ma ya/ ud b+ha be/ sarba pA paM me nA sha ya swAhA zhes gzungs sngags 'di bum pa'i chu la lan bdun brjod de/ khrus byas rna/
24a2(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rno zhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba tha thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shri ye/
24a3(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM many+dzu g+ho Sha/ ha na ha na/ ba tsa pa tsa/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma tha ma tha/ bid+h+waM sa ya/ ka ra ka ra/ tu tra tu tra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ A bi
24a4(rgyud): sha ya A bi sha ya/ tu tra tu tra/ tu Ta tu Ta/ s+phu Ta sa s+phu Ta sa/ hr-i da ya sAd+hA ni/ na maHsaM bo d+ha ni pra bi sha ya/ lau hu ta lau hu ta/ krai te krai te/ pra ban+d+ha pra ban+d+ha/ A
24a5(rgyud): be sha ya A be sha ya/ haM maM sarba big+h+naM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA zhes bya bas nad pa la 'bras kyi snye ma'am/ til la btab ste khrus bya'o/ /gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus
24a6(rgyud): byas pas/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro/ /ka ra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na yang zhi bar 'gyur
24a7(rgyud): ro/ /ral gri la btab nas g.yul du zhugs na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa
24b1(rgyud): la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /gro ga'am ras la bris te sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la gdags par bya'o/ /skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste mdud pa byas la
24b2(rgyud): srid kyis gdungs pa la btags te 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ bu mo dag smyung bas 'dug ste yi dam du 'don na/ lha dang / klu dang /
24b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / yi dwags dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / lce 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dag las
24b4(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur ro/ /stag dang / dom dang / dred la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sa g.yo ba rnams zhi bar
24b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /yid gzhungs shing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa med
24b6(rgyud): pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcig gam/ lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad du
24b7(rgyud): rjod par byed na/ de'i lus la mdze dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / mig dang rna ba dang / son pa la
25a1(rgyud): sogs pa dag mi 'byung ngo / /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun
25a2(rgyud): nas 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro dang / gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jig
25a3(rgyud): rten du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang /
25a4(rgyud): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i gnas man chad khyab par mdzad do/ /bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /bsam gtan dang po nas langs
25a5(rgyud): te bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag go / gnyis pa las langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag go /gsum pa las langs nas
25a6(rgyud): bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag go / bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/ nam
25a7(rgyud): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas
25b1(rgyud): ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go / ci yang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yod min med min skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go /de las
25b2(rgyud): langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go / de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
25b3(rgyud): po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la
25b4(rgyud): sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te
25b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las/ le'u dgu pa'o// //'phags pa
25b6(rgyud): mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing
25b7(rgyud): zhus ste gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya badzra kro d+ha rA dzA kalpa la g+hu ta n+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/
26a1(rgyud): dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
26a2(rgyud): n am mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor
26a3(rgyud): ba'i dbus su dpag tshad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma shin tu mtho ba/ kun kyang rin po che du ma'i khri pad+ma dang seng+ges mtho ba/ dbu rtse rin po che zur
26a4(rgyud): mang gi mchod rten pad+ma dang / 'khor lo dang / gdugs mtho bar drangs pa la dar gyi dpyangs lding ba/ de'i grib ma sa gzhi la bkod pa na byang chub sems
26a5(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i bzhon pa las babs nas nang du gshegs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / dra ba
26a6(rgyud): dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / rnga yab dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / rdo rje phyed pa dang / chu 'phyang shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes pa/ sgo khyud khyams dang / sgo glegs
26a7(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i me long dang / gdugs la sogs pa du mas khyab pa/ rin po che'i pha gu brtsegs te mdzes par byas ba du ma de thams cad kyi dbus su 'khor gyi
26b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/ /de yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /
26b2(rgyud): 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang bo dang / byams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / sna tshogs bkram pa dang / mkha'
26b3(rgyud): 'od me tog 'chang dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / gzugs mdzes dag pa dang / sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
26b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mau dgal dang rta thul dang / 'od srung la sogs pa bye ba phrag bzhi dang / grags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin
26b5(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / lus ngan pa dang / gshin rje dang / dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i rigs sum brgya dang lhan
26b6(rgyud): cig tu chos kyi rnam grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnam pa du
26b7(rgyud): ma dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la dgongs pa tha dad kyi bsam pa dang mthun pa'i bkod pa chen po bskyed pa dang / cho 'phrul du ma bsgyur ba dang / 'od zer du ma 'gyed cing
27a1(rgyud): thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum bzhin du 'khor la gzigs nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste byang chub
27a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ yi ge ming tshig dag gi sgos/ /sngags dbyibs chos su byin brlabs kyis/ /yi ge sgra
27a3(rgyud): tsam phyed dam gcig / mngon sum rjes 'jug ring thung dang / /dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshan mas mtshan/ /sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu bdag /dbang bcu don
27a4(rgyud): bcu rnam pa bcu/ /mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres chos/ /byams dang thugs rje chen po dag /dbyangs gcig gis ni sngags gyis su/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab
27a5(rgyud): zhi dang / /yid 'phrog dpal 'byor dbang phyug dang / mthu stobs du ma bskyed pa dang / rtag gnas thob dang don nges thob/ /rdo rje bla na med sems bskyed/ /mdor
27a6(rgyud): na gang gis gang 'dod pa/ /bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje bla na med pa gsor/ /chos sgra bla na med pa sgrog /'khor lo bla na med pa bskor/ /ral gri
27a7(rgyud): bla na med pa zungs/ /pad+ma bla na med pa chongs/ /rin chen bla med gsal bar gyis/ /dkyil 'khor tshul du spros nas kyang / /mchod rten tshul du bsdu bar gyis/ /lha klu
27b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci/ /srin po sha za brjed byed tshogs/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs gyur pa'i/ /rnam 'phrul du ma 'di sgyur cig /
27b2(rgyud): gsung mchog de skad thos ma thag /lag na rdo rje mthu bo che/ /dga' mgu thal mo rab sbyar te/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol te/ /gser dang rin chen lnga po las/ /
27b3(rgyud): rab mchog ri bor gyur pa las/ /'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang / /rtags su yang dag 'dzin pa ltar/ /rnam par shes dang phung po bzhi/ /'byung ba rnam par
27b4(rgyud): dag bsgrubs pas/ /lha dang phyag rgya 'phrin las su/ /sngags shes rnams kyis bzung byas nas/ /brtul pa'i ye shes byang chub rim/ /khyad par de la ldan par
27b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches/ /sku las sna tshogs mdangs 'od can/ /'od zer du ma byung nas kyang / /gzhi dang snying po me
27b6(rgyud): tog gis/ /brgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas tshe/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /'jig rten skyong dang bdun gyi tshogs/ /ma lus pa rnams rgyal par 'gyur/ /nyan thos
27b7(rgyud): rang rgyal 'dar bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi/ /tshogs rnams shin tu skrag par gyur/ /de tshe phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod
28a1(rgyud): spu nas/ /khro bo chen po'i tshogs byung ba/ /'od zer rtse mos drangs nas su/ /zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lhags/ /'od zer tshogs
28a2(rgyud): kyang rab 'dus nas/ /dpal be'u nyid du thim par gyur/ /de tshe 'od de'i byin rlabs las/ /mkha' la sgra 'di grags par gyur/ /shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs
28a3(rgyud): rgyas/ /gang du gzi brjid che bzhugs slad/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs/ /dri ma med pa'i dam chos mchog /
28a4(rgyud): gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba/ /thos nas byang chub 'dus ma byas/ /'jig rten mgon po brnyas par gyur/ /de nas lag na rdo rje tshogs/ /'khor gyi dkyil
28a5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyang / /snyim pa me tog bkang byas te/ /gtor nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas/ /dang zhing gus pa'i tshul gyis su/ pus btsugs thal
28a6(rgyud): sbyar gsol ba 'debs/ /mi gnas ye shes che ba'i mchog /yon tan rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gtso/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rab brgyan pa/ /mtshan min spangs pa'i
28a7(rgyud): thub pa che/ /dri me dge ba ji ltar lags/ /gsang sngags tshul du spyod pa ci/ /'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang / /'jig rten mgon po ji ltar 'gyur/ /bdag
28b1(rgyud): cag rnams la sman rab dang / /'gro la thugs rje che mdzad phyir/ /mgon po bcom ldan thub pa che/ /yang dang yang du bshad du gsol/ /de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
28b2(rgyud): rkang gnyis gtso bos bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin/ /shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pas/ /bdag gzhan phan don la brtson phyir/ /legs par
28b3(rgyud): nyon la yid la zungs/ /yang dag yang dag mtha' min tshul/ /de ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /srog gcod ma byin len rdzun 'khrig /tshig rtsub dbyen dang ngag kyal
28b4(rgyud): smra/ /brnab sems gnod sems log lta chang / /dri ro ngan pa'i zas skom dang / /srog can sha khrag log 'tshor bcas/ /slob dpon dge 'dun mchod rten sogs/ /khyad
28b5(rgyud): par yul can yo byad dang / /dman zhing nyam thag 'phrog dgu dang / glegs bam tshong dang chos kyi zong / /g.yang sa ral gri so dgu sogs/ /me 'o bas ltar mthong spangs
28b6(rgyud): nas kyang / /rnam par dkar la sogs par bya/ /yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin stsol dang / /nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang / /mchod pa dang / ni kha ton dang / /de dag sems dang
28b7(rgyud): sgom pa ste/ /dkar bcu lam la yun ring dang / /nub bcus rgyun mi 'chad du 'bad/ /gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems/ /shel ltar dri ma med pa'o/ /mchog 'di spyad
29a1(rgyud): pas sdug bsngal tshogs/ /myur du gcod pas dge ba'o/ /chos bdag med dang mnyam nyid dang / /rang sems gdod nas dag pa gang / /
29a2(rgyud): sgyu 'dra 'du byed med pa dang / /zag bcas de dang bral ba las/ /byang chub phyogs chos ma lus pa/ /chos nyid bdag med spyod pa ni/ /chos dbyings ye shes
29a3(rgyud): mngon byas nas/ /ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsal ba/ /'dus ma byas kyi byang chub ste/ /chos rnams kun gyi gzhi lus so/ /'dod pa'i khams sogs yon
29a4(rgyud): tan la/ /shin tu bde rol spyad pa spyod/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can rnams kyi/ /lkog tu gyur pa gsang ba ste/ /bskal pa bsam yas dpag med du/ brlab
29a5(rgyud): dka' yangs zab rgya chen rnams/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du/ /lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa/ /dbyer med tshul du skyob pas na/ /sangs rgyas kun
29a6(rgyud): gyis sngags su brjod/ /mtshan dang dpe byang ldan pa'i sku/ /yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa ni/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
29a7(rgyud): kyi mgon/ /la la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs/ /la lar dag sbyong chen po'i gzugs/ /la lar srin po srin mo'i gzugs/ /la lar 'gro ba bzang po'i
29b1(rgyud): gzugs/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /seng+ge ltar gzigs mdzad la sogs/ /sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni/ /rkang gnyis lha min rnam gnyis sogs/ /'gro ba'i mgon
29b2(rgyud): por gyur pa'o/ /rtag dang 'dra dang nges med pa'i/ /gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams/ /'jig rten phal ba'i mgon po ste/ /gzugs byad kha dog tha dad pa/ /yul dus
29b3(rgyud): rnam pa'i bye brag gis/ /grangs mi byung ba mchod 'os so/ /thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag /rdo rje can gyis bzhengs nas kyang / /phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/ /
29b4(rgyud): spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol/ /'dren pa gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /sngags zhes pa ni gang gang yin/ /phyag rgya zhes ni ci lta bu/ /ting 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar
29b5(rgyud): bshad/ /lus ngag yid la ji ltar gnas/ /dbyer med tshul du ji ltar skyob/ /bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang / /gzhan la brtse phyir bshad du gsol/ /de nas rgyal ba
29b6(rgyud): gtso mchog ni/ /ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas te/ /tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis/ /rnam rtog zad phyir 'di gsungs so/ /snying po nye snying rtsa ba'i sngags/ /las kyi
29b7(rgyud): sngags su gyur pa ste/ /snying po brjod dang sa bon no/ /nye snying ye shes mchog dang ni/ /gsang ba'i snying po zhes grags so/ /las kyi sngags ni gnyis yin te/ bdag
30a1(rgyud): nyid brtan byed las sngags dang / /sbyor tshogs grub par byed pa'o/ /phyag rgyal lag pa'i 'du byed dang / rkang pa stabs ki 'gyur ba'o/ /rtags
30a2(rgyud): su mtshon dang 'debs pa dang / /'gyur ba med par byed pas na/ /phyag rgya zhes su bshad pa'o/ /rang gi rtse gcig sems bsdus na/ /sems la lhag pa'i chos
30a3(rgyud): 'bebs pa/ /de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya/ /de ltar de dag la brten nas/ /snga ma'i gnas de yongs gyur nas/ /sgo nga bral ba'i 'dab bzang ltar/ /lus 'di mkha' la
30a4(rgyud): cher song nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du/ /rgyal ba'i dam chos mnyan nas kyang / /rgyal sras kun la bshad pa dang / /skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes
30a5(rgyud): pas kyang / /shes bya ma lus phyogs khyab pa/ /lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o/ /sems dang yid ni 'dres pa'i tshe/ /ye shes bde bar shar ba ni/ dus gsum
30a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /dbyer med tshul du skyob ces gsungs/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ lhag par gnas pa'i don
30a7(rgyud): yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // zhi bas gdul dka' bgegs chen dang / /log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sems kyi bye
30b1(rgyud): brag thugs chud nas/ /de dang gzugs 'dras gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rtog med nam mkha'i lam gnas te/ /rdzogs sangs gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sku/ /rab 'phags
30b2(rgyud): khro bo stobs chen dpal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi sras/ /mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir/ /rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal/ /tshangs sogs lha dang
30b3(rgyud): lus can kun/ /de la rtag tu mchod par byed/ /rgyal bas byas gzo rgyal sras kyi/ /smon rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /ye shes rdzogs nas mi g.yo'i sa/ /thob
30b4(rgyud): pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya/ /phas kyi rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste/ /tshar gcod pa ni khro bo yin/ /sngags kyi bden tshig mi slu bas/ /nyan thos bdud tshogs kyis mi g.yo/ /
30b5(rgyud): rtog med bdud rtsi khro bas rgyal/ /rdzu 'phrul bskyod med mi g.yo ba/ /de bzhin nyid kyi snying po mchog /stong nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku/ /chos dbyings bdag nyid la
30b6(rgyud): bzhugs nas/ /sprul 'dis srid pa'i khams sbyong mdzad/ /mkha' ltar dri med spros bral bas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung / /spros med nam mkha'i
30b7(rgyud): rang bzhin la/ /tha dad tsam du gsang sngags zhes/ /brjod kyang ngag gi spyod yul 'das/ /skyob pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs/ /sems med rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /sgyu
31a1(rgyud): 'drar yid kyis bsgom pa yin/ /dngos med mnyam mdzes 'dod don rnams/ /gsang sngags mgon 'dis brjod pas stsol/ /mu stegs bdag dang
31a2(rgyud): srog gang zag / gtso bo skyes bu khyab gnas pas/ /'khor ba rtag 'dod nga rgyal rmongs/ /log pa'i zhags bcings sdug bsngal skyed/ /bdag med srog med sems can med//
31a3(rgyud): byed po med cing gtso bo med/ /khyab gnas med cing dngos po med/ /rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med/ /log rtog srid 'ching zhags bcad phyir/ /dngos med sna tshogs
31a4(rgyud): gzugs bsgoms pas/ /dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang thob/ /phyi nang khyad par goms pa'o/ /dbu ba chu bur sgyu 'drar bsgom/ /stong nyid las ldang ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnam
31a5(rgyud): rtog sdig bcings las grol nas/ 'chi med ye shes go 'phang thob/ /phung po khams dang skye mched med/ /kun gzhi med de gang zag med/ /gzung 'dzin med de bcings
31a6(rgyud): med par/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad/ /kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i/ /stong nyid byang sems sgyu 'dra bar/ /bag yod pas ni rtag bsgoms na/ /byang chub sems
31a7(rgyud): kyi myu gu 'char/ /yid bzhin nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che/ /mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i sku/ /sngags spyod byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /byang chub sems kyi sgom pa thob/ /ngo
31b1(rgyud): mtshar gsungs te thos ma thag / khro bo rnams kyis gtso bo bstod/ /rtag tu dag cing dri med pa/ /rnam rtog rgyun 'ga' kun rtog med/ /rtag rtog med la zhugs pa yi/ /dpa'
31b2(rgyud): bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ches kun g.yo ba med pa khyod/ /spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas/ /kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtag /rang bzhin spros bral khyod phyag
31b3(rgyud): 'tshal/ /sems can sna tshogs phan don du/ /mdzad spyod sna tshogs gsungs pa'o/ /dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung / /rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
31b4(rgyud): mun pa phra rab rdul spangs ba'i/ /sprin bral nam mkha' dag pa ltar/ /mgon po khyod sku shel sgong lta/ /kun rtog spangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /spros med nam mkha'
31b5(rgyud): lta bu la/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung khams skyed ched shin tu dag /ye shes rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mkha' la 'ja' shar sna tshogs ltar/ /gtso khyod dag
31b6(rgyud): pa'i sems can gzigs/ /ngan 'gro kun sgrol dpa' chen 'khrungs/ /go cha chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos nyid las byung snying po ni/ /yi ge gcig pa gzi brjid che/ /sems can
31b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal sa gzhi la/ /mun 'khrigs sel la phyag 'tshal stod/ /sngags mchog gzo bo'i gsang ba 'dis/ /rgyal sras chos 'phel shes rab skyed/ /bla med go 'phang myur
32a1(rgyud): 'gro gsungs/ /gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dngos kun gyur dang bcas pa yi/ /las dang skye las rnam par grol/ /rgyal ba rgyu med bdag nyid
32a2(rgyud): 'khrungs/ /gtso mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dngos med ye shes me lce yis/ /'dus byas ri bo kun bsregs nas/ /chos dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal/ /bla med
32a3(rgyud): sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bstod pa'i don de thugs chud nas/ /'gro la phan phyir cho ga gsungs/ /gsang sngags log par spyod pa dang / /ser sna log par goms pa las/ /'dod
32a4(rgyud): pas non pa'i sems rtog gis/ /sngags pa yi dwags gnas su skye/ /dang pos mar me me tog dang / /zhal zas gtor ma phreng ba sogs/ /mchod pa'i rdzas dang po byad dang / /mi yi lus
32a5(rgyud): dang kha zas la/ /'tshe zhing sgrub pa'i bar du gcod/ /mi sdug nad skyed lo tog 'tshe/ /gnyis pa gnod sbyin drag byur nas/ /sha khrag chang la snom zhing rgyug /thos
32a6(rgyud): bsam sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing / /nad skyed tshe len log lta skyed/ /rig sngags 'chang gi gdon gzhom phyir/ /sgrub pos 'bad de sngags brjod bya/ /sngags
32a7(rgyud): mthu skyed pa gtor ma dang / spyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bcas dang / mnan pa'i las kyis nags me ltar/ /thogs pa med par 'joms par 'gyur/ /de dag
32b1(rgyud): rten byed lha yin te/ /de gsal byed pa ras ris yin/ /de kun rnam dag gsal byed pa/ /byang chub sems mchog zhi ba ni/ /log rtog 'khor ba'i zo chun la/ /ral
32b2(rgyud): gri rnon po'i sta re ltar/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas sngags
32b3(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dag / 'byung bar rab tu bshad par bya/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA hAM/ snying bo dam pa'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/
32b4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya/ hUM/ Ta ta haM maM/ snying po'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA hra ta a mo g+ha/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha
32b5(rgyud): Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra sa ma ya hUM/ Ta Ta haM maM/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /na maHsarbaHsa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA thA a tsa lArka na/ naT+Ta naT+Ta/ moT+Ta moT+Ta/ saT+Ta saT+Ta/
32b6(rgyud): taT+Ta taT+Ta/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A be sha aHmaT/ ma la ka /d+ha Na d+ha Na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+h+nan/ mA ra mA ra duSh+Tan/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sa traM/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi dzi
32b7(rgyud): ya badzra phaT hUM hUM hUM/ tri bi la ta ra ga/ narta ka/ haM haM haM/ a tsa la/ te tse/ phaT phaT/ a hUM/ a sa man+ta ka/ Ta Ta/ ma hA ba la sa ta a ma na ya/ traM maM haM/ shung+d+h+ya tu lo
33a1(rgyud): ka / tu Sh+yan tu lo ka badzri na maHswa pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yo/ /dza la ma tra ta/ a sa ta na maHswa hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /de nas phyag rgya stangs
33a2(rgyud): stabs kyis brjod pa 'dir gsungs so/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM ha na ha na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ dz+nyA na/ kha T+wAM ga hUM phaT /
33a3(rgyud): ral gri'i phyag rgya'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra te b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ om gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ khA da khA da/ pA sha na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ma h+'a A R+ya te/ d+ha rma
33a4(rgyud): te swAhA/ zhags pa'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ha na ha na/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ mA ra ya duSh+Ta ba nI ya kaM hUM dza/ go cha'i 'o//
33a5(rgyud): na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM d+hA ra d+ha ra badza na li/ kha T+wAM ga pA sha d+ha ra swA hA/ gtsug tor gyi'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ta ke b+h+yaHsarba
33a6(rgyud): ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+hany+dza ban+d+ha da ha pa tsa b+hasmi ku ru ku ru ha na ha na badzra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/ tho ba'i 'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM Sh+Ta
33a7(rgyud): na ta mu rti/ da ha da ha/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ bi dza ya kIrti swAhA/ mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+hu d+ha ra d+ha ra/
33b1(rgyud): a tsi na d+ya ba la bi kra ma NaM/ bu ra bu sa la ya/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba swA hA/ rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM badzra hri da ya/ badzra ma
33b2(rgyud): taM gi swA hA/ snying ga'i phyag rgya'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA gA te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM hUM da ha da ha/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ A na yu shri g+h+raM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/
33b3(rgyud): duSh+Ta na// da ma da ma swA hA/ phyogs bcing ba'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM du na du na ma hA pA sha kha T+wAM ga d+ha ras pa ri pU ra ke swA hA/ bka'
33b4(rgyud): rtags kyi'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri bu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM ga ga na gan+d+hod b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya/ pa ri pU ra ke swA hA/ dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /na maHsarba
33b5(rgyud): sa pa ri pU ra keH sarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi shung+d+ha dz+nyA na rA dzi saM b+ha phe ga ga nA nA na hAHswA hA/ ma mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te
33b6(rgyud): b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM shung+d+ha d+ha rma te/ shung+d+h+ya shung+d+h+ya/ /gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/ gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba
33b7(rgyud): thA/ oM shung+d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swa b+ha be/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA na ye swA hA/ bdug pa'i 'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba tha thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM ga ga ni bi krAn+ta gA mi ni
34a1(rgyud): ma hA shung+d+ha na ye swA hA/ me tog gi'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM ha na ha na/ pa ra ma bi shung+d+he d+ha rma
34a2(rgyud): na ya pa ri pU ra te b+h+yaHswA hA/ zhal zas kyi'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra te b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM a pra ti hi to na d+ya ta/ da ma da ma/ sarba thA/ sa pa ri pU ra ke
34a3(rgyud): b+h+yaHswA hA/ dpa' bo spyan drang ba'i'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM bi shung+d+ha bi shung+d+ha/ sa kra swa b+hA ba A na ya/ ma hA na ya
34a4(rgyud): swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang ba'i 'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM bi shung+d+ha swA hA/ ha na ha na/ da ma da ma/ ma hA na
34a5(rgyud): ye swA na/ nyan thos spyan drang ba'i 'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM badzra kaR+Sha ya/ shri g+h+raM /da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma hA pa
34a6(rgyud): ri wA re swA hA/ pho nya pho mo spyan drang ba'i 'o/ /na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM ma tha ma tha/ sA na ya A na ya/ pra be sha ya pra
34a7(rgyud): be sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba de baM/ ta ma ta ma/ ma hA na ya/ bi ra wA re hUM swA hA/ 'jig rten pa rnams spyan drang ba'i 'o/ /na maHsarba pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba
34b1(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA oM sa t+ya sa t+ya/ ma hA sa dA ya/ da ma da ma/ ma hA da ma/ A kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya/ a d+ya ba ma hA na ya shung+d+he swA hA/ drang srong spyan drang ba'i'o//
34b2(rgyud): na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra te b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ ma hA sa t+ya ba di ni/ sarba hi ti swA hA/ srin mo rnams spyan drang ba'i'o//
