67b6(rgyud): grub/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad/ /thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags/ /gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par
67b7(rgyud): nges/ /mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa/ /nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi/ /snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad/ /'bar brtsa dmar 'od snang ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkar
68a1(rgyud): po che ba ste/ /gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos dbyings dang / /nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges/ /swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog /'od zer bde legs
68a2(rgyud): bde legs mdzad/ /stobs che 'chang ba bkra shis pa/ /nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags/ /stobs byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/ /mkha' ltar dri med spyod
68a3(rgyud): yul can/ /dpa' bo rdo rje 'joms par mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa/ /sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston/ /rlung chen shugs
68a4(rgyud): kyis bskyod pa yi/ /g.yo dang 'brug sgrog sgra ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes/ /mngon shes chen po mngon shes
68a5(rgyud): brnyes/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nas sa yi dbang phyug po/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la/ /bstod nas kun mkhyen gnod bral
68a6(rgyud): ba/ /thub pa'i nyi mas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgya mchog /ming gi yon tan 'od ldan la/ /bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa/ /thabs chen bla
68a7(rgyud): na med pa ste/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten kun gyis bde skyed pa/ /'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /sdig
68b1(rgyud): pa dag las rgyal ba yi/ /byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis/ /ming ni la la gang bstod pa/ /de la lha la sogs kun dang / /lag na rdo rje stobs
68b2(rgyud): chen rnams/ /rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun/ /gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni/ /sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur
68b3(rgyud): te/ /'di la the tshom yong med do/ /nang par mal nas langs nas ni/ /gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod/ /de la byams pa rtogs pa yi/ /byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /
68b4(rgyud): de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing / /sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs//
68b5(rgyud): 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya kha gar+b+ha aSh+To t+ta ra sha ta ka nA
68b6(rgyud): ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags
68b7(rgyud): pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyis 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i
69a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM swasti ka mA lak+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba/ d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA/
69a2(rgyud): gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni/ /rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa yang g.yos par gyur/ rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur/
69a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye 'khor gyi dkyil
69a4(rgyud): 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i mchog gi gzungs/ /'byung bar shin tu dka'
69a5(rgyud): ba/ bsod nams chen po/ sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di
69a6(rgyud): nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma lta bur 'gyur
69a7(rgyud): te/ 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad snang bar byed do/ /zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams
69b1(rgyud): cad rab tu sim par byed do/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho dman med
69b2(rgyud): do/ /lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so/ /de la
69b3(rgyud): sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa tsam
69b4(rgyud): dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis
69b5(rgyud): kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang /
69b6(rgyud): 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / mgon med pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan gzan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed pa/
69b7(rgyud): bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang /
70a1(rgyud): ga zha bton te sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' thams
70a2(rgyud): cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying
70a3(rgyud): po srid gsum sems can mchog / 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/ /sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /thar pa'i sa bon 'khor
70a4(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen/ /thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen/ /lam mkhyen
70a5(rgyud): gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/ /dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang / stobs min mkhyen/ /'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog/
70a6(rgyud): lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog /dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog
70a7(rgyud): min mchog / zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab/ /'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab/ /rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/ /mnyam rab sems
70b1(rgyud): can rab ste gsum rig rab/ /legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron/ /thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron/ /dge sgron gzi sgron nor
70b2(rgyud): bu'i 'od kyi sgron/ /rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron/ /mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od/ /legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/ /'od chen
70b3(rgyud): gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba/ /rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang / /rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan
70b4(rgyud): dbang po/ /rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang / /dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rngo 'od rdo rje 'bar/ /rdo rje
70b5(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/ /rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag /rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang / /na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/ /sku mdog sngo
70b6(rgyud): zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams/ /mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs/ /lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad
70b7(rgyud): 'bar/ /rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur/ /sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrul byed phreng mchog can/ /klog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan/ /ral gri
71a1(rgyud): mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon/ /rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs/ /'khor lo'i mtshon thogs
71a2(rgyud): bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul/ /gsal zhing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa/ /bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug /sku rnams
71a3(rgyud): thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad/ /mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis/ /sku mdzes brnyes
71a4(rgyud): shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes/ /rab 'byams mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes/ /mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la/ /rig pa
71a5(rgyud): gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa/ /bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa/ /cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren/ /byams 'dren nyi ma
71a6(rgyud): 'dren cing skye rgu 'dren/ /legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can/ /dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar/ /rnam grangs sgeg pas grags
71a7(rgyud): pa'i ba dan can/ /'gro ba'i skyabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/ /longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /sku dmar sku mthon sku
71b1(rgyud): mdzes sku bzang ba/ /sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/ /sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/ /rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams/ /gtsug
71b2(rgyud): gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog / cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang
71b3(rgyud): ba phun sum tshogs/ /rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu/ /srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'/ /ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis
71b4(rgyud): pa/ /yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags/ /nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'gro
71b5(rgyud): kun mgon gcig pu/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba/ /sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags/ /srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal
71b6(rgyud): sras mchog / zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag /skye rgu'i bdag po pad 'byung pad+ma skyes/ /kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba/ /dar ba legs
71b7(rgyud): bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag / blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang / /mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan/ /zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba
72a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad/ /legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa/ /snying
72a2(rgyud): rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad/ /rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo/ /blo yangs par ni bkram zhing rnam par grags/ /kun tu longs spyod
72a3(rgyud): sgo ste bla yi mchog / blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma mda' rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/ /dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid
72a4(rgyud): du 'thad/ /snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/ /ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba/ /spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa/ /'jigs med zhal
72a5(rgyud): ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra/ /mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs/ /drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes/ /rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs
72a6(rgyud): dga' 'dris pa sla/ /rab tu drag ba gnyen rab gser mdog can/ /lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams/ /spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum
72a7(rgyud): sel/ /'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'/ /na bza' bzang mnabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/ /legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna
72b1(rgyud): tshogs mnga'/ /na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal/ /zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra/ /zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad/ /
72b2(rgyud): bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'/ /zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba/ /dbang chen rdo rje'i thog legs 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /rdo rje
72b3(rgyud): drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/ /sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/ /blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog /rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal
72b4(rgyud): dang ldan/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang / /stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid/ /skye rgu'i bdag po
72b5(rgyud): bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags/ /mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu/ /sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can/ /mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang
72b6(rgyud): sdug par ldan/ /ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs/ /gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug par mdzad/ /brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/ /dkyil
72b7(rgyud): 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags/ /gcig pu skye rgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes/ /dbang bskur
73a1(rgyud): brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas/ /gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags/ /skye rgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel
73a2(rgyud): ba dang / /sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/ /bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/ /'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang / /
73a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/ /mdun 'dug nang bar bstod pa 'di brjod yang / /de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing / /dri ma'i
73a4(rgyud): gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur/ /g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang / /mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na/ /mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs
73a5(rgyud): dad skyes nas/ /nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa/ /de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las
73a6(rgyud): grol/ /des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang / /bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/ /bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'am/ /rgyal srid
73a7(rgyud): 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang / /rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir/ /bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de phyir ci ste rtag tu
73b1(rgyud): 'dod bde kun/ /'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba/ /nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la/ /rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par bgyi/ /'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
73b2(rgyud): po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad
73b3(rgyud): du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po kun tu bzang po nam
73b4(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil kun tu rab 'byams ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing / dus
73b5(rgyud): gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa yon tan chen po'i skus
73b6(rgyud): kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems
73b7(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byams sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
74a1(rgyud): p o snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byams kun tu yongs
74a2(rgyud): su rgyas par gyur te nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas
74a3(rgyud): s angs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa'
74a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying
74a5(rgyud): po gzungs chen mo shod cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas de'i tshe sangs rgyas
74a6(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas gzungs 'di bshad do/ /tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na mas+t+ri/ b+hu ba ni/ shwa te/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sa ma sa ma/ a mr-i ta sa ma/ a
74a7(rgyud): nan+ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hu ba na sa ma/ a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra mA r+tha sa me/ swa b+ha ba sa ma/ ta tha tA sa ma/ a ra dze sa ma/ a d+d+hi sa ma/ bud+d+hi
74b1(rgyud): sa ma/ d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/ a b+hi Sha sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e kA nA ya/ sA ga ra/ bi shud+d+he/ A lo ka/ hI hI/ lab+d+ha lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ oM pra sa ga ta/ na ya na
74b2(rgyud): ya/ hi ni/ ni ra d+hiSh+ThA na/ saM b+ho ga /aM a na la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya/ hUM hUM/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo/ /'jig rten
74b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/ /sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas
74b4(rgyud): te sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so/ /de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i bang chub
74b5(rgyud): s ems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me
74b6(rgyud): tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste smras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang / yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab
74b7(rgyud): tu 'byams pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing / sems can gyi khams grangs
75a1(rgyud): med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma bskal
75a2(rgyud): pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skem la/ lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo/
75a3(rgyud): bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par bsags shing bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang
75a4(rgyud): chub kyi sa bon ma bsnubs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni/ sus
75a5(rgyud): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyam par yang mi nus na/ gzung ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba lta
75a6(rgyud): ci smos/ /gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa byed ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi
75a7(rgyud): lag na 'dug pa de dag ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o/ /'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang ba'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba
75b1(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/ /yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam
75b2(rgyud): gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lan
75b3(rgyud): gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par 'gyur
75b4(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /shing gcig
75b5(rgyud): 'greng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na/ grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur
75b6(rgyud): ro/ /nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na/ bsam gtan chen po thob par 'gyur la nyon mongs pa dang bral bar
75b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas lus ngal bar
76a1(rgyud): gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na/ rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
76a2(rgyud): bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad
76a3(rgyud): do/ /'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so legs so/ /khyod ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tshe brjes
76a4(rgyud): nas sa chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kyang gsung ngo / /de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu
76a5(rgyud): dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen po dang / dbang che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /
76a6(rgyud): nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
76a7(rgyud): bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams
76b1(rgyud): bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro/ lha la sogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba'i phyir brtson par
76b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni/ ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i
76b3(rgyud): gtsug phud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / rdo rje
76b4(rgyud): snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen mo rnams dang / rin chen dra ba can la
76b5(rgyud): sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dar chen dang /
76b6(rgyud): gzugs bzang dang / shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log
76b7(rgyud): 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i
77a1(rgyud): dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams
77a2(rgyud): c ad langs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas
77a3(rgyud): bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog /sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor ba che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog /sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi
77a4(rgyud): bdag / rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che/ /gzi brjid chen po stobs po che/ /gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/ /khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal/ /rdo rje chen po
77a5(rgyud): rab tu bzhad/ /sgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa/ /rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/ /rab dga' chen pos 'dul ba po/ lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/ /
77a6(rgyud): btsan po khyab 'jug skye rgu'i bdag /sa steng sa 'og sa la dgyes/ /de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa/ /dul dang sbyin pa'i go rim thabs/ /rab mkhyen stong
77a7(rgyud): gi mnga' bdag lags/ /shes nyen can de bzod la dgyes/ /brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che/ /brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa/ /stobs bcu'i sras
77b1(rgyud): chen thu po ste/ /mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang / /yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba/ /rdul sel rgya mtsho chen po ste/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba/ /rdul rnams
77b2(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba'i thabs/ /cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/ /mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang / /shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa/ /snying po chen po las byung ba/ /nyon mongs
77b3(rgyud): bral ba thub par dka'/ /sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam/ /rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can/ /gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang
77b4(rgyud): 'dra/ /rmugs dang smyo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/ /g.yul sel g.yul la 'gyed pa ste/ /g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/ /gsung
77b5(rgyud): bzang ngang ba'i gdangs su bzhad/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/ /dbang po'i las lhag thub dang mnyam/ /chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan/ /rab dga'i
77b6(rgyud): bun long zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skem par mdzad/ /dbang po rgyags pa'i rims nad sel/ /khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms/ /
77b7(rgyud): gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang mnyam/ /mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang / /mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das/ /sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig
78a1(rgyud): byang chub snying po rgya cher rol/ /rim pa rab sten dge ba ste/ /spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/ /gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa/
78a2(rgyud): dag mdzad sreg mdzad mchog sbyin po/ /'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms/ /thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po/ /rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig
78a3(rgyud): snang ba/ /skyes pa bud med chogs kyi bdag /nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/ /sems can 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa/ /brtan po sdig pa rnams dang
78a4(rgyud): bral/ /kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po/ /kun tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/ /kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags/ /mi bzang sa
78a5(rgyud): 'og rnam par dkrugs/ /de bzhin zad mdzad thug par mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs/ /nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad/ /'bar
78a6(rgyud): ba'i dka' ba 'phrog mdzad pa/ /rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms/ /pha rol zhugs pa
78a7(rgyud): sdig sel ba/ /dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ /dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/ /'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa/ /ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams
78b1(rgyud): sbyin/ /longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin pa/ /nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can/ /gzugs bzhin dbang po rnam par rgyal/ /dag cing
78b2(rgyud): dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/ /bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po/ /dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa/ /'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs
78b3(rgyud): par mdzad/ /rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam/ /sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can/ /yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan/ /brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/ /gsung ba
78b4(rgyud): chen po shes rab che/ /sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa/ /mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi/ /theg pa bla na med par ldan/ /mchod pa chen po'i chos che ba/ /'bras bu chen
78b5(rgyud): po'i chos kyi mchog / ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po/ /zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa/ /bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /kun tu rab 'byams sel mdzad pa/ /snying
78b6(rgyud): rje ye shes snying po mkhyen/ /snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs/ /dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad/ /mtsho mchog dang ba rab
78b7(rgyud): mtho ba/ /rtsod chen 'das pa spyod yul can/ /skye rgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i 'byor pa can/ /kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba/ /dga' ba'i dam pa
79a1(rgyud): sbyin pa po/ /kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste/ /zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'/ /dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dkyil 'khor chen
79a2(rgyud): po'i pad+ma lags/ /zla ba lta bur si ma mdzad thabs/ /mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen/ /spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
79a3(rgyud): shes mnga'/ /dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen/ /slob dpon chen po grags pa che/ /dam pa nyid de bla na med/ /gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad/ /de ltar
79a4(rgyud): khyab bdag chen po ni/ /yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas/ /dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs/ /yon tan 'byung ba rig sngags rgyal/ /gtsug na nor bu thogs
79a5(rgyud): la sogs/ /mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang / /sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs/ /kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/ /
79a6(rgyud): ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin/ /mi rnams la la gang zhig gis/ /sdig pa bsal kun tu bzang po la/ /snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na/ /des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang
79a7(rgyud): 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don/ /mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing / /de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi/ /ye shes ma lus smra bar nus/ /de ltar
79b1(rgyud): thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spobs las nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing / /yon tan sna tshogs byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams las/ /bstod pa chen po snang byas
79b2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/ stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan
79b3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya badzra pA Ni aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad
79b4(rgyud): du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la
79b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM ta ka/ ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ de nas gzungs 'di bshad
79b6(rgyud): ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha
79b7(rgyud): zhes 'dzer to/ /lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal
80a1(rgyud): pa/ sdang ba sel ba dang / 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig /rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gi gzungs 'di ni/ /
80a2(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba lags so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang /
80a3(rgyud): dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur
80a4(rgyud): bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs bskyed pa dang / /gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par
80a5(rgyud): bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyi pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / snang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
80a6(rgyud): mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs par
80a7(rgyud): bgyid pa spyod pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid
80b1(rgyud): pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan
80b2(rgyud): la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus
80b3(rgyud): kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
80b4(rgyud): sdang ba dang / byad stems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang / srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus
80b5(rgyud): khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal kha shar phyogs su bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du blta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ /brjod pa tsam
80b6(rgyud): gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing / grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la
80b7(rgyud): srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped pa ni/ /gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so/ /de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas rdo rje 'chad la mtshan
81a1(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje
81a2(rgyud): snying po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che/ /snying rje chen po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te/ /rdo rje sa 'og
81a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa po/ /chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che/ /chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/ /phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste/ /spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/ /
81a4(rgyud): rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che/ /mthon mthing dbu skras brgyan pa lags/ /ral gri sngon po ral gri che/ /dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /mthon ka'i
81a5(rgyud): spyan te dbu sngo ba/ /'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan/ /rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs/ /rdo rje spro ba'i stobs che ba/ /khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che/ /sel mdzad khro
81a6(rgyud): bo'i rgyags pa sel/ /khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod/ /khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad/ /gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni
81a7(rgyud): nges par 'gums/ /dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che/ /'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog rab tu
81b1(rgyud): tu khro/ /sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris/ /gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa/ /bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/ /sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa/ /drag po
81b2(rgyud): chen po rdo rje khro/ /sgyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad/ /gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/ /rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'/ /rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan/ /dam
81b3(rgyud): pa'i ti se lhun po'i rtse/ /gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po/ /spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum/ /rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang
81b4(rgyud): chen mnga' bdag lags/ /na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol/ /mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes/ /srin po srung po drag po ste/ /me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes/ /
81b5(rgyud): nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od/ /'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed/ /grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po/ /rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /mgrin chen mgrin
81b6(rgyud): pa'i mdog sngo ba/ /mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/ /cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/ /ye shes che ldan srung ba che/ /
81b7(rgyud): rlung dmar lags te spyod yul ring / /gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/ /'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa/ /rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /mtshon
82a1(rgyud): cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon/ /'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig /gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug phud gsum/ /'dod
82a2(rgyud): pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan/ /za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad/ /mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa/ /tsham tshom med de srin las byung / /rtag par dkar
82a3(rgyud): dgyes dus 'byor ba/ /rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad/ /rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste/ /bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags/ /baiDUR+ya
82a4(rgyud): ltar dri med sku/ /mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs/ /dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad/ /dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog /lha chen
82a5(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po ste/ /brtan po dpa' bo lham me ba/ /bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod/ /dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /mtshon cha che rdzogs cod pan can/ /
82a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba/ /pad+ma chen po phyag ring ba/ /pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog /nag po chen po 'byung po che/ /gtum chen thog thog chen po
82a7(rgyud): ste/ /rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa/ /rtul phod thub dka' brtson pa ste/ /'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje/ /zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i
82b1(rgyud): mtshon/ /brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan/ /rdo rje lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa/ /rdo rje mdas ni rnam
82b2(rgyud): par sbyong / /rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal/ /ye shes dam pa theg pa che/ /thabs brnyes pa snying rje chen po lags/ /rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/ /
82b3(rgyud): spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po/ /rdo rje dril bu rnam dag sbyan/ /mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen/ /rdo rje chen po mgon po ba/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad/
82b4(rgyud): rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgrog /me tog chun po 'od gsal ba/ /dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras/ /des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/ /sna tshogs can te lha kun
82b5(rgyud): mchog / rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can/ /rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes/ /mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag /bskal pa'i
82b6(rgyud): rlung chen lta bu lags/ /dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang / /rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed/ /gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung / /skyes pa bud med
82b7(rgyud): tshogs dga' ba/ /rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrog /rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /nor bu spras pa'i na
83a1(rgyud): bza' gsol/ /spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan/ /dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/ /rgyal
83a2(rgyud): po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dbang phyug chen po grags pa che/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po/ /dbu
83a3(rgyud): rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /de nas rdo rje
83a4(rgyud): don yod pas gsungs pa/ rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung / /sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa/ /ming
83a5(rgyud): ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ /dad pas gang zhig 'chang byed pa/ /grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ /lag na rdo rje stobs
83a6(rgyud): po che/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/ /de ni sdig pa kun las grol/ /ngan 'gro
83a7(rgyud): kun las thar par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di/ /su zhig nangs par langs nas brjod/ /rgyal po blon po grong khyer pa/ /gnyen rnams kyang ni dga'
83b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa/ /'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang / /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod
83b2(rgyud): pa dam pa bzhin/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom
83b3(rgyud): med/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang / /zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /shes rab can ni
83b4(rgyud): gang zhig gis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang / /bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /nges par gnas
83b5(rgyud): shing gtsang mar 'don/ /mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
83b6(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya many+dzu shrI ku mA ra b+hU tASh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
83b7(rgyud): pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i
84a1(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang
84a2(rgyud): bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang
84a3(rgyud): rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan
84a4(rgyud): song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa bi tsi tra/ muk+ta dA ma/ a laM kr-i ta sha rA ra/
84a5(rgyud): pa ra ma sa twa mo tsa ka/ ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma koSha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma/ la ba d+ha/ bi dza ya/ su ra ta/ sam+b+ho ga u pa de sha ka/ kle sha ga par pra sha ma ka/ shU n+ya tA swa
84a6(rgyud): b+hA ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra/ ba ra Na/ ba ra Na da da/ oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma sa man+ta b+ha dra/ sa man+ta san+d+ha ra/ sa man+ta A
84a7(rgyud): ka ra/ man+ta pra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ he he many+dzu ra ba/ ma hA badzra/ ma hA khaD+ga/ ts+tshi ts+tshi b+hin+da/ bi ra dza bi ra ja/ karma a ba ga ma ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru
84b1(rgyud): d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA ma hA ma hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ho/ b+hI ma b+hI ma/ na da na da/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/ mo
84b2(rgyud): tsa ya/ ma ma na tha/ ma nu sr-i ta/ a pA ya duHkhaM/ su khaM da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ /a na thou0f85haM/ duHkhi tou0f85haM/ sa ra dzo u0f85haM/ u pa dru to u0f85haM/ a bi bik+to u0f85haM/ ku sI d
84b3(rgyud): +ho u0f85haM/ me ra Na d+harmo u0f85haM/ taM b+ha ga wA na/ duHkhi ta nAM/ su khaM da dA/ a nA thA nAM/ sa nA thA ka ra/ sa ra dza saM/ bA ra dza ska ra/ u pa dru tA nAM/ swa ro pa dra ba/ pra
84b4(rgyud): sha ma ka/ sa bi bi ga tA nAM/ ku sha la sam+b+ha ra/ pa ri pu ra yi tA/ ku si d+hA nAM/ ma hA bIR+ya d+ha ta/ ma ra Na d+ha rmi Na/ ma mi ta pa dA dA tA/ mam bi b+ha ga wA na/ nA tho b+ha
84b5(rgyud): ba/ sha ra NAM/ pa ra yA nAM/ tra tA/ sarba duHkhA ni me pra sha ma ya/ sa rba kla sha ra dzi si mi/ a ba na ye/ sarba saM swa ro ba drab/ duHkha ni me/ nA sha ya/ sarba ku
84b6(rgyud): sha la/ d+harma pa ri pu ra me ku ru/ sarba karma A ba ra Na/ kle sha pa ra tA me bi ka ri/ /ma hA bo d+hi sa twa si bi d+hi/ bI R+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo gam+me san+ni yo dza ya/ A ba ra
84b7(rgyud): Na d+ha rma bi rA ga bi ra dza/ sany+tsa ha/ pra dza ha/ d+ha ri Ni/ sa ma kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+hi sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa pa ra da swA hA/ rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di/ /
85a1(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /de ma thag tu sems can rnams/ /skye dang rga ba zad par gyur/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur
85a2(rgyud): nas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/ /log 'dren rnams ni skrag par 'gyur/ /sdig pa zhi ba byed pa yi/ /gzungs
85a3(rgyud): 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang / /grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/ /'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ /'jam pa'i
85a4(rgyud): dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing / /gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na/ /brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ /sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos//
85a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams/ /stobs
85a6(rgyud): bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smra/ /lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ /gang na rdo rje ral
85a7(rgyud): gri cha/ /de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/ /shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/ /bgegs
85b1(rgyud): kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/ /sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang / /sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/ /
85b2(rgyud): drag po drag po rab 'joms pa/ /gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/ /dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe/ /rdo rje can de snying sbyong ba/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib
85b3(rgyud): sel/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/ /skye rgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/ /gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad/ /mdzes
85b4(rgyud): pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/ /spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ /dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs te
85b5(rgyud): rab tu bzhad/ /dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags/ /rab tu dka' ba ston par dga'/ /rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /rgya
85b6(rgyud): mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can/ /tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/ /sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /cha lugs sngo las skyong ba/ /lha yi bdag po
85b7(rgyud): dga' bar mdzad/ /'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel brtan/ /rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/ /brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/ /yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad//
86a1(rgyud): btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/ /rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags/ /stobs po cha la shugs che ba/ /phyag ring g.yul chen
86a2(rgyud): mnga' ba po/ /sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/ /'dzem shes rab srung ngo tsha shes/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog /dkyil 'khor chen por ston pa po/ /dkyil
86a3(rgyud): 'khor chen por grags pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang
86a4(rgyud): ldan/ /ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/ /mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam/ /hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/ /lha
86a5(rgyud): dang lha min rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis/ /zham 'bring gad rgyangs chen po can/ /rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad/ /'jig rten
86a6(rgyud): gsum du snyan par grags/ /gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/ /drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/ /'dzum zhing
86a7(rgyud): sgeg par kun tu spyod/ /spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/ /nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba/ /nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs
86b1(rgyud): bzhin/ /tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/ /nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid
86b2(rgyud): sbyin/ /gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa/ /dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri/ /kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/ /'dus pa'i nang du gdan
86b3(rgyud): gshegs pa/ /zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ /dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i
86b4(rgyud): sgron/ /rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/ /ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/ /dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /'jigs
86b5(rgyud): pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa/ /dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba/ /mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/ /ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin cha lugs rab tu
86b6(rgyud): ston/ /shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/ /stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/ /byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen/ /rnam par grags pa gsan pa des/ /
86b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los bsgyur/ /'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/ /de
87a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste/ /zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha min bcas
87a2(rgyud): pas bkur/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/ /sems can kun la rab ston pa/ /brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog /sems can kun gyi blo la
87a3(rgyud): mkhas/ /sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/ /me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/ byis pa'i sku mchog sbyin pa/ /rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/ /phyag rgya mdzad
87a4(rgyud): cing gsang sngags mdzad/ /bdag gir mi mdzad rdul med brtan/ /mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa/ /bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/ /mi mchog
87a5(rgyud): brtson pa bskyod du med/ /de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/ /brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/ /'joms med tshig
87a6(rgyud): bzang cha lugs bzang / /dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'joms/ /tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs/ /mgon
87a7(rgyud): po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog / gshin rje pham mdzad skye rgu srung / /las dang nyon mongs rab sreg pa/ /ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/ /legs pa khyod
87b1(rgyud): kyi mchog gi mtshan/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing / /dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di/ /lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/ /bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren
87b2(rgyud): dang / /gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang / /mdangs 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis/ /de ring legs par bstod par gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab/ /bsgyings
87b3(rgyud): pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur/ /de dag kun la bltas nas kyang / /'di skad du ni tshig smras pa/ /khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing / /nges legs thar pa thob
87b4(rgyud): gyur la/ /'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig /de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing / /'brug chen sgra ltar sgrog pa yi/ /
87b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/ /shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/ /sems can gti mug
87b6(rgyud): bsal ba'i phyir/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/ /shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur/ /kye ma bsod nams cher bcas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni
87b7(rgyud): rab spyad phyir/ /dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/ /'dzum pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad/ /la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel
88a1(rgyud): ba yi/ /grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am/ /yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung / /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing / /sdug
88a2(rgyud): bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang / /ring por
88a3(rgyud): mi thogs de yis 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ /rab dga' shin tu dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon
88a4(rgyud): du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sa chen dam pa de dag kyang / /gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi/ /sems can chen
88a5(rgyud): pos mi thogs par/ /tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang / /sems can kun la sdug pa dang / /spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/ /
88a6(rgyud): byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zhi byed pa/ /bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad
88a7(rgyud): yid 'ong 'di/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nang bar langs nas su brjod pa/ /
88b1(rgyud): de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang / /de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun
88b2(rgyud): dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang / /de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/ /de la nges par srung bar byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing / /mnyam
88b3(rgyud): par gzhag pa snang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dang /dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yi/ /rgyang ma dag nas
88b4(rgyud): phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/ /'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/ /lan gcig bklags na tshangs chen dang / /bsod nams mnyam
88b5(rgyud): par thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/ /nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas pa/ /dri ma med cing rab dag la/ /rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / sems
88b6(rgyud): can thams cad dga' ba yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob/ /mtshungs pa med cing stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang / /'od gsal dam tshig can gyi
88b7(rgyud): lha rnams kyis bstod cing / /yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi// gzungs 'di rgyal pa rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam
89a1(rgyud): dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya sarba ni ba ra Na bi skaM b+hi nI nA maSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra NI
89a2(rgyud): man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
89a3(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mri ta/ bin+du dza ba/ ma hA su kha swA hA/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
89a4(rgyud): mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ /yon tan
89a5(rgyud): rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di byung bas sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ /gang la la
89a6(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di thos pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la'i rna
89a7(rgyud): lam du grags par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/ /tshes bco lnga
89b1(rgyud): la smyung bar 'dug cing / /gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la bskor
89b2(rgyud): ba byas nas/ bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar
89b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston
89b4(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / /nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas rdo rje me tog
89b5(rgyud): t hod chen pos gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te byang chub sems dpa' chen po
89b6(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/ /byang chub sems dpa'
89b7(rgyud): tshul che ba/ nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ /chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing / /
90a1(rgyud): nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing / /theg pa gcig pu'i
90a2(rgyud): tshul gcig pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/ /theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /snang ba chen por snang ba brnyes/ /yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten
90a3(rgyud): bdag / zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /theg pa chen po dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing / /rdo rje'i dkyil
90a4(rgyud): 'khor rnam grangs pa/ /rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/ /dar ba che po nyon mongs choms/ /bgegs thub gshin rje
90a5(rgyud): thub pa ste/ /rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zla ba chen po nyi ma che/ /lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/ /lha chen mgon po chen po ste/ /'byor pa chen po khyod
90a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing / /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/ /rnam sel khyod la phyag
90a7(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste/ chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags/ /ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/ /sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal
90b1(rgyud): lo/ /sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/ /ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bstan pa gnas
90b2(rgyud): dbang bdag po ste/ /bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ /yangs pa dri med shes rab can/ /snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/ /zhi
90b3(rgyud): ba 'jig rten dag par mdzad/ /ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/ /dpa' btsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/ /'khor
90b4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/ /zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba /chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/ /bde 'gror gnas pa
90b5(rgyud): dri ma med/ /rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen/ /nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtse mo yangs pa rnam par grags/ /sngags chen mang pos 'dul
90b6(rgyud): mdzad pa/ /snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog /dkon mchog
90b7(rgyud): gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/ /rnam gsum mkhyen pa brnyes pa'i bdag /rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi/ /'byor pa
91a1(rgyud): brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/ /bskal pa dag ni grangs med par/ /tshogs chen bsags khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa la gnas
91a2(rgyud): pa sa chen brnyes/ /sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/ /ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes
91a3(rgyud): pa/ /nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel/ /ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/ /mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mgon po chen po snang ba che/ /
91a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/ /zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/ /yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/ /chos
91a5(rgyud): kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs/ /dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa/ /rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chen po dri med mchog /rdo rje mtshon
91a6(rgyud): bsnams sdig mi mnga'/ /nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan/ /ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa/ /sel
91a7(rgyud): ba po ste dri ma sbyong / /shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/ /sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang //
91b1(rgyud): rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/ /rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen chen po rin chen blo/ /rin chen rdo rje'i 'od che ba/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung / /
91b2(rgyud): rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes shing / /ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/ /stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan/ /stong nyid mchog
91b3(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/ /dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/ /chos gcig las byung snang ba po/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul
91b4(rgyud): chen lags/ /'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/ /'jig rten chos las snang bar 'das/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/ /brgyan par mdzad pa
91b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag / nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste/ /phyag chen skye bo kun la phan/ /sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
91b6(rgyud): dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod pa/ /dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog /dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/ /dga' ba ldan pa khyod phyag 'tshal//
91b7(rgyud): sgeg chen 'dzin cing dgongs par ldan/ /rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan/ /rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog /sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
92a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i mchog / rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /bla med mchog khyod
92a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa
92a3(rgyud): brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /rdo rje bstan pa rnam grags pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i
92a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ba/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /'di dag so sor rjod byed na/ /de ni nyes pa kun zlog cing / /rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / /nang par langs
92a5(rgyud): nas gtsang ma yis/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/
92a6(rgyud): nang par langs nas rjod byed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su btang / /sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang / /de bzhin
92a7(rgyud): bsod nams 'phel ba dang / /ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing / /sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/ /ming brgya rtsa
92b1(rgyud): brgyad mchog 'don pa/ /des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/ /gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni/ /rdo rje dkyil
92b2(rgyud): 'khor bstan pa la/ /ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas
92b3(rgyud): pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya k+Shi ti gar+b+ha aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i
92b4(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM
92b5(rgyud): suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha /ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha badzra satwa swA hA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
92b6(rgyud): dam pa ni/ /ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur/ /sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras/ /skal ldan chen po legs so legs//
92b7(rgyud): sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas/ /khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing / /yon tan dpag med mchog skyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang / /nyes pa zlog byed thos
93a1(rgyud): pa 'di/ /'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na/ /nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te/ /ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag /'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos
93a2(rgyud): bzhin/ /lus can dag las su yang rung / /khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa/ /de dag las ni gcig tsam yang / /byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /
93a3(rgyud): mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog /thos nas mos par byed pa dang / /nges par yon tan thams cad kyang / /thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /
93a4(rgyud): de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/ /langs tes yi dbang phyug po/ /sa yi snying po sa mchog la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/ /sa yi snying po gtso bo
93a5(rgyud): che/ /glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /cod pan can te sa brnyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog /rig ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas/ /
93a6(rgyud): gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po/ /gzhi bcas ldan pa'i klung gi tshul/ /swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma'i mchog /snying po snying po mkhyen
93a7(rgyud): par grags/ /gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol/ /sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs can/ /sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan/ /'bras bu mngon sum ston pa
93b1(rgyud): po/ /rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/ /snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med/ /mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba/ /shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs/ /
93b2(rgyud): 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing / /gar stabs chen po ston pa po/ /ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra/ /nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa/ /nyi ma
93b3(rgyud): chen po nyid yin te/ /dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor/ /yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod
93b4(rgyud): che/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho/ /yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog /thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/ /
93b5(rgyud): theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med/ /mchod pa chen po sgra che ba/ /zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /rdo rje 'chang chen mtshon brgya pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
93b6(rgyud): me tog thod/ /blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/ /pad+ma chen po stobs po che/ /sngags 'chang chen po stobs cher ldan/ /sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags/ /lag na
93b7(rgyud): rdo rje yon tan nges/ /nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan/ /mnyam nyid 'byams la longs spyod pa/ /rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can/ /rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan/ /sa yi
94a1(rgyud): bdag po lhun po bzhin/ /sa la longs spyod longs spyod che/ /mtshon cha g.yo ba phun tshun tshogs/ /rab 'byams snod ni rnam
94a2(rgyud): par grags/ /smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa/ /spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/ /me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings/ /spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/ /brtan
94a3(rgyud): po brtan la bde sbyin pa/ /ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste/ /gangs can lhun po lta bu lags/ /dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang / /btsan po khyab
94a4(rgyud): 'jug stobs dbang phyug / 'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs/ /de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can/ /rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa/ /dgyes pa
94a5(rgyud): na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /gzigs pa ring pa spyan yangs pa/ /nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med/ /thogs pa mi dpog rin chen gtsug /srid
94a6(rgyud): gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu/ /dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal/ /dag pa gtsang ma gso sbyong can/ /rnam par gnon pa yul las 'das/ /ljang mdog
94a7(rgyud): skyabs mdzad snying rje che/ /stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba/ /bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo seng+ge 'jigs par byed/ /sdang ba rnams kyi snying
94b1(rgyud): 'joms pa/ /mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan/ /dga' ba rgyal cher rab 'byung ba/ /rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen/ /rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags/
94b2(rgyud): rgyal po rigs mchod skyed pa'i rten/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /mngon par 'phags pa
94b3(rgyud): khyad par mchog / mgrin bzang nad dang bral ba lags/ /skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /sgrol pa smin mdzad sdud par
94b4(rgyud): mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud/ /rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas/ /rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten/ /grub pa sbyin pa rnam
94b5(rgyud): dag mchog / tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po/ /dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste/ /'od zer ljang gu'i 'od dang 'dra/ /ser la na bza' ser po mnabs/ /dkyil
94b6(rgyud): 'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan/ /spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/ /nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba/ /rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa
94b7(rgyud): dri ma med/ /sku yang dag cing na bza' dag /dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan/ /dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste/ /'byung ldan sreg pa sel mdzad pa/ /'khor ba
95a1(rgyud): zad mdzad shes rab can/ /tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che/ /'byung
95a2(rgyud): ldan rab 'byams shes rab can/ /ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba/ /sa yi snying po snying po che/ /rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren/ /dpag tu med pa dpag med
95a3(rgyud): rdzogs/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas/ /zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/ /dga' dad dang ba skyed pa ste//
95a4(rgyud): ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba/ /rlung gi drag shul lta bur grags/ /drag po lags te drag sel gtsang / /rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la zhi/ /rgyal ba'i dpal
95a5(rgyud): mdzad dga' bar mdzad/ /lhun po ti se ma la yas/ /spyod yul zab mo non pa ste/ /rin chen rdo rje snying po che/ /sa gzhi spyod yul mnga' ba lags/ /rin chen
95a6(rgyud): brag las byung ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lhur dgyes pa/ /shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/ /rab gsal
95a7(rgyud): dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/ /phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpas bstod
95b1(rgyud): nas ni/ /rdo rje sa gsum dbang mchog smras/ /yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing / /nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan/ /sa
95b2(rgyud): yi steng na ngas ma mthong / /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste/ /sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / /dri ma kun bral yon tan des//
95b3(rgyud): de phyir sgrim pa thams cad kyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di/ /rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa
95b4(rgyud): 'di/ /bsam pa kun dang 'byor ba yi/ /gnas mchog bla na med pa ste/ /dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yi/ /yid ni shin tu dang ba yis/ /sa yi snying po mtshan
95b5(rgyud): gsal ba/ /'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/ /yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang / /dpal yon rgya char 'dzin pa yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /mi ni gang
95b6(rgyud): zhig rjod byed pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las myur du grol/ /'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya many+dzu shrI shri nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM /bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
96a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /mtshan
96a2(rgyud): rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi/ /gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ /gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs/ /'jam dpal
96a3(rgyud): dpal gyi dam pa lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral/ /mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung / /sku gsung 'phrin las bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi
96a4(rgyud): khyab/ /stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can/ /stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa nyid la lhag par mos/ /srid pa gsum po stong par ston/ /thams cad
96a5(rgyud): mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /sa rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /ngan
96a6(rgyud): 'gro kun dang de bzhin du/ /mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms/ /phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa/ /smra ba'i seng+ge mi yi mchog /dul zhing nyon mongs
96a7(rgyud): dgra rnams dang / /sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'/ /sems can thams cad yongs su skyob/ /grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa/ /ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs
96b1(rgyud): can/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams/ /dag cing dag pa rnams dang ldan/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga'
96b2(rgyud): bdag mdzad/ /pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma can/ /pad+ma'i ze ba'i kha dog 'dra/ /bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad+ma lags/ /gtsang ma ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /bsam dag
96b3(rgyud): zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes/ /bden pa bzhi dag
96b4(rgyud): ston pa po/ /'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'/ /khyod ni dbang phyug skye rgu'i bdag /khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams/ /kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso/ /khyod
96b5(rgyud): ni khyu mchog skye rgu'i gtso/ /thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs/ /rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa/ /rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs/ /'od zer stong ldan
96b6(rgyud): nyi ma khyod/ /zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod/ /rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags/ /dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod/ /klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod/ /de bzhin
96b7(rgyud): sde dpon skem byed lags/ /lha min dbang po thags bzang ris/ /mig dmar gza' lag pa sangs/ /spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags/ /lha rnams kun gyis phyag
97a1(rgyud): bgyis pa/ /'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog /'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig /ye shes
97a2(rgyud): can gyi dam mchog pa/ /dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs/ /bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi brdzi/ /kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun
97a3(rgyud): tu grags/ /khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog /blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan/ /blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags/ /
97a4(rgyud): khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing / /byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan/ /rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /lus can kun gyi mchog tu
97a5(rgyud): gyur/ /yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa/ /sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod/ /khyod ni mjug ring gza' mchog lags/ /khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog /
97a6(rgyud): khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo lags/ /ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin/ /khyod ni
97a7(rgyud): nam mkha' sa chu bzhin/ /khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu/ /khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad/ /'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis
97b1(rgyud): pa/ /rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa/ /oM wA kye daM na ma swA hA/ ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang / /rig sngags
97b2(rgyud): bcas par 'dzin na ni/ /sdig gyur rnam dag rab tu thob/ /brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan/ /skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa/ /de 'dod bsam rgu yid bzhin
97b3(rgyud): du/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni/ /mtshams med skal pa mnyam pa yi/ /las rnams mi bzad gang byas
97b4(rgyud): pa/ /de dag thams cad myur du 'byang / /'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang / 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ /sems can dag pas dran byas na/ /'jam
97b5(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pas dran byas te/ /nges par gnas nas su klog pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang / /thob 'gyur 'di la
97b6(rgyud): the tshom med/ / //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mai tri pra
97b7(rgyud): ti dz+nyA nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba byams
98a1(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ /na mo b+ha ga wa te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/
98a2(rgyud): oM a dzi te a dzi te/ a pA rA dzi te/ a dzi tany+dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ mai tri a ba lo ki te/ ka ra ka ra/ ma hA sa ma ya sid+d+hi/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hI maN+Da bi dze/ sma
98a3(rgyud): ra sma ra/ Asma kaM sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM mo hi mo hi/ ma hA mo hi swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM mu ni mu ni sma ra swA hA/ nye ba'i
98a4(rgyud): snying po'o/ /gzugs 'di nyan pa tsam dang / /klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la sems pa dang / bsgoms pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe
98a5(rgyud): b dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal
98a6(rgyud): bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i ri dwags dang / bya rnams
98a7(rgyud): kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/ /'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan
98b1(rgyud): song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ /ngan song gi dri mas kyang mi gos so/ /mi'i mngal du yang mi skye'o/ /lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /
98b2(rgyud): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsam zhing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
98b3(rgyud): kyang sems can de bskyud par mi bgyi lags so/ /nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas de ji ltar gyur kyang rung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
98b4(rgyud): byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA
98b5(rgyud): Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos ki shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dzam+b+ha la nA ya aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/ bod skad du/
98b6(rgyud): 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po/ /gser dag gis
98b7(rgyud): ni legs par brgyan/ /rin chen gyis ni rab mdzes shing / /me ni shin tu 'bar 'dra ba/ /lcang lo can du bzhugs nas kyang / /gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /zhabs gnyis
99a1(rgyud): la ni rab 'jus nas/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag dris ba ni/ /bcom ldan gnod 'dzin rgyal dbang po/ /gsang sngags tshogs ni kun
99a2(rgyud): gyi bdag / rig sngags 'chang rnams kun gyis mchod/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pas/ /ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan
99a3(rgyud): ldan/ /mgon po sems can kun don mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'dzin/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis
99a4(rgyud): su/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir/ /bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de/ /mi rnams nor ni nyung ba dang / /bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba/ /mthong
99a5(rgyud): nas sdug bsngal chen po yis/ /rab tu gzir to gsang ba'i bdag /de nas gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas/ /bcom ldan gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag /snying rjes
99a6(rgyud): non te smras pa ni/ /legs par nyon cig gsang ba pa/ /mgon po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa/ /dbul po'i nyon mongs
99a7(rgyud): sel ba po/ /nor ro cog gi dbang phyug gi /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan/ /dbul ba'i nyes sdig sel byed pa/ /gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi/ /rgyal
99b1(rgyud): mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa/ /'od zer brgya pa zhes pa yi/ /zhing na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i zhal/ /chos ston pa na bdag gis kyang / /de ni rang gis sngon thos
99b2(rgyud): te/ /dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan/ /de ni bdag gi shes rab kyis/ /sems can kun don brtson pa po/ /khyod la legs par bstan par bya/ /khyod ni
99b3(rgyud): mnyam bzhag rab tu nyon/ /'phags pa lha dang lha min bla/ /shes rab ldan zhing chos la gus/ /snying brtse'i bdag nyid bzod ldan brtan/ /dbang po zhi ba dbang po
99b4(rgyud): thul/ /dge bas sdig 'joms shes nyen can/ /nges shing don kun sgrub pa po/ /mi gnang mi slu dpal dang ldan/ /mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /dkon mchog
99b5(rgyud): gsum gyi skyabs gcig pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa po/ /gter rnams skyong ba gzi brjid can/ /rtag sbyin nor ni 'phel byed pa/ /rin chen 'byung
99b6(rgyud): gnas skye bo 'dul/ /chu yi bdag po chu 'bebs pa/ /gnod sbyin chu spyod bdag nyid can/ /gter don nye bar ston pa po/ /gser gyi ri bo lhun po ste/ /dbul
99b7(rgyud): ba'i gdon las thar byed pa/ /dbang po nye dbang 'gro ba'i mgon/ /chu yi dbang po sprin mdog can/ /'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten bla/ /nyi ma zla ba ther zug pa/ /nor
100a1(rgyud): chen rgyal po chen po ste/ /lag na ne'u le rab gnas pa/ /gzhon nu seng+ge tog can te/ /gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /tshig gi
100a2(rgyud): bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa/ /gsong por snyan par smra ba po/ /bram ze 'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste/ /che ba don grub grub pas mchod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba
100a3(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur/ /ku be ra dang mi la zhon/ /bum pa'i lto can mig yangs pa/ /lha yi dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs/ /khyab bdag bde 'byung nor bzang
100a4(rgyud): sras/ /sems can rnams ni skyong la dga'/ /'dod rgyur sgyur gzugs yid kyi lha/ /cod pan can de rigs dga' ba/ /g.yon phyogs cod pan lag pa
100a5(rgyud): dbyug / lag pa brgya pa stobs po che/ /sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yul ba/ /zla ba nya ba'i zhal mdog can/ /ded dpon tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ gnas brtan
100a6(rgyud): tshong pa skal ba bzang / /yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang / /dpag bsam ljon shing mi yi bdag /mchog don 'os pa gtso bo ste/ /mchog sbyin mi'u thung
100a7(rgyud): khyab 'jug pa/ /skyabs 'os bkra shis srung ba po/ /rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /lha yi seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi
100b1(rgyud): bdag / rab tu dar ba nor mi zad/ /seng+ge'i rtsal gyi mthu rtsal can/ /ston pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /gtso bo tshong pa rigs kyi mchog /pad+ma'i lte ba thub
100b2(rgyud): med rgyal/ /tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che/ /gnod 'dzin bdag nyid che ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ngas bshad 'di/ /sdig pa thams cad 'joms byed cing / /dbul
100b3(rgyud): ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa/ /'byor dang skal bzang skyed pa po/ /glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rmi lam ngan/ /ltas ngan sel bar byed pa
100b4(rgyud): ste/ /nags sam gal te grong dang ni/ /dur khrod yang na ri yang rung / /mkhas pa gang na klog pa dar/ /g.yul dang dgra ni nyam nga ba/ /sbrul dang me chu chom
100b5(rgyud): rkun sogs/ /stag dang dom dang 'jigs pa che/ /rgya mtsho bgrod dka' mi bzang las/ /me ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dbang po me dang chu lha dang / /gshin rje srin
100b6(rgyud): bdag rlung lha dang / /nor sbyin dpal ldan ku be ra/ /nor bu bzang sras lnga rtsen dang / /rtse mo can dang 'brog gnas dang / /lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang / /
100b7(rgyud): g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du/ /rab tu dga' bzhin srung bar byed/ /gang na ming 'di klog pa der/ /glang chen rta dang ba lang dang / /lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
101a1(rgyud): 'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel/ /mi nad dang ni 'go ba'i nad/ /gnod pa kun las byung ba rnams/ /thams cad du ni bde
101a2(rgyud): legs 'gyur/ /lhag par byis pa rnams la shis/ /de la yi dwags klu rnams dang / /ma mo dang ni gdon drag dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang mi'am ci/ /srin
101a3(rgyud): po rnams kyang 'chi mi byed/ /nad do cog las rnam par grol/ /de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan/ /bu dag dang ni tsha bo dang / /dpal dang gtong ba rnams kyis/
101a4(rgyud): rgyas/ /rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang / /longs spyod chen po'i nang du skye/ /tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang / /nad mang rigs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs
101a5(rgyud): kun tu skye ba dran/ /lobs skyen thos pa 'dzin pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/ /skal ba bzang po nyid du 'gyur/ phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal
101a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin rje/ /gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal te/ /ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po/ /lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /sems can dad la mnyes gshin pa/ /
101a7(rgyud): nor bzang sras kyi grags pa 'di/ /dbul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa/ /rab tu bshad pa legs par gsungs/ /don kun grub pa gsang ba'i sngags/ /bdag gis kyang
101b1(rgyud): ni 'dir dbul te/ /de ni legs par dran tsam gyis/ /me ni dbul las grol 'gyur zhing / /gzhan gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur/ /dgra rnams kyis kyang mi tshor
101b2(rgyud): zhing / /skal pa bzang dang skal dang ldan/ /lo brgya yang ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /lha yi glang po rin chen dang / /rgyal dang rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang / /nges par myur du
101b3(rgyud): thob 'gyur te/ /rgyal srid kyang ni the tshom med/ /na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya/ /ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ /oM hrIM hrAM k+ShA dzrIM hrIM hrAM/ dIpa bya rat+nau ga pa ri sha na a ta
101b4(rgyud): wA ka de ba yak+Sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hiHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA
101b5(rgyud): TI ya su traM nA ma ma hA sU traM/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
