101b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
101b7(rgyud): ba bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /
102a1(rgyud): g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang bcom
102a2(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
102a3(rgyud): bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
102a4(rgyud): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa'
102a5(rgyud): chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la'ang bdag ni
102a6(rgyud): skyabs su mchi/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon
102a7(rgyud): pa dag dang / nags 'dab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa
102b1(rgyud): gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ /gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang
102b2(rgyud): dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das
102b3(rgyud): kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni/ ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen
102b4(rgyud): rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas
102b5(rgyud): pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo
102b6(rgyud): rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang ba la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
102b7(rgyud): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang
103a1(rgyud): bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / ku
103a2(rgyud): tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya chen gsol to/ /skye bo gang
103a3(rgyud): dag gtong phod cing / phra ma mchis ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa legs/ /gang gi char la brten nas
103a4(rgyud): ni/ /de na nyi mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal
103a5(rgyud): chen gegs dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /dri za

110b3(rgyud): mngag gzhug pa'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis
110b4(rgyud): par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob
110b5(rgyud): ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
110b6(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa
110b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te las srul bo'am/ lus srul mo'am/ lus srul rgan po'am/
111a1(rgyud): lus srul rgan mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ lus srul
111a2(rgyud): po'i 'khor mo'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma'am/ 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la
111a3(rgyud): zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir
111a4(rgyud): mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig
111a5(rgyud): ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ A pe ne ba ha ni/ ma hA na ba tI ya swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin
111a6(rgyud): chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra d+h+wa
111a7(rgyud): dza skye rgu'i bdag / dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser
111b1(rgyud): can gang po dang / /seng ldeng ma dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang
111b2(rgyud): ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags//
111b3(rgyud): de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go
111b4(rgyud): bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i
111b5(rgyud): mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi le/ kIrti mU le/ hi li kIrti mU le/ oM tum+be tum+be/
111b6(rgyud): oM tum+be tum+be/ oM g+he mo g+he/ go de hi/ b+h+riM ga re/ ri Shi sat+ta me swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
111b7(rgyud): ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / /srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur pa 'di nyid rgya
112a1(rgyud): cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po'am/ gnod sbyin
112a2(rgyud): rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug
112a3(rgyud): pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng dam/ nye bar mchis par
112a4(rgyud): gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas
112a5(rgyud): mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
112a6(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung pa dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag
112a7(rgyud): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ srin po rgan po'am/ srin po rgan mo'am/ srin
112b1(rgyud): po'i bu pho'am/ srin po'i bu mo'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma'am/
112b2(rgyud): 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la srin po rnams kyi srin
112b3(rgyud): po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags
112b4(rgyud): so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hU lu hU lu/ yu me yu me la/ yu mI la ba trI ye swA hA/ de nas rgyal po rnam
112b5(rgyud): thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
112b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan
112b7(rgyud): mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
113a1(rgyud): pa/ dge slong dag /mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / /g.yog 'khor
113a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / nga
113a3(rgyud): ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus
113a4(rgyud): rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
113a5(rgyud): gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
113a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /btsun pa/ bcom
113a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags 'dabs dag dang / bas
113b1(rgyud): mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la
113b2(rgyud): mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
113b3(rgyud): gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
113b4(rgyud): rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni/ ches mang lags te/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang /
113b5(rgyud): dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi
113b6(rgyud): ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun
113b7(rgyud): tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing
114a1(rgyud): kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dang /ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi
114a2(rgyud): gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
114a3(rgyud): nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba
114a4(rgyud): 'di nyid rgya cher gsol te/ skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing / /phra ma mchis ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa
114a5(rgyud): lags/ /gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ /des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs
114a6(rgyud): de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu
114a7(rgyud): dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/
114b1(rgyud): de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs
114b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /
114b3(rgyud): rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad
114b4(rgyud): bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal ni phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol
114b5(rgyud): mchi/ /de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na yi
114b6(rgyud): dwags zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /
114b7(rgyud): rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes bo zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum
115a1(rgyud): rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig
115a2(rgyud): de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis
115a3(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis
115a4(rgyud): khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du
115a5(rgyud): thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan
115a6(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan
115a7(rgyud): pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /des na mtsho chen
115b1(rgyud): zab mo ni/ /shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /skye bo rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa
115b2(rgyud): ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /klu
115b3(rgyud): rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /
115b4(rgyud): lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod
115b5(rgyud): la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /
115b6(rgyud): khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol
115b7(rgyud): cig / sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon
116a1(rgyud): par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes pa/ /gang
116a2(rgyud): na mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing / /de dag mo rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol yang 'chang bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa
116a3(rgyud): dang / /nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing / /zas su sA lu kha dog dang / /dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / /dri dang me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba
116a4(rgyud): 'tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/ /tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/ /gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman dag 'khrungs par 'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs de
116a5(rgyud): mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/
116a6(rgyud): glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi yongs bskor cing / /gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu
116a7(rgyud): dang ni bcu dang gcig / de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de
116b1(rgyud): dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skye mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis
116b2(rgyud): phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshol ba/ /de skad yang
116b3(rgyud): dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan
116b4(rgyud): pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi/ /de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags
116b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /
116b6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug
116b7(rgyud): pa/ /gnod sbyin 'dod rgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni/ chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang /
117a1(rgyud): ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya ba dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la
117a2(rgyud): che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /chibs rta
117a3(rgyud): dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig
117a4(rgyud): gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /gnod sbyin 'dod rgur mchi ba rnams/ /bzhon pa de dag
117a5(rgyud): 'tshal nas ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang /
117a6(rgyud): kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi
117a7(rgyud): ba dag lags so/ /byang phyogs na mtsho ka bi bang+ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer gsar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang /
117b1(rgyud): gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so/ /chab rgyun mang po'i gnas rgyur pa/ /'dzin pa
117b2(rgyud): zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ /btsun pa/ grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus
117b3(rgyud): gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can/ /rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/ /btsun
117b4(rgyud): pa/ grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni/ gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/ /
117b5(rgyud): rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang dang / /'jigs rung lto sbu can dag mchis/ /de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag /rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / /khu byug sgra skad chen po
117b6(rgyud): dang / /shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /kau kum+b+ha dang tshun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la
117b7(rgyud): dga'/ /lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/ /pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa/ /grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud
118a1(rgyud): na mchis lags so/ /bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni/ khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni/ rnam thos kyi
118a2(rgyud): bu zhes bgyi lags sa/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i le mi le/ ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hu du me/

125b2(rgyud): lang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal pa dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa
125b3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong ba dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzang dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang /
125b4(rgyud): rnam par dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang / pad+ma ka dang /
125b5(rgyud): mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / bal li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla
125b6(rgyud): ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug ring dang / mgo bo che dang / pim+bi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi
125b7(rgyud): chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sdong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang /
126a1(rgyud): dri med gzi brjid dang / mig bzang dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul
126a2(rgyud): can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen po
126a3(rgyud): dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang / dpal
126a4(rgyud): gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug
126a5(rgyud): rgyal po dang / khro med dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpa' dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gdugs dang / ang gi ra'i gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can
126a6(rgyud): dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyad lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang /
126a7(rgyud): gser dad can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug drag dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par
126b1(rgyud): g.yo dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug sgrog dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang //
126b2(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu
126b3(rgyud): bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
126b4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
126b5(rgyud): dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang /
126b6(rgyud): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i lnga ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig
126b7(rgyud): gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs
127a1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
127a2(rgyud): snyed kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad
127a3(rgyud): dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las
127a4(rgyud): rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrangs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam
127a5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin
127a6(rgyud): phyogs kun gyi rgyun tu mngon par phyogs pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod
127a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
127b1(rgyud): mchod par bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho'i sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod
127b2(rgyud): d u med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du
127b3(rgyud): rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams
127b4(rgyud): dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya
127b5(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston
127b6(rgyud): pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrog pa'i rol mo'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nam mkha'i
127b7(rgyud): dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/
128a1(rgyud): gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho

128a5(rgyud): pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi
128a6(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
128a7(rgyud): kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod
128b1(rgyud): pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor
128b2(rgyud): bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i
128b3(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i
128b4(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
128b5(rgyud): sprin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs
128b6(rgyud): pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin
128b7(rgyud): rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras
129a1(rgyud): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze brgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba mtha'
129a2(rgyud): y as pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu kun tu
129a3(rgyud): 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul phra
129a4(rgyud): rab kyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas
129a5(rgyud): par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i

129a7(rgyud): bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho
129b1(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs
129b2(rgyud): kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal
129b3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho
129b4(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil mdzes par 'bar pa'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi
129b5(rgyud): shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi
129b6(rgyud): seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs
129b7(rgyud): r gyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs

130a3(rgyud): kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
130a4(rgyud): me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i
130a5(rgyud): shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
130a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsam na thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi
130a7(rgyud): b kod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho
130b1(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrog pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas
130b2(rgyud): pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya
130b3(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i
130b4(rgyud): sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin
130b5(rgyud): rnams dang / spos dang me tog dang pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan
130b6(rgyud): bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta
130b7(rgyud): babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang / phye ma'i mdzod yod
131a1(rgyud): pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer
131a2(rgyud): k a'i dra ba kun nas brgyan pa nyid snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs

131a4(rgyud): bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams
131a5(rgyud): dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
131a6(rgyud): kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba
131a7(rgyud): kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs
131b1(rgyud): kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi
131b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi
131b3(rgyud): k hyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs
131b4(rgyud): te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o//
131b5(rgyud): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che bcu'i 'od
131b6(rgyud): zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
131b7(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs
132a1(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho
132a2(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong bu yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor
132a3(rgyud): bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya
132a4(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byed pa kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams
132a5(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che
132a6(rgyud): thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres
132a7(rgyud): pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i
132b1(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun
132b2(rgyud): nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrog pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / baiDUR+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po
132b3(rgyud): che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad
132b4(rgyud): cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa
132b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i
132b6(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /
132b7(rgyud): mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya'i
133a1(rgyud): 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
133a2(rgyud): chos sgrog pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin
133a3(rgyud): rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
133a4(rgyud): bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrog pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho
133a5(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams
133a6(rgyud): cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar
133a7(rgyud): bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po
133b1(rgyud): 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams
133b2(rgyud): cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya
133b3(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro brgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang
133b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro
133b5(rgyud): ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang bu bya'o/ /bla mar
133b6(rgyud): bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams
133b7(rgyud): cad kyi pad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog
134a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan+dan thams cad kyi
134a2(rgyud): phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing
134a3(rgyud): sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / /nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / rin
134a4(rgyud): po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs
134a5(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /
134a6(rgyud): mchod par bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas klu'i rgyal po de dag gi yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
134a7(rgyud): ba byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /de'i tshe stong
134b1(rgyud): g sum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil
134b2(rgyud): 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i
134b3(rgyud): gling 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las
134b4(rgyud): l angs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
134b5(rgyud): de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom
134b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang /
134b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces
135a1(rgyud): bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po/ /ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems
135a2(rgyud): rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi
135a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad
135a4(rgyud): rgyun chad par 'gyur/ /bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/
135a5(rgyud): rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad 'khrungs par 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par
135a6(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag
135a7(rgyud): po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po/ khyod
135b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /klu'i
135b2(rgyud): bdag po/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gcig dang ldan na/ klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug
135b3(rgyud): bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ byams pa
135b4(rgyud): de la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi rnams ni/ /mes mi 'tshig/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi 'khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag pa'i tshogs kyis
135b5(rgyud): zil gyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su srung bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams
135b6(rgyud): chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba
135b7(rgyud): thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos
136a1(rgyud): bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po/ lha dang mi'i byams pa la
136a2(rgyud): gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go / klu'i bdag po/ de bas na/ byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams
136a3(rgyud): pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams
136a4(rgyud): cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs
136a5(rgyud): par byed/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do/ /klu'i bdag po/ de la bde ba thams
136a6(rgyud): cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra ni d+ha ra ni/ ut+ta ra ni/ saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ bI dza ya bar+Na/ sad t+ya bra ti dz+nyA sa ra ha/ dz+nyA na ba ti/ ud
136a7(rgyud): de bA da ni/ b+hi nA ma ni/ a b+hi She tsa ni/ a b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a dzi ma du/ e hi kum pa la ni/ ba ha hA ra kle sha na/ d+hu na pA paM/ sho d+ha ye marga na/ nir ti ka/ d+harma tA
136b1(rgyud): shud+d+ha/ lo ka bi ti mI ra rA dza sa du khA sha ma nA sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka nA a d+hiSh+Thi te/ pra dz+nyA dz+nyA pi swAhA/ klu'i bdag po/ gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par
136b2(rgyud): byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o/ /klu'i
136b3(rgyud): bdag po/ /gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul par snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i
136b4(rgyud): rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang / rigs
136b5(rgyud): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o/ /de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams
136b6(rgyud): cad dang / klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams
136b7(rgyud): cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /klu'i bdag po/ /de la
137a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag
137a2(rgyud): snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag
137a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan
137a4(rgyud): sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
137a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam
137a6(rgyud): mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom
137a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal
137b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil
137b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
137b3(rgyud): sprin chen seng+ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
137b4(rgyud): pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
137b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom
137b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
137b7(rgyud): pa sprin chen gda' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs gang+gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
138a1(rgyud): rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa la phyag
138a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen
138a3(rgyud): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
138a4(rgyud): ltar rnam par sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
138a5(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog bskyed la phyag 'tshal
138a6(rgyud): lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cher sprin gyi sprin
138a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam
138b1(rgyud): par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pa la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
138b2(rgyud): sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
138b3(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
138b4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag
138b5(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi
138b6(rgyud): chu bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin
138b7(rgyud): pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags
139a1(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sga 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
139a2(rgyud): 'das ded bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyams pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i
139a3(rgyud): sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
139a4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag
139a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun tu 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
139a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
139a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa/ 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal
139b1(rgyud): lo/ /klu'i bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / bde ba thams
139b2(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang /
139b3(rgyud): lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod
139b4(rgyud): pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling
139b5(rgyud): 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na/ char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe
139b6(rgyud): dang / chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /
139b7(rgyud): skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ de ltar bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags
140a1(rgyud): kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ gang dag klu thams cad
140a2(rgyud): la yang dag par skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur
140a3(rgyud): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang /
140a4(rgyud): bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs bas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad
140a5(rgyud): lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin 'gyur ba de lta
140a6(rgyud): bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba
140a7(rgyud): dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
140b1(rgyud): 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i
140b2(rgyud): bdag po/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/ /klu'i bdag
140b3(rgyud): po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya
140b4(rgyud): ba'i gzungs/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi
140b5(rgyud): rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni/ char med pa'i tshe char 'bebs par byed/ char ches na gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad
140b6(rgyud): la skul bar byed/ lha thams cad sim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan
140b7(rgyud): par byed do/ /tad+ya thA/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+hA sa ni/ shwI te dzo la gasmi Ti Ta bi kra mA/ badzra saM hA ta ne/ pa ra ma bi ra dza/ nirma ku na ke tu sUR+ya pra b+he/ bi ma laM ga yiSh+Ta/
141a1(rgyud): b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ du du ma bu/ ha na ha na/ ma hA pra b+he biM d+hU ta ma hA mo ha aM d+ha kA ra/ pra dz+nyA gra shud+d+he/ pa ri pU ra Na
141a2(rgyud): mi tre/ mai tri bI ra ma na skan+d+ha/ mai tri ma bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa laM bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa laM bud+d+ha re/ bo d+h+yad+ga ku su me da sha ba le/ tsa tu ra du bai shA ra d+ye/ aSh+Ta da

141b1(rgyud): sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nA na/ dza ba dza ba/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dzu bu/ klu chen po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling

155b5(rgyud): dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis mgo bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ de
155b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste pog phor bdun gyi nam mkha' la gyen du 'dug cing / de bzhin
155b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mchod pa chen po byas te zhag bdun gyi par du rgyun ma chad par byas na/ char 'bab par 'gyur
156a1(rgyud): ro/ /'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
156a2(rgyud): so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra po d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
156a3(rgyud): phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya nA ga rA dza pa ri pr-i ts+tsha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
156a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga
156a5(rgyud): d+ha na lus 'phags ri'i dbang po brag phug na bzhugs te/ de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can kha dog shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / bcom
156a6(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
156a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ lus 'phags ri 'di na ring po dag dge slong rnams la 'tshe na/ de la bdag gis ji ltar mi 'tshe bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
156b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po gzi can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i rgyal po legs so legs so/ /'di lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no/ /de nas
156b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de'i phyir dug dang / sman chen po bco brgyad po 'di dag gi ming zungs shig/
156b3(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ pan+ta re/ ka ra Te/ ke yU re/ po d+h+yam ga ma te/ bin+du ma te/ a ra Ta/ ta ra Da/ ta tu Da/ da ha da ha na/ e ta da ha/ dze le dze la/ pha le/ sha Ta
156b4(rgyud): sha Ta/ ku li na ku li/ e kar shI ta raM gA priSh+Ti/ dge slong dag/ su zhig dug dang / sman chen po bco brgyad po de dag gi ming 'dzin pa de'i lus la rims
156b5(rgyud): kyis mi tshugs/ dug dang / mtshon dang / byad stems dang / ro langs dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi
156b6(rgyud): bas mi tshugs/ de la ring po dag 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'di dag 'dzin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
156b7(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi
157a1(rgyud): can gyi zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ga Na pa ti tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du

157a5(rgyud): du 'gyur/ /lha yi bu yang bran bzhin 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ /klu yang de yi bsgo ba nyan/ /bran bzhin las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /
157a6(rgyud): lha yi longs spyod mnga' ris las/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal ba can/ /gdul bya'i dbang gis sku sprul pa/ /
157a7(rgyud): lha chen tshogs bdag chen pos bya/ /dngos grub dam pa mchog sgrub na/ /mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing / /longs spyod yid bzhin 'phel bar byed//
157b1(rgyud): 'jig rten phan mdzad lha yi lha/ /gang gis mchod pa dngos grub yin/ /lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud las/ dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u snyed

157b4(rgyud): yang dag mchod/ /ba ra ta ka zla ba drug /nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du/ /gsang sngags brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs/ /bsam pa

157b7(rgyud): mchog ni blang bar bya/ /gsal byed yi ge dang po yang / /de yi mjug tu brjod par bya/ /rin chen yi ge swA zhes bya/ /las kyi yi ge hA zhes bya/ /dngos grub 'dod

158b7(rgyud): pas mdzes par bya/ /gsal byed dang po'i yi ge yang / /blo yis blangs te yid kyis bri/ /sde tshan gsum pa'i gsum pa la/ /dang po'i bzhi pa sbyar bar bya/ /

162b7(rgyud): la yum dang ni/ /gnyis su med par dgod par bya/ /de'i ming a rtsi ka ri ste/ /rdo rje phag gdong ma zhes bya/ /dgra sta ban+d+ha lag na thogs/ /khrag gis gang ba gtso
163a1(rgyud): la stob/ /shar gyi le'u tshe ser po la/ /khams gsum gyi bdag po la phug dang / gri 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe
163a2(rgyud): sngon po la gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje mchu ma he de ba'i gdong can dbyug tho dang / tho ba 'dzin pa nag po'o/ /nub phyogs kyi le'u tshe dmar po la gnod sbyin
163a3(rgyud): gyi bdag po sprin gyi bdag ces bya ba dmar bo chus gang ba'i sprin phung dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi le'u tshe ljang gu la gnod sbyin
163a4(rgyud): gyi bdag po nor gnas zhes bya ba ljang gu dbyug tho dang / rin po che'i kha T+rAM ga thogs pa'o/ /byang shar gyi le'u tshe dkar po la bgegs kyi rgyal po bi
163a5(rgyud): na ya ka glang po che'i gdong mdung rtse gsum pa dang / la phug thogs pa nag po'o/ /shar lho'i le'u tshe dmar po la yi dwags kyi rgyal po drag po zhes
163a6(rgyud): bya ba dgra sta dang / thod pa ril po thogs pa nag po'o/ /lho nub kyi le'u tshe nag po la sprin phung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba sprin phung dang / glog gi 'od du

179a1(rgyud): dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de las nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs
179a2(rgyud): 'di thos te/ bzung zhing bcangs/ bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rang bar byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par
179a3(rgyud): rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu/ da yang ngas de bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzungs 'di'i mthus mi rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed
179a4(rgyud): do/ /mi ma yin pa rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /gnod sbyin rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /srin po rnams rnam par
179a5(rgyud): mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /yi dwags rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /sha za rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /

179a7(rgyud): par mi byed do/ /gnon po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /lus srul po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /lha rnams rnam par
179b1(rgyud): mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /lha ma yin rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang
179b2(rgyud): zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams
179b3(rgyud): dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su dbugs rngub pa rnams dang / 'byung ba za ba'i
179b4(rgyud): bar rnams rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/
179b5(rgyud): snying la yod dam/ lag na yod dam/ glegs bam du chud dam/ thos par gyur tam/ kun chub par byas sam/ bklags sam/ bzung ngam/ rjes
179b6(rgyud): su yi rang bar byas sam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / dge
179b7(rgyud): ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas te nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di
180a1(rgyud): nam phyed na lan gnyis sam/ lan gsum mam/ lan bzhi bton na/ de'i lha yid rangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i
180a2(rgyud): bstan pa la dga' ba dang / chos gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / chos smra ba la dga'
180a3(rgyud): ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid 'ongs te 'bru'i char 'bebs so/ /na mo badzra d+ha ra sA ga ra nir g+ho ShA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su
180a4(rgyud): ra be/ b+ha dre/ b+ha dra ba ti/ aM ga le/ maM ga le/ maM ga le ba ti/ a le/ a tsa le/ a ra le/ a tsa ba le/ ud b+he da ni/ pa s+ya pa ti/ dA
180a5(rgyud): na pa ti/ d+ha ma pra ti/ shrI ma ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ ni rma le/ ru ru/ su ra pe/ su rU pa ma le/ bi ma le/ tsa le/ a tsan+te/ a
180a6(rgyud): nan+te/ bi nan+te/ bi shwa ke shai/ pi shwa ni shi/ aM ku re/ maM ku re/ pra baM ku re/ bI ra me/ bI ra me/ bi d+ha ma/ ri ri me/ di di me/ du du me/ kha kha me/ ta ta re/ ta re ta
180a7(rgyud): ra/ tA ra tA ra/ badzre badzre badzre/ ba me/ Ta ke Ta ke/ tha ke tha ke/ u ka ke buka ke/ tha ke tha ra ke/ a brta ni/ baR+Sha ni/ Sha da ni badzra d+ha ra sA ga ra nir g+ho Sha
180b1(rgyud): Na/ ta thA ga ta ma nu sma ra/ sma ra sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga tA sa t+ya ma nu sma ra/ d+harma sat+ya ma nu sma ra/ saM g+ha sa t+ya ma nu sma ra/ da ta da ta/ pu ra pu ra/ pU ra ya pU ra
180b2(rgyud): ya/ pU ra Ni/ b+ha ra b+ha ra Ni/ a ma le/ su maM ga le/ shAn+ta ma ti/ shu b+ha ma ti/ maM ga la b+ha ni/ ma hA ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ b+ha dra ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/
180b3(rgyud): su tsan+d+ra ma ti/ A gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ A ba ra Ni ma nu sma ra swAhA/ pra b+ha ba ma nu sma ra swAhA/ di di ma nu sma ra swAhA/ te dzo ma nu sma ra
180b4(rgyud): swAhA/ bi dza ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ hr-i da ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ sarba satwa bi na ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ oM bA su d+ha ra swAhA/ oM bA su shrI ye swAhA/ oM shrI bA su
180b5(rgyud): swAhA/ oM ba su swAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ nor gyi rgyun ches bya ba'i gzungs te/ gzungs 'di'i mthus mu ge dang / nad dang / 'chi ngas 'byung
180b6(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te nor
180b7(rgyud): gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub gcig bton na/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa'i don du bdag gi khyim mam/ gzhan
181a1(rgyud): gyi khyim mam/ gnas gtsang ma'i bang mdzod dam/ gnas gang yang rung bar de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
181a2(rgyud): phyug dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te nub
181a3(rgyud): gcig bton na/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i khyim nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshad tsam
181a4(rgyud): gyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyod rab tu bsgrims la nor gyi

181a6(rgyud): yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol te khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom
181a7(rgyud): ldan 'das las nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di thos nas tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/
181b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces
181b2(rgyud): bgyi ba blangs lags/ gzungs su zin lags/ bzung lags/ bklags lags/ kun chub par bgyis lags/ rjes su yi rang bar bgyis lags

181b4(rgyud): yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi
181b5(rgyud): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
181b6(rgyud): kun dga' bo/ khyod song la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim nor dang / 'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdzod chen po dang / bang
181b7(rgyud): mdzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas kau sham+b+hi'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /
182a1(rgyud): khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas nang du zhugs pa dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su gang ba
182a2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa dang / rin po che phun sum tshogs pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang yongs su gang bar
182a3(rgyud): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
182a4(rgyud): der song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mtshan du 'dzin cing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
182a5(rgyud): to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang / 'bru phun sum tshogs
182a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba bzang po dad cing
182a7(rgyud): mchog tu dad la dge ba'i bsam pa can des nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di bzung zhing rab tu bton te blangs shing bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su
182b1(rgyud): yi rang bar byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun gyi gzung
182b2(rgyud): 'di longs shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /ston cig /zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig
182b3(rgyud): dang / de ni/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi
182b4(rgyud): don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa
182b5(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ngo / /lan
182b6(rgyud): gnyis su bton tam/ lan gsum du bton kyang 'gal bar byed pa de ni/ gnas med do/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
182b7(rgyud): ni/ mi phyed pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di dag ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur na/ glegs bam la yi ge
183a1(rgyud): ger 'bri ba dang / yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/
183a2(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di ni/ sems can dbul po dang / nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa
183a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / rab tu phye ba dang / bsngags pa dang /
183a4(rgyud): bkrol ba dang / gsal bar mdzad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / bstod pa dang / snyan
183a5(rgyud): par brjod pa dang / go bar mjad pa dang / bsnyad pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du
183a6(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis
183a7(rgyud): mi khyab lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dang rnams kyi/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags/ /zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen/ /
183b1(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba/ /ye shes pha rol bgrod par byon gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas dpa' po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
183b2(rgyud): bo tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
183b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di
