183b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
183b6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
183b7(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i
184a1(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/ dang po re
184a2(rgyud): zhig dpyid zla tha chung gi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor song ste/ de nas nu ma'i bar du chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dug
184a3(rgyud): la nyi ma la sngon du phyogs par yongs su brtags la ji snyed gnas kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /bza' ba thams cad spangs te nyon mongs shing smra bcad
184a4(rgyud): byas te nub bdun du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku yang dbu skra ma gtogs par gur gum dang / tsan+dan gyis byug par bya ba ni/
184a5(rgyud): nub mo snga bar langs te chur khru bdun/ zheng du khru bcu dang bcas pa la tshon sna ma lus pa gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha bzos bcom ldan 'das ma mdog
184a6(rgyud): ljang ser sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa na 'bras bu chen po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa na sgrub pa po rnams la ster ba'i rin po
184a7(rgyud): che'i za ma tog mu tig dang / rdo rje pha lam dang / bai DUR+ya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan par bya'o/ /steng du lha'i bu rin po che char mngon du 'bebs
184b1(rgyud): bzhin pa bya'o/ /g.yas logs su dpal chen mo pad+ma'i phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgongs pa la gnas bzhin pa bya'o/ /g.yon logs su pad+ma'i dpa'
184b2(rgyud): rin po ches snyim pa gang ba bya'o/ /'og tu sgrub pa po pad+ma'i lag pa can bya'o/ /de nas thang sku sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub phyogs su kha
184b3(rgyud): bstan la bkram ste/ de nas nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma ma gtogs pa mdzod kyi bzhes pa yang dbul zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la
184b4(rgyud): tsan+dan dang / a ga ru'i bdug pas bsreg par bya'o/ /zhun mar gyi mar me brgya 'bum 'bul bar bya'o/ /de nas stan gcig la gnas la bcom ldan
184b5(rgyud): 'das ma'i zhal la dmigs la nub mo mtshan bzlas pa byas na/ de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su skyes bu chen po tsam gyi nor rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun
184b6(rgyud): 'bab cing khang ba gang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na mtshan mo phyed na chu'i nang du zhugs la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/ /zla ba gcig tu gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyi
184b7(rgyud): rgyun 'bab par 'gyur te/ mi shes par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na rgyal po'i dkor mngon par 'dod na nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas pa bya zhing / /mtshan
185a1(rgyud): mo'i phyed na til gyis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na/ rgyal rigs las rnyed pa chen po thob bo/ /yungs kar mar la bsres nas sbyin sreg/
185a2(rgyud): byas na/ rgyal po dbang du byed do/ /kun tu ra'i sbyin sreg byas na/ rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed/ /kha cig gis ni/ sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo
185a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan can dran par byas na/ sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur ro/ /yang na sgrub thabs chen po bshad par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi
185a4(rgyud): d kar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te zas ci srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung na thang ga nub phyogs su bstan la
185a5(rgyud): dgram zhing / nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag cing / mtshan mo stan gcig la gnas pas nub ya la gyis bzlas pa byas na/ nor gyi phung
185a6(rgyud): po chen po rnyed de/ 'thor gnod byas kyang 'dzang bar mi 'gyur te/ lha khang chen po bya'o/ /chog 'di'i cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas pa byas na/
185a7(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob cing / /bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma dngos su mthong zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar de
185b1(rgyud): ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing / /kha na ma tho ba'i zas chang dang / nya sha la sogs pa sbangs shing mtshan mo bzlas pa byas na/ dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom
185b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang / zla ba bzang po yongs su dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom
185b3(rgyud): ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ / //na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM pa su d+ha re swAhA/ snying po'o/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su shrI
185b4(rgyud): swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i yang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /thal mo sbyar te gung mo gnyis dang / de nas
185b5(rgyud): srin lag gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te bsdigs mdzub phan tshun sbrel la/ mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bsnol te rtse mo gnyis rgyab sprad
185b6(rgyud): de khab lta bu byas la/ gung mo rtse sprad pa la mtheb mo zung gcig de'i 'og tu sbyar te reg pa bcas pa ni/ rab tu gzung ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa ste/ las
185b7(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i gzungs 'di thub pas gsungs pa'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM shrI ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri d+ha na ka ri swAhA/
186a1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba'i sngags so/ /rig pa 'di'i dang po re zhig dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sor mo rnams thal mo sbyar la mtheb chen dbus su bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i dam tshig gi phyag
186a2(rgyud): rgya'o/ /oM sa ma ye/ sa me sa ma ya ka ri/ ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid la sdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya yin te/ oM ba su d+he swAhA/
186a3(rgyud): me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni/ oM ba su d+ha re swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la ming med brkyang ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni/ oM ba su d+ha ma ti
186a4(rgyud): shri ye swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mtheb chen gyis bkab ste sor mo gzhan rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni/ oM ba su d+ha ri Ni swAhA/ sen mo gan rkyal
186a5(rgyud): du byas la mthe bong gnyis logs su sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni/ oM ba su d+ha re ne swAhA/ lhag ma nye bar spyod pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i sngags kyis thun mong gi phyag rgya'am/ sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o//
186a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ga'i cho ga ni nyams pa med cing / /skra'i nyams pa med pa skud pa ma chad pa'i zheng du mtho gang gi tshad nyid la ring du mtho do byas te steng du bcom ldan 'das bri/ g.yas su 'phags pa
186a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs bya/ g.yon du rdo rje 'chang bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og thang ga'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma bri ste/ gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos srab mo'i sham kag mnabs pa/
186b1(rgyud): de bzhin du gos srab mo'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi sham thabs dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas 'og phyogs su sgrub pa po lag na mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos gtsang sbra byas gos gtsang ma gyon te gso sbyong yan lag
186b2(rgyud): brgyad bya'o/ /de'i mdun du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig byas la ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po dang ldan pas smyung ba byas te zhing gi dbus su thang sku bzhugs su gsol te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa
186b3(rgyud): dang / nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/ /thang ga'i 'og tu lan brgya rtsa gcig gis sngags byas pa'i bum pa chus yongs su gang ba bzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa'i chus gtor ma btang zhing /
186b4(rgyud): gleng bu dang / thong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bar bya'o/ /gleng bu'i mgul pa dang / thong 'dzin gyi mgul par me tog gi phreng ba gdags par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi mdun du sngags pas chu'i rgyun zhing la lan g.yas logs su
186b5(rgyud): bskor bar bya ba ni sngags pas mdun du 'gro zhing sngags pa'i rting ni zhing rmor 'gro bar bya'o/ /phyis sa bon 'debs pa'i dus su cho ga 'dis brgyad brgya bsngags la sa bon sbar ba gang la lan bdun bzlas te zhing
186b6(rgyud): la gtor bar bya'o/ /sa bon gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ni zhing brnga ba'i dus su yang cho ga 'dis bya'o/ /cho ga lhag po ni 'dir dge slong bzhi la zhing gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod kyi ston mo byas te/ de nas sngags pas
186b7(rgyud): chang ba bdun bzlas pa byed cing / brnga ba ni lo tog rtsa ba bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /da ni g.yul 'chag pa bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngags pas rang nyid gtsang sbra byas la gos gtsang mgon la shar du zhal
188a1(rgyud): bstan te sku gzugs bzhugs su gsol la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / yang na nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas
188a2(rgyud): la bzlas pa byas te 'bru'i phung po mtshams bzhir gzhon nu ma gsar du bag ma byas shing khyo yod pa'i bud med bzhi la ston mo byas la/ de snyed kyi mthar zad pa
188a3(rgyud): med par gnas so/ /de nas skyes bus 'bru 'dral zhing grangs byed pa'i dpral ba la sngags dgod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags de sred du smra bcad
188a4(rgyud): byas la bzlas pa bya'o/ /ji snyed du sngo la bltas na gnyis 'gyur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de snyed bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'ching
188a5(rgyud): pa'i mi la sogs pa bos shing sbyin pa'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par bya'o/ /g.yul 'chag pa'i cho ga'o/ /da ni/ 'bru bang mdzod du 'jug pa'i cho ga
188a6(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ dang po re zhig mdzod kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du 'byung po gnyis gcer bu gsus pa 'chang ba/ dbang po 'phyang ba/ g.yon pa'i lag na 'bru'i
188a7(rgyud): snod gzung zhing 'bru skyug bzhin pa/ gser gyi mdog rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o/ /mdzod kyi khang par yang dri dang / byug pa dang / mchod
188b1(rgyud): yon sbyin zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ga'i mdzod kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyun
188b2(rgyud): gtor bzhin pa'i sngags pas 'gro bar bya zhing / de'i rgyab nas de nas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la 'bru'i mdzod khang du phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o/ /de
188b3(rgyud): nas mdzod kyi khang pa'i sgo ru dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do/ /nor rgyun ma'i gzungs rdzogs par bklag par
188b4(rgyud): bya'o/ /gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thang ga'i mdun du de nas skyes bus 'bru phyir 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'dra bar bsam la gur gum
188b5(rgyud): gyis gro ga la sngags bris la/ spyi bor bcings la kha gos kyis bkab la nyi ma re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o/ /mdzod khang gi sgo ru nyin re nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i
188b6(rgyud): gzungs kyi mdo bklag par bya'o/ /sngags pa bsgrub bya'i sngags bltas la dus gsum du brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun
188b7(rgyud): ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/ dbang gi rta mchog sku la phyag
189a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ shar lho'i dur khrod chen po ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas shing tsan+dan gyi nags
189a2(rgyud): t shal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba mi ma yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du dpal nag po chen po zhes bya ba bi nA ya ka la sogs te 'khor gdug pa can rnams
189a3(rgyud): kyi dbus na skye 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa'i nag po chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
189a4(rgyud): k hams na mthar byed rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor byis bskor te dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
189a5(rgyud): nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM baM zhes brjod pas/ dur khrod ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas nas nag po rang dbang med
189a6(rgyud): par mthar byed rta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog gi snying po 'di mdongs gsol du phul ba/ oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA
189a7(rgyud): ya ka hUM hUM phaT ces phul lo/ /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas rgyal po mig mi bzang gis mthar
189b1(rgyud): byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma pad+ma khros pa'i bdag /nag po chen po drag shul can/ /gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol/ /mgon po bsgrub
189b2(rgyud): par bya ba gang / /gsad cing lus srog dbye ba dang / /ma grub shi sa bstan pa dang / /mgon po'i rtags dang ser ba rnams/ /rta mchog chen pos bdag la stsol/ /ces
189b3(rgyud): zhus pas/ de nas pad+ma khros pa yis/ /nag po'i sgrub thabs ched du brjod/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung slad du/ /gza' skar
189b4(rgyud): tshes grangs shis pa la/ /dur khrod la sogs shing gcig tu/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas la/ /nag po chen po bsgrub par bya/ /phung sa'am sa nag dag la
189b5(rgyud): ni/ /stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas ni/ /dri spos khrag gis chag chag bya/ /dbus su gru gsum zla kham ldan/ /phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ /de dbus thod chen nang du ni/ /sha
189b6(rgyud): lnga snying snas brgyan pa yi/ /gtor ma bshos bu khru gang tshad/ /de la mda' gzugs dmar nag dar/ /gri snying tsa ka li yang gzugs/ /de nyid mgon po'i rten du gzhag/
189b7(rgyud): DA ma ru yi pags pa'i nang / /mgon po'i srog sngags bri bar bya/ /ldo yi nang du bla rdos dril/ /spos dang rgyun gtor gtang bar bya/ /dkon mchog spyi la mchod pa bsham/ /de nas pad+mar bdag bsgoms
190a1(rgyud): la/ /thugs ka'i hrI las 'od 'phros pas/ /bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /rang gi mdun du bsam byas la/ /mchod pa rnams lnga
190a2(rgyud): dbul bar bya/ /rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni/ /tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya/ /btang snyoms la sogs paM raM tri/ /pad steng yi ge hUM las ni/ /nag po zhal
190a3(rgyud): gcig phyag drug pa/ /gri gug phreng ba DA ma ru/ /thod pa mdung dang zhags pa bsnams/ /g.yas g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis
190a4(rgyud): brgyan/ /sku smad ba ti khra bo gsol/ /stag lpags zhing gi sham thabs can/ /gtum po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs/ /dpral bar dri yi thig les brgyan/ /spyi
190a5(rgyud): gtsug mi bskyod sprul sku brtan/ /de ltar bdag mdun gsal bsgoms nas/ /spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas par bya/ /gtor ma pU dza la sogs pas/ /nag
190a6(rgyud): po che la sbyin par bya/ /mgon po'i thugs ka'i hUM las ni/ /srog gi yi ge g.yas nas bskor/ /khor yug dag gis bzla bar bya/ /oM badzra ma hA ka la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA

190b1(rgyud): gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang / /rnal 'byor bar chad byed pa rnams/ /nag pa chen pos bsgral
190b2(rgyud): 'dod na/ /stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang / /drag po e yi nang du ni/ /pho mo rabs chad thod pa'i nang / /gzugs ni sbra tshil dag la bya/ /ming rus dag ni bkod nas kyang / /bsad dang na ba
190b3(rgyud): skabs dang sbyar/ /mgon po'i sku dang dam rdzas rnams/ /kha dang kha la dgod par bya/ /phag thod nang du thun rdzas blugs/ /rtag gtor rgyun gtor g.yas dang g.yon/ /gsang sngags
190b4(rgyud): 'di yis gsad par bya/ /oM badzra ma hA ka la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA lA ya shA sa na u pa ha ri Ni e Sha a pa sh+tsi ma ka lo a yaM i daM rat+na tra ya a
190b5(rgyud): pa ka ri NaM ya di pra ti dz+nyA sma ra si ta dA i daM du Sh+TaM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ de na me ke na dgra bo mA ra ya
190b6(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM bi nA ya ka bi la sa traM bi hr-i hUM dza si ma bu bi nA ya ka a mu ka pri srog hur thums dza mA ra ya rbad/ drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis brab/ /zhag bdun bar
190b7(rgyud): du smra mi bya/ /de la rtags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lus srog dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag
191a1(rgyud): bshad bya ba/ /las mtha' sbyin sreg dag gis brtul/ /gru gsum dbus su gdug pa'i shing / /dbus su nag po 'khor bcas
191a2(rgyud): bskyed/ /ling+ga gtor ma dam rdzas rnams/ /nag po'i zhal du dbul bar bya/ /sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya/ /ag+ni dz+wa la raM las rdzogs/ /thal ba rlung
191a3(rgyud): dmar dag la bskur/ /a mu ka ni myur du rlog /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ mtha' brtul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang
191a4(rgyud): dag bshad bya ba/ /de ltar bsgrubs kyang ma grub na/ /gcig dang gnyis la nan tan bskyed/ /de ltar byas kyang ma grub na/ /sa gsum khrag gsum dug gsum
191a5(rgyud): la/ /khru gang pa yi gzugs kyi tshad/ /gru gsum dbus su nag po'i gzugs/ /spyi tshar dag tu lding du gzhug /bris sku dam rdzas bla rdo rnams/ /rang gi gru gsum
191a6(rgyud): mal gyi 'og / dug dang tsher mas steng nas dgab/ /thun rdzas brab cing sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ phaT hUM hUM ka ya nA bi g+hAM bi
191a7(rgyud): kra k+She k+ShiM la kA hA ma badzra oM/ /de skad brjod cing thun gyis brab/ /de la rtags rnams rdzogs pa dang / /de nas gso ba'i cho ga bya/ /bris sku bla rdo dam rdzas rnams/ /spos
191b1(rgyud): chus bkru zhing sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM badzra ma hA ka la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nI bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT sos sos swA hA/ de skad byas la gnas su ni/ /mgon po'i gzugs kyang spos
191b2(rgyud): chus bkru/ /gru gsum dbus su blangs byas la/ /dgra bo'i ming rus snying gar gzhug /zhag bdun bsgrubs la dgra la bskyal/ /a mu ka ni myur du brlag/ /dpal mgon

191b4(rgyud): dang / /mon pa a tsa ra dang ni/ /dge bshes ban+d+he slob dpon dang / /'od dang sgra dang khang pa 'tsheg /mgon po'i sku dag dngos su mthong / /dgra la dmag drangs sems
191b5(rgyud): can bsad/ /mi nag dag la snying stobs dang / /mdze bo dang ni sprang po dang / /bya nag thang la lhung ba 'byung / /dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi rim
191b6(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ser ba dbab pa'i las bya na/ /mon nam mdze can thod pa ru/ /'khor lo rtsibs
191b7(rgyud): bzhi bris nas kyang / /rigs lnga klu yi sa bon dgod/ /rtsibs mchan ser srung ming rus dang / /yul du phob ces bya ba bri/ /de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu la/ /dregs
192a1(rgyud): pa'i sngags dag bri bar bya/ /rgyab tu gang yin yul ming dang / /rlung gi snying po bri bar bya/ /bdag nyid pad+ma khros par bsgom/ /gsang
192a2(rgyud): sngags 'di yis gnad la bor/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ nA ga snying gzer/ phu hur thums dza khrom shar hril b+h+yo/ /de skad ces ni rab
192a3(rgyud): brjod la/ /nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang / /khrag dang dug gis thod par brab/ /lo 'bras rlung khyer rtags byung na/ /dgra yi yul du dbab par bya/ /gal te
192a4(rgyud): 'jig rten phung ba'o / dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa/ /e
192a5(rgyud): ma 'khor 'dus ngo mtshar can/ /ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na/ /dam tshig la gnas sdom pa gzung / /gtor ma dag la brtson par bya/ /dam rdzas bla rdo lus
192a6(rgyud): la bsrel/ /zhes gsungs pas rgyal po mig mi bzang la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yid rangs nas nag po chen pos bstan pa srung bar khas blangs nas mi snang
192a7(rgyud): bar gyur to/ /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba phur bu
192b1(rgyud): 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+hA ra nI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
192b2(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te mngon par
192b3(rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag
192b4(rgyud): po ma hA kA la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba/ dpal mgon po nag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu
192b5(rgyud): 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyi bzhes su gsol/ oM shrI ma hA kA la gA na gu ti swA hA/ na maHshrI ma hA kA la gA ne
192b6(rgyud): gu ti shA yA/ na mo yo gi na Ni na/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi le hi le/ ki te ki te ni/ tsi de tsi de ni swA hA/ nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang /
192b7(rgyud): mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa
193a1(rgyud): man chad bcing ngo / /'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo / /thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo / /
193a2(rgyud): gzhan yang 'di bton pas gtsug lag khang dang / dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/ dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/ rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing / rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla/
193a3(rgyud): bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug /srin po lang+ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma sprin rdul du rlog pa/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo nam
193a4(rgyud): mkha'i glog ma snying rdul du rlog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyis bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa'o/ /'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i
193a5(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ de bi ma hA kA li nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
193a6(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon
193a7(rgyud): pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/ /de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo/ lha mo nag mo chen mos bcom ldan
193b1(rgyud): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen mos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
193b2(rgyud): ba'i rig pa 'di 'bul na/ bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lcam mo nag mo chen mos
193b3(rgyud): steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o/ /'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o/ /thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad
193b4(rgyud): bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha ba to si ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha bA to si swA hA/ 'di bton pas rims dang / nad dang / mi ngas dang / nyes bar bltas
193b5(rgyud): ba thams cad dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro swA hA/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so// //'phags pa nag po chen
193b6(rgyud): po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen
193b7(rgyud): po rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa brjod par bya ste/ phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig/ /tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na rA dza d+hu te na/ da ha da ha rA
194a1(rgyud): dza d+hu te na/ pa tsa pa tsa rA dza d+hu te na/ ba hu shra be ba hu pa ri bA re/ ba hu pa ri sho d+ha ne/ i pany+tsa ra tsaN+Da la na/ ha na ha na/ oM suM b+ha ne suM b+ha/
194a2(rgyud): shi rau muny+tsa/ tsak+Shur muny+tsa/ shro tra muny+tsa/ g+h+ra Na muny+tsa/ dzI ha muny+tsa/ kaN+Tha muny+tsa/ grI ba muny+tsa/ pr-iSh+Tha muny+tsa/ kA Ti ka muny+tsa/ ku k+Sha muny+tsa/ A ru muny+tsa/ dza nau muny+tsa/ hasta
194a3(rgyud): muny+tsa/ pA dau muny+tsa/ aM gu l+ya muny+tsa/ aM gra pra t+yaM ga muny+tsa/ a pa sa ra/ a n+ya sI muny+tsa/ gats+tsha/ dz+wa ra mu to si/ bdag la swA hA/ oM dzA la mA aM gu le hUM/
194a4(rgyud): sarba dz+wa ra nan phaT/ 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
194a5(rgyud): po pra dz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi kA la pra ma rA dza tan+t+ra kI lo/ bod skad
194a6(rgyud): du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud/ rigs sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
194a7(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po na bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar
194b1(rgyud): 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/ nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so/ /'khor ni/ brgya byin dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / ma mo'i
194b2(rgyud): tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin
194b3(rgyud): sde brgyad nyon cig / 'dod pa'i khams 'di na bdud kyi ma gshin rje'i sring mo zhes bya ba rgyal tshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa zhig yod
194b4(rgyud): de/ khyed kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig /bstod pa gyis shig /ngas kyang khyed la byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor gyi nang nas lha'i dbang po
194b5(rgyud): brgya byin stan las langs te dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/ sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol na/ /dge bcu'i las la sems rab
194b6(rgyud): cher sbyangs nas/ /lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang / /mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge bcu yi/ /tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol sgyur ba yi/ /dpal ldan lha
194b7(rgyud): mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas/ /sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byad phun sum tshogs/ /gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i
195a1(rgyud): rkyen dang ldan/ /'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab spangs pas/ /bsod nams
195a2(rgyud): tshogs kyis longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes/ /sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi
195a3(rgyud): tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams srung ba dang / /mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam par 'phags/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste/ /dge sbyong
195a4(rgyud): chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nyon mongs rdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis/ /gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso/ /gsung mchog
195a5(rgyud): rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te/ /bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan/ /nyid la rnam par 'dul
195a6(rgyud): ba'i 'khor gyis bskor/ /lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma/ /dkar mo'i 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ngag 'khyal spangs pa'i
195a7(rgyud): yon tan sbyin pa yis/ /ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs/ /dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma/ /byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag
195b1(rgyud): 'tshal bstod/ /nga rgyal khengs sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis/ /zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma/ /tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste/ /ngag rtsub
195b2(rgyud): 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni/ /'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtags/ /bdag med rtags
195b3(rgyud): su seng+ges rna ba brgyan/ /brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam par spangs/ /phyi rol yul 'di gnyis
195b4(rgyud): med chos su gzigs/ /gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags/ /sprul gyi sna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnams spangs
195b5(rgyud): te/ /sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ /spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal ba stod/ /'jig
195b6(rgyud): rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag / ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan song grub/ /dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub/ /las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs
195b7(rgyud): pas/ /gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang / /dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan/ /gdug pa'i tshul can 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma/ /bstod par 'os
196a1(rgyud): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul
196a2(rgyud): gyis bstod pa/ dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni/ /tshogs kyis sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis/ /gnyen po ye shes rim par bsgom pa la/ /mthar
196a3(rgyud): phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags/ /de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te/ /dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab
196a4(rgyud): bsags pas/ /dang po sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni/ /rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs/ /dpal ldan
196a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni/ /rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab brten nas/ /de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son/ /rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher
196a6(rgyud): bsgoms pas/ /lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son/ /rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas/ /bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son/ /rang sems brgyad
196a7(rgyud): pa nyid la cher bsgoms pas/ /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid/ /dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan sgrub/ /de yi stobs kyi ye shes 'phen par 'grub//
196b1(rgyud): 'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sa la smin pa'i smon lam can/ /sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma/ /'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i
196b2(rgyud): tshul ston cing / /gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo
196b3(rgyud): can gyis dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste/ /don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las
196b4(rgyud): brtsal/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden/ /'khor ba mya ngan gnyis su med pas zab/ /sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags/ /las
196b5(rgyud): dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas bstod/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas smin/ /yul dang yul can gnyis su med gcig gi dang / /spros dang spros med don dam
196b6(rgyud): dbyings kyis bsdus/ /bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te/ /mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul
196b7(rgyud): gcig / gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu/ /mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing / /bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod/ /skye med
197a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub mchog / sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de/ /sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i
197a2(rgyud): dang / /bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bstod/ /yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
197a3(rgyud): med pa'i don/ /stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang / /gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i
197a4(rgyud): ngang / /lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcig gi tshul/ /rtsol byed brtsal bya gnyis med don gcig pas/ /rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis
197a5(rgyud): bstod/ /mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas/ /dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med don rtogs te/ /srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas/ /
197a6(rgyud): thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyi dang nang med gnyis med gcig gi ngang / /sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul/ /snang dang mi
197a7(rgyud): snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong / /gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul/ /spros pa med pa'i don dang
197b1(rgyud): 'brel pa ste/ /'di rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal/ /'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog /de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas
197b2(rgyud): dpal lha mo la 'phrin las kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ sems nyid 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i khyad par ni/ /sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med/ /don dam spros
197b3(rgyud): bral kha dog gzugs kyang med/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems/ /mthun par bstan pa'i zhi ba dpal lha mo/ /zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can//
197b4(rgyud): zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu dwangs/ /kun tu zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi dgra dang nad
197b5(rgyud): rnams zhi bar mdzod/ /mthun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo/ /rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can/ /rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo
197b6(rgyud): ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid/ /kun tu rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzod/ /mthun par bstan
197b7(rgyud): pa'i dbang mo dpal lha mo/ /dbang mdzad dbang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can/ /dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog dmar mo shin tu brjid/ /
198a1(rgyud): kun tu dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod/ /mthun par bstan pa'i drag po'i
198a2(rgyud): dpal lha mo/ /drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can/ /drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu brjid/ /kun tu
198a3(rgyud): drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag pos sod/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma grub la/ /'di ltar mtshan nyid cir yang
198a4(rgyud): snang ba ni/ /'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa lags/ /bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grub nas/ /khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog/
198a5(rgyud): de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la klu'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma/ /yon tan
198a6(rgyud): rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ /don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir/ /rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o/ /khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du
198a7(rgyud): bong bu zhon/ /mya ngan mi 'da'i rtags su lcags sgrog mnga'/ /bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan/ /gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris/ /byang
198b1(rgyud): sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas gsal/ /shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas brgyan/ /dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang / /bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan
198b2(rgyud): ne'u le bsnams/ /dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral ba kham nag sprug /nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dbal mche ba gtsigs/ /'khor ba ljags la gter phyir rkan sgra 'debs/ /
198b3(rgyud): gdug pa zhe la gnon phyir sdang mig bgrad/ /thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar/ /snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog nag /ma mo 'dul
198b4(rgyud): phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sku gsung thugs rtags phyag rgya kha T+wAM gsor/ /sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir
198b5(rgyud): tshub mas brgyan/ /nyon mongs bsreg phyir me phung nang na bzhugs/ /'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs 'du'i shing la brten/ /lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi dka'
198b6(rgyud): zlog ma/ /dpa' brtan brtan phyir stag gi sham thabs mnabs/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs/ /nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra sgrog phyir/ /
198b7(rgyud): thabs kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng+ges brgyan/ /zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir/ /shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sbrul gyi rgyan/ 'du byed mi rtag rtags su
199a1(rgyud): dril bu sgrog / chags phyir rngam mdzad pa'i rak+ta'i rba klong 'thung / /dam tshig bsrung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad/ /tha dad las
199a2(rgyud): rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'phru/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas/ /ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin gnas
199a3(rgyud): mchog byang shar mtshams na brtan/ /dbu ma'i sa la gnas phyir dre'u zhon/ /nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir ma yi tshul/ /mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod la phyag
199a4(rgyud): 'tshal bstod/ /de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas dpal lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ don dam gnyis med byang chub
199a5(rgyud): sems yin yang / /srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang / /rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba
199a6(rgyud): las/ /keng rus thod phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan/ /sku mdog nag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal/ /sngon mo ral pa 'dzings pa'i sprul pa 'gyed/ /sku yi sprul pa
199a7(rgyud): dpal ldan re ma ti/ /gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs/ /yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad/ /'phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye
199b1(rgyud): bar mdzod/ /gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti/ /gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhes/ /dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum rma ste/ /dpang gi 'phrin
199b2(rgyud): las thams cad grub par mdzod/ /sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma/ /drag po 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon/ /'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems
199b3(rgyud): can kun gyi ma/ /bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs/ /de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma yin gyi rgyal po
199b4(rgyud): thag bzang ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang / /thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum/ /gdod
199b5(rgyud): gnas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal/ /'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la/ /byis pa rnams kyis bstod pa byed
199b6(rgyud): pa ltung / /blun po rnams kyis dngos por rab brtags nas/ /gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig /rgyal ba'i don yang thugs chud khyod nyid la/ /tshig dang
199b7(rgyud): yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams/ /nam yang grol bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid min/ /gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma gtogs par/ /khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul
200a1(rgyud): la/ /don du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams/ /khyod la brten nas thams cad btub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skye ba med par
200a2(rgyud): shes pa dang / /gdod nas gnyis med snying po sgom nus na/ /gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin/ /khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis/ /bskal pa
200a3(rgyud): grangs med 'das par rab bltas kyang / /khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus/ /gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong / /sgra dang tshig dang brjod
200a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis/ /khyod ni bos kyang bskal par mi thos te/ /'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni/ /khyod kyang bos la de yang khyod kyis thos/ /gang zhig
200a5(rgyud): lus ngag dge bas khyod sgrub pa'i/ /blun po de yis nam yang khyod nyid spangs/ /lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas/ /mchod na dngos grub de
200a6(rgyud): yis gter thob 'gyur/ /khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud/ /chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mol/ /zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir/ /mi
200a7(rgyud): mjed 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir/ /phyir rol tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma/ /khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa/ /sgrib pa mang po stong nyid ngang du gshegs/
200b1(rgyud): stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod/ /stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod/ /'di ltar bstod na bstong par 'gyur grang bas/ /khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang /
200b2(rgyud): byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod/ /de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser mig can gyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i
200b3(rgyud): don/ /thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mtha' la spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la/ /sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag
200b4(rgyud): gis khyod ni mchod bsam bsgribs kyang / /dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char 'bab pas/ /mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis
200b5(rgyud): dbang po rgyal gyur cig / dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig bdag po ste/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs/ /khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na/ /thugs
200b6(rgyud): rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod/ /khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs/ /dga' mthun phrag dog med pa'i
200b7(rgyud): spros pa ni/ /rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul/ /'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni/ /nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum
201a1(rgyud): kun tu 'gro don la/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs/ /yang dag khyed kyi yon tan sku mchog ni/ /gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa
201a2(rgyud): bsrung ba'i phyir/ /sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab/ /'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi
201a3(rgyud): rang bskul zhing gsol btab nas/ /dge ba 'di yi ngan song stongs gyur te/ /thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo/ /de nas dpal ldan lha mo la nam mkha'i lha
201a4(rgyud): bran rnams kyis bstod pa/ bskal ba me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ /rlung nag dgu pa'i klong dkyil pho brang nas/ /ma gcig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ /bdud kyi
201a5(rgyud): yum la gshin rje'i lcam gcig ma/ /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo re ma ti/ /nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can/ /mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can/ /khyod kyi sku
201a6(rgyud): mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni/ /don dam dbyings kyi skyod pa med pa'i rtags/ /dbu skra g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni/ /yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags/ /
201a7(rgyud): dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'khyil ba ni/ /don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i rtags/ /ral ba'i gseb nas me stag 'phro ba ni/ /thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs
201b1(rgyud): bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags/ /dbu la thod rlon pheng ba bcings pa ni/ /thugs rje sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags/ /g.yas na seng+ge 'gying zhing mchong ba ni/ /sman mo thams
201b2(rgyud): cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags/ /g.yon na sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'phyar ba ni/ /zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags/ /snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba
201b3(rgyud): ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags/ /spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni/ /srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags/ /zhal gyis drag
201b4(rgyud): po hom khung gdang pa ni/ /bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru tra sgrol ba'i rtags/ /rno gdug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni/ /bsgral ba'i zhing bcu sa la sgrol ba'i rtags/ /
201b5(rgyud): sku la zhing spags g.yang gzhi gsol ba ni/ /yang dag chos dang don dang ldan pa'i rtags/ /glang chen ko rlon snam phyed dkris pa ni/ /theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan
201b6(rgyud): pa'i rtags/ /re lde nag pos snam phyed dkris pa ni/ /'jig rten 'di na mche btsan ldan pa'i rtags/ /lte ba'i khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bting
201b7(rgyud): nas skem pa'i rtags/ /spyi bo'i gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni/ /dug gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags/ /zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khril ba ni/ /thabs
202a1(rgyud): dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags/ /phyag g.yas shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni/ /sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i
202a2(rgyud): rtags/ /phyag g.yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags/ /bong bu ga pa byin phyogs zhon pa ni/ /log par lta ba'i
202a3(rgyud): sems can sgrol ba'i rtags/ /srin po'i og mas snga ru byas pa ni/ /srin yul lang+ga pu rangs 'dul ba'i rtags/ /sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni/ /zhe
202a4(rgyud): sdang dbang gi bgegs rigs 'joms pa'i rtags/ /rus sbal nag po'i phob tu btang ba ni/ /klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i rtags/ /snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi
202a5(rgyud): khram bam ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa khram pa 'debs pa'i rtags/ /phyi shar nad kyi rgyal pa btags pa ni/ /bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bo la/ /nad ka 'bebs
202a6(rgyud): shing dal kha sgyur ba'i rtags/ /don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zor ris btad/ /thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta'i thig las brgyan/ /'dul byed 'phrin
202a7(rgyud): las rtags su thal ba'i mtshan mas btab/ /ma mo 'bum phrag bran du khol ba ni/ /khams gsum khyab par 'phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags/ /ma gcig kha nas
202b1(rgyud): me 'bar rgya mtsho skam/ /rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tshogs por 'phen/ /bdag gis btsun par lha mo khyod la bstod/ /de nas yang gshin rje nag pos dpal lha mo la che ba'i yon
202b2(rgyud): tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/ lha mo dpal ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni/ /rgyun du til mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig ma ste/ /ro nye rna chas bsgyings shing cha lugs
202b3(rgyud): mang po 'chang byed ma/ /rgyun du rkang sgrog lcags la byas pa gcig gis rkang la mdzes par brgyan pa ste/ /mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyod nyid yin
202b4(rgyud): par shes/ /ral pas bdag nyid mdzes par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes/ /'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du
202b5(rgyud): ba 'thul ba na/ /nag mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur/ /lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal
202b6(rgyud): 'byor can du dur khrod dgyes/ /khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan med cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrog /khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bcad g.yul du
202b7(rgyud): mtshon gyis bsad pa yi/ /mgo phreng lag na thogs shing gar thabs bskor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che/ /rkub tshos che la klu dbang gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings shing
203a1(rgyud): lag na mdung dang ni/ /ba dan thogs shing khrag gi chang gis ra ros myos te mig rtsa dmar por byas/ /mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni
203a2(rgyud): 'byung bo phal chen kun gyis mthong / /rkang ba'i gos ni ko rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snam gyi phyed ni re ldes dkris/ /mi yi rgyu ma gsar pas zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing
203a3(rgyud): khrag zhag tshom bus thig ler brgyan/ /mi sha so sor chem chem za yin mi ro'i cod pan mgo la brgyan pa ste/ /bdag la skyob pa'i drang mo mi sha thos khyod snga nas
203a4(rgyud): ma mthong gzod mthong na/ /bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig sdang zhing khyod la 'dud/ /lha mo bzang mo lus mdog nag cing bzod par dka' ba
203a5(rgyud): khyod la ni/ /brgya byin sogs kyis bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud/ /lha rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams 'jug phyir rab rtul
203a6(rgyud): bas na rna ba ya gcig la/ brang gis 'gro ba sbrul mgo gdengs ka stong dang ldan zhing phud sgrog shig gis rgyan nas brgyan du byas/ /ya gcig la ni seng+ge mtshungs
203a7(rgyud): med thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor zhing sa gzhi gnon pa'i sa steng gi / phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma zla ba lha mo khyod kyi sked nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon/ /
203b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho klong nas me 'bar chu rnams skem par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams cad zhi mdzad ma/ /lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' zlog nag mo mi nad phyugs
203b2(rgyud): nad kun la 'jigs pa med/ /ma gcig dpal ldan lha mo khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la bram ze
203b3(rgyud): mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa/ ma gcig lha mo dpal lha mo/ /rdo rje lha mo nag mo che/ /mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gis
203b4(rgyud): btsun par khyod bstod kyi/ /bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas/ /yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags/ /ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong / /dpa' rtul
203b5(rgyud): drag spyod brtson 'grus che/ /'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal/ /gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod/ /gos su dar gos sngon po gsol/ /sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs
203b6(rgyud): 'chang / /spyan mig mthong na mi sdug kun tu sdang / /dad cing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud/ /res 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas/ /res 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas/ /res
203b7(rgyud): 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas/ /lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'/ /gnas de ri dang tshal dgon du/ /rtag tu lha mo khyod bstod na/ /de yi dgongs pa skong bar byed/ /bdag gis
204a1(rgyud): rtag tu bstod byas na/ /bdag gi bsam pa grub par mdzod/ /rma bya'i sgo la rgyal mtshan byas/ /gang zhig rtag bsten srung bar byed/ /gnag
204a2(rgyud): lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed/ /seng+ge stag dang spyang ki yis/ /rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang / /rdo rje dril chen snyan par sgrog /byin te dril chen snyan par sgrog /
204a3(rgyud): lan 'ga' lag na tri shUl thogs/ /lan 'ga' nyi zla'i ru mtshon 'phyar/ /mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na/ /de yi dus su mchod byas na/ /lha mo khyod las lhag pa med/ /
204a4(rgyud): bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston/ /dgra dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed/ /bud med nang na mchog yin te/ /tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra/ /rgyal po'i khab na pad+ma 'dra/ /
204a5(rgyud): zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /chu la rgal na gru zam 'dra/ /phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen bshes 'dra/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha mo khyod kyi lte ba la/ /lha rnams
204a6(rgyud): kun gyi rdzong bcas nas/ /lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas/ /lha ma yin rnams pham par byed/ /lag na mdung dmar chems se chems/ /ru mtshon ba dan me ltar
204a7(rgyud): 'bar/ /dag 'dul g.yul zlog khyed la bstod/ /de nas drang srong chen po kau di n+yas dpal lha mo la dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ 'jig rten gtso la rtag tu gus phyag
204b1(rgyud): 'tshal/ /ma rnams nang na khyod ni rtag tu mchog yin te/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod/ /byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/ /yon tan rnam
204b2(rgyud): pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan/ /mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/ /bsod nams ye shes snang ba grags pas brgyan/ /dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra/ /
204b3(rgyud): deng bdag pad+mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang / /sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis pa/ /pad+ma lta bur shin tu rnam
204b4(rgyud): par dag / lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/ /mtshan ma yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan/ /dri med ye shes kun nas rab mdzes pa/ /dran pa rnams kyi
204b5(rgyud): nang nas mchog tu gyur/ /ji ltar seng+ge gcan gzan mchog gyur bzhin/ /sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba yis/ /bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad 'grub
204b6(rgyud): par shog / ces bstod do/ /de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so/ /da yang bstod pa 'di
204b7(rgyud): dag gi don sgoms shig / yid la rtag tu zlos shig /lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni/ nga la bstod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no/ /lha mo des kyang
205a1(rgyud): mi 'di srung bar byed do/ /skyob par byed do/ /ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor de rnams rab tu dga'
205a2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rgyan gyi char chen po phab nas so so'i gnas su 'khod do/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya
205a3(rgyud): gar skad du/ shrI de wi kA li nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka /bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
205a4(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub
205a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste lan
205a6(rgyud): gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan
205a7(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs
205b1(rgyud): ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas dpal lha me nag mo la gzigs te 'di skad
205b2(rgyud): ces gsungs so/ /thos bsam sgom la cher gnas pa'i/ /rgyu 'bras rkyen gyis bdag nyid can/ /'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo
205b3(rgyud): 'phags/ /byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste/ /sa ltar rten pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ /yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra/ /byang chub smin byed me lta bu/ /dge ba'i 'du byed
205b4(rgyud): rlung ltar g.yo/ /shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste/ /khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra/ /'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod/ /bsod nams ye shes rab bsags
205b5(rgyud): pa'i/ /las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas/ /nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul pa goms/ /shes rab snying rje'i lam du 'gro/ /khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu/ /dper na yid
205b6(rgyud): bzhin nor bu'i chu/ /kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing / /nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal/ /zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing / /ming ni ri bong rwa dang 'dra/ /rang
205b7(rgyud): gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra/ /u dum ba ltar khyod dkon yang / /bdud rtsi lta bur yongs tshim mdzad/ /'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyang
206a1(rgyud): ston/ /chu dang nam mkha'i tshub ma ltar/ /gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong / /dam pa rnams
206a2(rgyud): dang yang dag gcig / dam pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro/ /lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo/ /srin mo klu mo sha za mo/ /bdud mo 'byung mo grul bum mo/ /khrag mo rngam tshul glog
206a3(rgyud): 'gyu ma/ /rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma/ /mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i 'dul/ /dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston/ /
206a4(rgyud): rnam pa brgyad kyis dbyibs kyang 'byung / /'gro ba drug po'i tshul yang ston/ /phung po lnga yang brjod par nus/ /dbang po tshim byed yul lnga'ang ston/ /rten cing

206a7(rgyud): mdzad dpal ldan ma/ /dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la byams/ /oM AHhUM shrI de wi kA la sa ma ya dzaHDA ki ni DA ya sa ma swA ha/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang
206b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa/ /yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang thob/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /yi dwags gnas su mi skye zhing / /byol song skye bas thogs mi 'gyur/ /lus 'phags
206b2(rgyud): gnas su skyes pa na/ /thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing / sgra mi snyan du rlung gis min/ /de bzhin ba lang spyod du yang / /chu dang rlabs kyis khyer mi nus/ /'dzam
206b3(rgyud): bu'i gling du gang skyes pa/ /sna tshogs gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang / /skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan
206b4(rgyud): bzhi yi skye gnas su/ /tshad med bzhi ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gzugs med gnas ni bzhi por yang / /don med na ni mi skye ste/ /'du shes med par nam yang
206b5(rgyud): min/ /'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /khams gsum tshul gyis bdag don spyod/ /rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur/ /sems la 'dzin par mi byed
206b6(rgyud): de/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba drug po dang / /de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang / /mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa grangs med mang por yang / /mi khom brgyad du
206b7(rgyud): skye mi 'gyur/ /mu stegs rtsod pa zlog pa dang / /mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing / /tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan/ /sdug bsngal bskal pa mang por yang / /
207a1(rgyud): nam yang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing / /mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir/ /nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang / /rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par
207a2(rgyud): bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni/ /rab dga' dri med 'od byed 'phro/ /sbyang dka' mngon gyur ring du song / /mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin/ /sangs rgyas
207a3(rgyud): sa chen bla na med/ /bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur te/ /kun tu 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od/ /nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od/ /rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od/ /las kyi 'od

207a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs/ /rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang

207b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang / dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do/ /
207b2(rgyud): dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/ dus gsum

207b7(rgyud): 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i
208a1(rgyud): dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go / de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la

208a3(rgyud): pa ma rnyed do/ /de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
208a4(rgyud): dga' bo'i lus la reg go / reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzod pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur

208a6(rgyud): no/ /bcom ldan 'das de ma dgongs so/ /bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
208a7(rgyud): bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon
208b1(rgyud): mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos thos so/ /de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste
208b2(rgyud): phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma
208b3(rgyud): dgongs so zhes ci de skad smra'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag gi lus
208b4(rgyud): la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni/ dper na/ sog les mgo bo gsheg pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ ma 'jigs shig /bdag cag
208b5(rgyud): gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bkur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
208b6(rgyud): pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
208b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod ci sdug bsngal mi
209a1(rgyud): bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor bas thebs sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod de'i phyir
209a2(rgyud): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ mthong na
209a3(rgyud): gnod pa bdun yod de/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang / nor bu 'dzin dang / gtum po dang / gdol pa dang / rma bya'i snying
209a4(rgyud): dang / tshe zad dang / la ba can te/ ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ bsnyen par dka' ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu

224b4(rgyud): lags/ bdag cag gis gsungs pa bzhin bgyis lags pas/ gso ru btub pa gda' ba la chos ston yol du dogs nas 'tshal nas yang sngar brjod
224b5(rgyud): cing bros nas yang zhu ru mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de ni/ khyod kyi sen bar du rtsam pa lus pas lan pa yin gyi/ lag pa khrus la gzod byin cig /de'i
224b6(rgyud): drung du 'gro mi dgos te/ 'di nyid kyis btub bo/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de gnyis kyis khrus bgyis te chu sbyin stsal bas yi dwags mo de nyid du 'ongs nas cung
224b7(rgyud): zad na mdangs dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta bu'i chu sbyin 'di ni/ 'dir ma zad de/ dus thams cad
225a1(rgyud): du yang yi dam du gyis la thong zhig / gzhan la yang rgya cher spel cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di'i phan yon ni/ dpag tu med
225a2(rgyud): de tshad las 'das so/ /mdo tsam brjod na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi phyug po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas dbul po 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa
225a3(rgyud): byas na/ de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye ste/ de ci ste zhe na/ phyug po rnams ni/ nga rgyal te dregs pa dang rgyags pas gnas ngan len spro bar byed
225a4(rgyud): do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbul po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas yi dwags 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na/ de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi
225a5(rgyud): nye'o/ /de ci ste zhe na/ dbul po rnams la ni/ 'bad du yod/ btsal du yod de/ bslang du yod do/ /yi dwags las kyis de lta bu dag ma yin gyi/ ma
225a6(rgyud): bsngos na kha ru chud kyang dug chen por 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yi dwags la sbyin pa byas pa bas 'jur 'gegs yi dwags gcig la chub byin
225a7(rgyud): na/ de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o/ /de ci ste zhe na/ yi dwags de dag la ni/ dmigs pas tshim pa dang / bshams pas tshim pa dang /
225b1(rgyud): bsngos pas tshim pa dang / reg pas tshim pa dang / rjes kyis tshim pa dang / bshal bas tshim pa yod de/ las kyi rim pa bzhin no/ /'jur 'gegs ni/ gzhan
225b2(rgyud): dka' ba'i las kyis sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dmigs pa gzhan gyis mi thob/ /rdzas thams cad la 'thams te bkag pas rdzas gzhan mi myong / gzhan
225b3(rgyud): gyi chu gcig pu ma bkag pas/ chu gtsang rtsam pas ma reg pa las dbang med/ rang gi rgyud zhi bar byed pa'i sngags dang / phyag rgya se gol gcig min pa gzhan
225b4(rgyud): gang gis kyang thob par mi nus so/ /se gol gcig tu bzhag pa ce zhe na/ gnyis su gyur na gzhan gyi sgrar gyur nas mi thob/ des na rang gi go ba bskyed pa sgra gcig
225b5(rgyud): tu nges pa'o/ /'dis ni/ bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / nad nyung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'byed par byed pa
225b6(rgyud): dang / mdangs nyams pa rnams gsal bar byed pa dang / 'di gzhan la spel nas rgyud grol nas yi dwags kyi rgyud chad de mthar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
225b7(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal nas rigs kyi bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'jur 'gegs zhes bya ba'i gzungs
226a1(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a
226a2(rgyud): pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
226a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med
226a4(rgyud): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
226a5(rgyud): rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ steng
226a6(rgyud): gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
226a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin
226b1(rgyud): par bzhes te/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni/ tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya
226b2(rgyud): thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to/ /'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med
226b3(rgyud): pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ ming tsam yang nyan
226b4(rgyud): tam/ klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed dam/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de
226b5(rgyud): dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa
226b6(rgyud): gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag tshe zad kar mtshan 'chang bar
226b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag de bzhin
227a1(rgyud): gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na de dag gi yon tan
227a2(rgyud): dang / legs par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di dag go /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi tA A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/

227a4(rgyud): shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger
227a5(rgyud): 'brir 'jug gam/ glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam/ klog par gyur pa de'i tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos
227a6(rgyud): nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
227a7(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi tA a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a
227b1(rgyud): ba ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ yang de'i tshe

227b4(rgyud): pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga gnas mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis

228a1(rgyud): dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su

228a6(rgyud): d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs

229a1(rgyud): gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na

229a6(rgyud): pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir

230a1(rgyud): dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ya ma hA pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha re

230a7(rgyud): yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa

230b5(rgyud): dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pos glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na

230b7(rgyud): sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA ri swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gar 'bri'am/ yi ger
231a1(rgyud): 'brir 'jug na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mngon sum du chos ston pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas
231a2(rgyud): stong gis de la phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom dang / som nyi dang / yid
231a3(rgyud): gnyis ma za zhig / oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ra mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye
