231a5(rgyud): swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi/ de'i phyir bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba
231a6(rgyud): dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM
231a7(rgyud): bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te
231b1(rgyud): swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
231b2(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA
231b3(rgyud): ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu
231b4(rgyud): ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA pa ri
231b5(rgyud): shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA pa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang du mdo sde dkon mchog 'bri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du
231b6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ phyag bya bar yang 'os par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang ri dwags gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla
231b7(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA
232a1(rgyud): ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi
232a2(rgyud): ger 'bri'am/ yi ge 'brir 'jug na/ de bud med kyi lus su nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi
232a3(rgyud): ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/
232a4(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kaR+Sha pa Na
232a5(rgyud): 'ga' zhig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/ /
232a6(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a
232a7(rgyud): pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nya na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/
232b1(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba de dam pa'i chos mtha' dag mchod par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA
232b2(rgyud): na su bi ni sh+tsi te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te s+ya myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra
232b3(rgyud): pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug
232b4(rgyud): tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod
232b5(rgyud): pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ni/ bgrang
232b6(rgyud): bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA
232b7(rgyud): pu N+ye a pa ri ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta
233a1(rgyud): lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam spungs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar
233a2(rgyud): nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi
233a3(rgyud): ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi
233a4(rgyud): te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na su mud ga te swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus
233a5(rgyud): yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /
233a6(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ba ga te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta re dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa
233a7(rgyud): ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang
233b1(rgyud): zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ bsti stang du byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs
233b2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na
233b3(rgyud): su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro
233b4(rgyud): pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag
233b5(rgyud): 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims stobs
233b6(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge tshul khrims stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags
233b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bzod pa'i
234a1(rgyud): stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge brtson 'grus
234a2(rgyud): stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang
234a3(rgyud): dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /shes
234a4(rgyud): rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge shes rab stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags
234a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye
234a6(rgyud): ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na su b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya
234a7(rgyud): pa ri wA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
234b1(rgyud): de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
234b2(rgyud): pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA
234b3(rgyud): ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
234b4(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
234b5(rgyud): kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag
234b6(rgyud): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ steng gi phyogs na
234b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang
235a1(rgyud): ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin
235a2(rgyud): par bzhed de/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni/ tshe thung ba tshe
235a3(rgyud): lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan te/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag de bzhin
235a4(rgyud): gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi
235a5(rgyud): ger 'brir 'jug gam/ ming tsam nyan tam/ klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng
235a6(rgyud): ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag
235a7(rgyud): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos pa de dag tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sems
235b1(rgyud): can gang dag tshe yongs su zad kar mtshan 'chang bar gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ 'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu
235b2(rgyud): dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring por 'dod pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi
235b3(rgyud): ger 'brir 'jug na/ de dag gi yon tan dang legs par gyur pa ni/ 'di dag go /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/
235b4(rgyud): ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te s+yak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'jam dpal
235b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig gis yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ glegs bam la bris te khyim
235b6(rgyud): na 'chang ngam/ klog par gyur na/ tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /de shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
235b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na
236a1(rgyud): su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud
236a2(rgyud): ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tes sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe
236a3(rgyud): dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te
236a4(rgyud): samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
236a5(rgyud): brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta
236a6(rgyud): A yur+dz+nyA su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te sA b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA
236a7(rgyud): na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
236b1(rgyud): pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ om sar+b+ba skA ra ba pi shud+d+ha
236b2(rgyud): d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te/ swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+hA ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis
236b3(rgyud): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA
236b4(rgyud): ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga nas mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa
236b5(rgyud): gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA
236b6(rgyud): ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba
236b7(rgyud): phrag bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A
237a1(rgyud): yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud
237a2(rgyud): ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes
237a3(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya
237a4(rgyud): thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa
237a5(rgyud): gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo
237a6(rgyud): rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/
237a7(rgyud): yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di
237b1(rgyud): gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM dud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma
237b2(rgyud): te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug
237b3(rgyud): gam/ 'chang na/ de tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi
237b4(rgyud): ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig
237b5(rgyud): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
237b6(rgyud): 'jig rten du yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri
237b7(rgyud): mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ om sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA
238a1(rgyud): na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang la la zhig gi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ des chos kyi phung
238a2(rgyud): po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'brir bcug par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya

238a6(rgyud): ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga yongs su 'byang bar
238a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te
238b1(rgyud): ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de'i sdig
238b2(rgyud): pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/

238b4(rgyud): 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de la bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pos glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba

240b6(rgyud): shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ gus par byas te mchod par byed pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing

244a1(rgyud): pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang / spos kyis mchod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang / byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la

244a4(rgyud): gad na ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so/ /g.yas na ni byang
244a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go / g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor
244a6(rgyud): to/ /dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang / dad pa dang / gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la
244a7(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dag la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dang /dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang la
244b1(rgyud): la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /dug gi 'jigs pa mi
244b2(rgyud): 'byung / /mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gang la yang ma gtogs

244b4(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
244b5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po puN+ya saM b+ha wa dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// //oM badzra A yu she hUM a/ 'phags pa tshe dpag med
244b6(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas sam/ sngags chab kyis dbang bskur na tshe nur bar 'gyur ro/ /oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta A yur puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te swA hA// //
244b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma dz+wa la mU la tan+t+ra rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba

246a1(rgyud): dang / bkur sti dang / rim gror bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags pa du mas bstod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen

246a3(rgyud): brgyad du gyur to/ /de'i ltas de mthong nas lang+ka'i rgyal po sgra sgrog shin tu snyems pa dang ldan nas rang gi 'khor du ma dang lhan cig der lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra
246a4(rgyud): sgrog gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs su chud nas sku'i gnas thams cad nas 'od zer bye ba phrag du ma byung ngo / /'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas

259a7(rgyud): kyis tshar gcod mdzad/ /lag pa thal sbyar phyed btsums bskyed/ /ser mo gcig snol gcig 'khyud dang / /kun snol kun 'khyud kun gdengs dang / /rgyab
259b1(rgyud): snol res 'khyud kun 'khyud dang / /mos res 'khyud sgreng kun sgreng dang / /mnyam gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya/ /sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin sogs/ /

259b7(rgyud): yab/ /byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te/ /bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs/ /skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste/ /bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing / /

260a3(rgyud): ro/ /cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang / /shi ba sems brgyal med par ni/ /gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/

260a7(rgyud): na rdo rje 'dzin/ /bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal phyogs su 'khod nas ni/ /gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs
260b1(rgyud): ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun/ /rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon/ /'gro ba thugs brtse chen po yis/ /snying po byin rlabs

293a6(rgyud): du/ /rab dga'i tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha/ /ting 'dzin yang pa zhes bya ba/ /rtogs pa rgya che zab pa zhig /'khor dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te/ /me
293a7(rgyud): tog rin chen rigs byung ba/ /ston pa'i phyogs su char bzhin phab/ /mkha' la gdugs kyi bla res bkang / /'khor dang bcas pa mgrin gcig tu/ /
293b1(rgyud): gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung
293b2(rgyud): phyir/ /bdag dang sems can kun tu yang / /dngos grub 'byung rim bshad du gsol/ /la la g.yeng bar gyur pa yis/ /bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyi/ /

308b4(rgyud): chags bcas pa gtan spong pa'i/ /thabs mchog du ma bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas/ /tshangs pa'i

308b6(rgyud): don du byas pa 'di/ /nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni/ /legs so byang chub sems dpa' chen/ /dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so/ /rtsi gcig gus dang bcas pa
308b7(rgyud): yi/ /sems kyis legs nyon yid la zungs/ /nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sa las ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/ /

309a3(rgyud): sa nyid la/ /bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra/ /kha g.yel zhabs tshod zhum pa la/ /shin tu gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang / /ga pur gur gum cu gang

309a5(rgyud): dang / /man shel yin te rin chen lnga/ /bum par stsal nas ras dkar gyis/ /mgul pa bcings nas kha rgyan yang / /dri zhim shing lo me tog gzhag /
309a6(rgyud): me tog phreng dang bcas pa de/ /pad+ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang / /rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas/ /dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas/ /'jig
309a7(rgyud): rten dbang gis gang ba yi/ /sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas/ /sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas/ /dgongs pa rgya chen skyes gyur te/ /

309b5(rgyud): bde bar yang sbyar bar bya/ /phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags/ /lhog pa 'brum pa la sogs la/ /mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis sbyar/ /gdon

324b1(rgyud): ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ ta tha thA/ oM badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ /sarba b+hir thA/ ha na ha na badzra/ sarba dz+wa ra pra sha ma na ye swAhA/ mi skra mi rus sle
324b2(rgyud): tres dang / /gu gul yungs kar sgog skya dang / /shing kun gla rtsi 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad phyogs bzhir hrIHyig bri/ /mtshams bzhir ris te
324b3(rgyud): dbus su ming / /sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la/ /gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags/ /bris nas lus sam mgul du thogs/ /nad rims thams
324b4(rgyud): cad sel ba dang / /rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol/ /rang 'byung can
324b5(rgyud): gyi ras la ni/ /sen rtsis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri/ /rtsibs bzhi hrIHla g.yon bskor du/ /hrIHgi waM shiM ku ru hrI/ mu
324b6(rgyud): khyud dang por mgon po ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o/ /gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po phreng / /gsum pa lcags kyu nyi shu gcig /dbus su baM yig
324b7(rgyud): hrIr bcas bri/ /lha dam nyid kyang dam byed na/ /'gro ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang / /bgegs kyi gnod pa sel

325a2(rgyud): kun la hUM yig ni/ /bgegs ming u tsa ta yis bskor/ /mu khyud dang por spyan ras gzigs/ /ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o/ /gnyis par khro bo rta skad
325a3(rgyud): sngags/ /gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags bris la/ /de rgyab me yi phung po bri/ /gang zhig 'khor lo 'di ris pas/ /sred med bu ltar mthu che

325b1(rgyud): yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya/ /mu khyud dang por mi bshol sngags/ /gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum par ut+pal phreng ba ste/ /yang tog
325b2(rgyud): tse 'am mdzod bzhag nas/ /gsol btab mchod na longs spyod 'phel/ /bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas/ /de bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /phyogs bzhir hrIH
325b3(rgyud): ni mtshams su drang / /dbus su khye'u'i gzugs shig bri/ /phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu dri/ /sngags bu stsol bcas bri bar bya/ /mtshams bzhir oM dang
325b4(rgyud): a ma ra/ /dzi wa n+ti ye swAhAs bskor/ /mu khyud dang por spyan ras gzigs/ /pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags/ /gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /

325b6(rgyud): na/ /bu stsol 'gyur la the tshom med/ /srung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang / /bu slong ba yi phyag rgya ni/ /smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri/ /lhag ma rnams ni

332a1(rgyud): byed pa yi/ /ril bu chen po bshad par bya/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gu la/ /kan+d+ha na gu li dang ni/ /ru Ni a pa ya pa ni/ /i pa ya na
332a2(rgyud): ta ka ra/ /gan+d+ha ka dang pri yang ku/ /'khor lo che dang 'khor lo dang / /biSh+Nu ka Ti de bzhin du/ /so ma ra tsa un na ti/ /re re la yang sngags phreng dang / /brgya rtsa

339b7(rgyud): su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so/ / //paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI wa rma dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te
340a1(rgyud): gtan la phab pa/ lots+tsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
340a2(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag

340a5(rgyud): rin po che'i mchog sna tshogs du mas spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis yongs su brtsegs pa/ lha'i ba dan dbyangs pa ste/ de'i
340a6(rgyud): tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs nas 'di snyam dgongs te/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs

347b7(rgyud): thams cad du chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ gang 'phags pa'i yul du skye ba thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /gsum pa
348a1(rgyud): ni/ dus bzang po dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzhi pa ni/ gang rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o/ /lnga
348a2(rgyud): pa ni/ gang dbang po mtha' dag tshang ba'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /drug pa ni/ gang dge ba'i phyogs la sems yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'o/ /bdun
348a3(rgyud): pa ni/ gang tshul khrims nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /brgyad pa ni/ gang gnyen po shes rnams dang / bran g.yog rnams kyi bye brag shes shing mthun par
348a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o/ /dgu pa ni/ gang yo byad dang / nor dang / zas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ba'o/ /bcu pa ni/ gang gzhan gyis go 'phang bstod
348a5(rgyud): pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur ba'o/ /bcu gcig pa ni/ gang nor dang / yo byad mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba'o/ /bcu gnyis pa ni/ gang
348a6(rgyud): bsam pa sems dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o/ /bcu gsum pa ni/ gang lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /bcu
348a7(rgyud): bzhi pa ni/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing chos kyang thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /bco lnga pa ni/ gang chos thos pa dang / don zab mo shes
348b1(rgyud): rab kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ste/ gang la la zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa des gong du smos pa skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po de
348b2(rgyud): dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod cing gzung bar bgyi ste/ de la skyo ba bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems
348b3(rgyud): d pa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad smras nas de'i rjes la 'khor mang po'i dbus de nyid du 'dug ste lag pa gnyis mnyam par
348b4(rgyud): t hal mo sbyar nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de 'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas rgyas pa chen po kun nas yongs su rdzogs
348b5(rgyud): pa thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen po gzhi mdzes pa 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo
348b6(rgyud): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban+d+ha na ts+tshe da na kA ra ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dro ts+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra
348b7(rgyud): sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i T+yu pa dra ba be nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu tA ra NA ka rA ya/ ta s+ya na ma skri twA/ i daM AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA/ ta ba nI la kaN+Tha na
349a1(rgyud): ma pa ra ma hri da ya/ mA brta yi Sh+ya mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM/ shu b+ha tse ta nAM/ sarba sa twA naM/ pA pa mA rga bi shi d+ha na/ tad+ya thA/ A ba lo ki/
349a2(rgyud): lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwA he bo shi sa twA/ he ma hA bo d+hi sa twA/ he phr-i ya bo d+hi satwA/ he ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sma ra hr-I da yaM e h+ye hi/ Ar+yA ba
349a3(rgyud): lo ki te shwa rA ya/ pa ra ma me trI tsi t+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru karma/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya bi d+yAM/ de hi de hi/ me a raM ga maM ga maM ga ma sing+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ du hu
349a4(rgyud): du hu ma hA bIR+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA rA Ni shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma la mU rta/ AR+ya a pa lo ki te shwa ra/ kriSh+Na dzi na dza TA mu ku TA/ a laM kr-i ti/ sha rI ra la m+ba/
349a5(rgyud): pra lam+ba pra lam+ba/ ma hA sing+d+ha shud+d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ma hA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+Na pa k+Sha/ kr-i Sh+Na pa r+Na/ kr-iSh+Na pa sha/
349a6(rgyud): nir+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma hasta/ dza ya ka rA/ ni shA tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo ba bI ta/e h+ye hi ma hA bI ra/ ma hA ba ra ma hA ba ra/ ha mu kha tri gu ra ha ha ne shwa ra/
349a7(rgyud): nA rA ya Na rU pa/ pa la be ga d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi ma hA/ ha la ha la/ po Sha ni rdzi ta lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha na sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA Sha na/ mo ha bi Sha
349b1(rgyud): bi nA sha na/ nir mok+Sha Na hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu mu hu/ ha lA ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma nA b+hI/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo
349b2(rgyud): d+ha yA mi/ ta ba ni la kaN+tha/ e h+ye hi/ bA mas+thi te/ ma hA sing+ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hA T+Ta T+Ta ni r+Na de ni/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sing+d+ha yo gi shwa ra/ ban+d+ha
349b3(rgyud): ban+d+ha/ ba tsa na sA d+ha ya/ sA d+ha ya bid+ya na/ sma ra sma ra staM/ he b+ha ga wA na/ lo ki bi lo ki staM/ ta thA ga tA/ de hi de hi/ me da ra sha naM/ kA ma s+ya dar sha naM/ pra sA d+ha
349b4(rgyud): ya me swA hA/ sing+d+ha ya swA hA/ ma hA sing+d+hA ya swA hA/ sing+d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/ ba rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ saM hA mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra siM ha mu
349b5(rgyud): khA ya swA hA/ badzra ha stA ya swAhA/ ma hA badzra hastA ya swA hA/ sing+d+ha bid+ya d+ha rA ya swAhA/ ma hA sid+d+ha bi d+ya d+ha rA ya swAhA/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swAhA/ kr-iSh+Na
349b6(rgyud): sarba kri ta ya dz+nyo pa bI tA ya swAhA/ ma hA mA lA ma ku TA d+ha ra ya swAhA/ tsa bA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swAhA/ shang kha shab+da na rnI da na ka rA ya swAhA/ bo d+ha na ka rA ya swAhA/ bA mas+thaM
349b7(rgyud): ta skan+d+ha de sha kr-iSh+NA dzi na ya swAhA/ bA ma hA ha sta byA g+h+ra tsa rma Ni bA sa NA ya swAhA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA ya swAhA/ ra k+Sha rak+Sha maM
350a1(rgyud): swAhA/ ku ru rak+Sha mA rti nAM swAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ na ma aR+ya a pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru
350a2(rgyud): Ni kA ya/ sing+d+h+ya n+tu me/ man+ta pa dA ni swAhA/ oM hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha/ a pra ti ha ta hrIHha hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
350a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po 'di brjod nas sa chen po ni/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul lo/ /'ur
350a4(rgyud): 'ur ro/ /bar snang las rin po che dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char mngon par bab bo/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rjes su
350a5(rgyud): thugs rang ngo / /bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs thams cad sdangs skrag ste spu zing zhes byed par gyur to/ /'khor de thams cad ni/ so sor 'bras bu thob
350a6(rgyud): ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig ni/ sa dang po
350a7(rgyud): thob bo/ /kha cig ni/ sa gnyis pa/ kha cig ni/ sa gsum pa/ kha cig ni/ sa bzhi pa/ kha cig ni/ sa lnga pa nas/ kha cig ni/ sa bcu pa'i bar du thob
350b1(rgyud): bo/ /gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dpag tu med do/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po
350b2(rgyud): s tan las langs te gos legs par bgos nas gus pa'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
350b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye kye las mdzad pa chen po legs so legs so/ /bdag kyang 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag
350b4(rgyud): gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur te/ bdag gis de dag tu chos kyi rnam grangs dang / gzungs kyi sgo sna tshogs dag kyang thob na/ bdag
350b5(rgyud): gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi thogs pa med pa rgya chen po 'di ma thos kyi/ da byang chub sems dpa' las mdzad pa chen po de'i
350b6(rgyud): lus dang / rtags dang / tshul dang / mtshan nyid nges par bshad du gsol/ bdag la sogs pa 'khor chen po 'di thos par 'tshal zhing smos so/ /
350b7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye khyod kyis thabs mkhas
351a1(rgyud): pas sems can kyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dri ba 'di byas so/ /da nyon cig dang mdor cung zad
351a2(rgyud): cig kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ni/ snying rje chen po'i
351a3(rgyud): sems so/ /'di ni/ mtshungs shing mnyam pa'i sems so/ /'di ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi sems so/ /'di ni/ chags shing zhen pa med pa'i sems
351a4(rgyud): so/ /'di ni/ stong pa nyid du lta ba'i sems so/ /'di ni/ bsti stang du byas shing gus pa'i sems so/ /'di ni/ ma 'khrugs shing skyon med pa'i sems so//
351a5(rgyud): 'di ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ sems de dag la sogs pa ni/ snying po 'di'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul yin par de ltar zhes bya'o/ /de
351a6(rgyud): ltar tshul 'dis spyad par bya'o/ /bsgom par bya'o/ /tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag la sogs pa 'khor 'dis snying po 'di'i tshul
351a7(rgyud): dang / mtshan nyid da deng slan chad ma 'tshal to/ /da slan chad ni/ blang ngo / /mi bskyud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
351b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gis de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/ des byang chub sems dpa'
351b2(rgyud): chen po yangs pa bskyed pa'o/ /de ltar yi dam bcas nas bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus gzung bar bya'o/ /zas dus dus su bza' ba dang /
351b3(rgyud): tshul khrims dang ldan par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags 'di
351b4(rgyud): brjod par bya'o/ /gtsang mar gnas pas gnas par bya'o/ /khrus legs par bya'o/ /gos gtsang ma bgos la lha'i ba dan dang / mar me dang / bdug pa
351b5(rgyud): dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /sems rtse gcig tu gzung bar bya'o/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o/ /
351b6(rgyud): zhes de skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar gzung bar bya'o/ /'on tang byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang / lha'i drang srong
351b7(rgyud): du ma yang der 'gro ste/ dbang byed cing dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /kho bos kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis sgrub pa po de la blta'o/ /lag pa stong gis
352a1(rgyud): sba zhing gzung ngo / /'jig rten gyi mdo dang / yi ge rnams len cing 'dzin kyang nus par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan mu stegs can thams
352a2(rgyud): cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang / rig byed rnams kyang nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pas ni/
352a3(rgyud): 'jig rten na 'byung pos phyung ba'i nad kyi rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang su la byung yang rung sos par byed do/ /des zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i nad gang yang med
352a4(rgyud): do/ /yang 'byung po'am/ lha rnams la yang rgol ba'i mthu yod par 'gyur ro/ /bdud kyang pham par byed do/ /gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi phyogs
352a5(rgyud): kyang lkugs par byed do/ /gal te ri la gnas pa'am/ dgon pa na gnas pa gang zhig kha ton byed dam/ bsam gtan byed pa la de na gnas pa sdigs

352a7(rgyud): de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig tshul bzhin du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/ srog chags thams cad la snying rje
352b1(rgyud): bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i tshe kho bos kyang lha dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs la srung ba
352b2(rgyud): bgyis te phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /mig gi 'bras bu dang / rang gi srog ji lta ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa dag
352b3(rgyud): kyang smras pa/ gang zhig dad pas snying po 'di/ /kha yis rtag tu 'dzin pa yi/ /sgrub pa po la dus kun tu/ /sems la srung ba gyis shig ces/ /khung bu mig
352b4(rgyud): dang de bzhin du/ /stobs po che dang lu gu rgyud/ /lha yi dam pa lcags kyu dang / /lag na rdo rje bsgo bar bya/ /kho bo'i snying po mchog 'di ni/ /dad pas rtag tu

352b7(rgyud): g.yel bar/ /soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/ /lngas rtsen dang ni bde mchog dang / /tsin+da la dang su ma la/ /bing+ga la dang gshin rje la/ /kho bos lung gis

354a6(rgyud): gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de la bsrung ba'i phyir chu dang me ston par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
354a7(rgyud): dbang phyug gis yang rig sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa gzhig cing bsal ba'i phyir zhi bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di
354b1(rgyud): dag smras so/ /gal te 'brog dang ri khrod rnams shig tu/ /stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan khro rnams dang / /sbrul dang rtsangs pa dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /'ongs
354b2(rgyud): kyang 'di thos sngags mthus ldog par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho chu klung mtsho bran 'gram gnas na/ /dug ldan sbrul dang sbrul 'dzin byed pa dang / /chu srin gnod

354b7(rgyud): gyur nas bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /gal te bud med bus thogs mi phyin cing / /g.yon can bgegs kyis na bar byed na yang / /dad pa drag pos gsang sngags
355a1(rgyud): 'di brjod na/ /'byung po 'bros shing bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/ /'byung po sdang dang gnod sems klu rnams kyis/ /gsad pa'i

355a4(rgyud): thams cad med par 'gyur/ /sems can rab tu sdang bas gsad pa'i phyir/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi las rnams byed na yang / /dad pa drag pos gsang
355a5(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod na/ /de drung sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gro mi 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos nyams sems can rnyog pa can/ /'dod chags bcings shing lag
355a6(rgyud): pas rmongs rnams dang / /nyin mtshan mi drang ma zhi rtog ldan zhing / /khyo dang lhan cig mi dga' bud med rnams/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas
355a7(rgyud): pas 'byin nus te/ /'dod chags mi zhi sems ni drang por 'gyur/ /gal te snying po 'di yi mthu brjod na/ /bskal pa gcig gis mtha' mar phyin mi
355b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /tshon skud sna lnga ba la snying po 'di lan lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa mgul du gdags so/ /snying po 'di ni/
355b2(rgyud): sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o/ /gang dag pha rol
355b3(rgyud): tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de dag la myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs so/ /gang dag sangs
355b4(rgyud): rgyas nyid du sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do/ /gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed
355b5(rgyud): do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems
355b6(rgyud): bskyed par byed do/ /gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po rnams dad pas ma rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed do/ /snying po 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po la thar
355b7(rgyud): pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te dgos pa zhig yod na yang kho bo'i snying rje dang / thabs la mkhas pas thams cad 'grub bo/ /stong
356a1(rgyud): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na sems can gang dag
356a2(rgyud): gnas pa rnams kyang gal te snying po 'di thos na/ sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa
356a3(rgyud): dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang sa bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe
356a4(rgyud): byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can gang dag gis snying po 'di lan
356a5(rgyud): gcig thos na drang po'i sems kyi bsam pas mos shing sgom par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thob bo/ /
356a6(rgyud): gal te de ltar bzod na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na yod pa'i ri dang / rdo dang / rtsig pa dang / ri rab dang /
356a7(rgyud): ri khor yug rnams kyang g.yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du phye mar 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang khol zhing 'thor bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te de dang
356b1(rgyud): de'i gam yo na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'di la dam
356b2(rgyud): par gyur pa de dag gis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul khrims dang ldan par byas la snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na/ yid la bsam pa yongs su
356b3(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /stong gsum gyi
356b4(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
356b5(rgyud): skyong ba dang / lha'i drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mi'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bab
356b6(rgyud): chu'am/ rgya mtshor khrus byas na/ de na srog chags gang dag 'khod pa la des reg pa de dag gi las shin tu lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/
356b7(rgyud): tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par pad+ma las brdzus te skyes par 'gyur/ /mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / sgo nga
357a1(rgyud): las skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/ gang 'di 'dzin pa dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa lta ci smos/ 'dod cing brjod pa lta yang
357a2(rgyud): ci smos/ rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung des sems can gang la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad 'byang bar
357a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung po'i skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang shes par bya ste/
357a4(rgyud): gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med do/ /gang la la snying po 'di brjod pa
357a5(rgyud): de'i kha nas tshig dge ba'am/ mi dge ba ci byung yang rung ste/ de thams cad bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / srung ba'i lha dang / klu dang /
357a6(rgyud): 'byung po rnams kyis yongs su dag pa'i chos su thos par 'gyur ro/ /su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la thams cad sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed
357a7(rgyud): cing gus par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs
357b1(rgyud): shing yongs su bzung ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/ /de ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas snang bar 'gyur bas/
357b2(rgyud): lus 'od zer dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /gang snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/ /gang gzungs kyi
357b3(rgyud): sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o/ /gang la ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod
357b4(rgyud): du shes par bya'o/ /gang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams la blta ba de nam mkha'i snying po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/ /gang la rtag tu lha
357b5(rgyud): dag dang / lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/ /gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa de gtam
357b6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o/ /gang yams kyi nad rnam gsum dang / dus ngan pas chud mi zos pa de rtag tu gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par
357b7(rgyud): bya'o/ /gang bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing bzlog mi nus pa de'i mi'i sha'i mdzod ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya'o/ /gang
358a1(rgyud): rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso bar byed pa de sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/ /gang sangs
358a2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la 'byung ba de ni/ mngon par shes par bya ste/ de'i bsod nams kyi ba sngags pa ni/ mtha' yas so/ /gal te rigs kyi
358a3(rgyud): bu mir gyur pa zhig yun ring po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing bde ba 'dod na/ des thog mar bas mtha' dben pa'i gnas btsal
358a4(rgyud): bar bya ste/ der 'dug par bya'o/ /gtsang mar mtshams legs par gcad par bya'o/ /gal te chu la bzlas brjod byas sam/ yang na zas
358a5(rgyud): sam/ thug pa'am/ sman nam/ bdug pa la so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring por 'gyur ro/ /mthu yod par 'gyur
358a6(rgyud): ro/ /mtshams gcod nus par 'gyur ro/ /rjes su mthun pa'i chos len pa'am/ 'dzin nus par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
358a7(rgyud): de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ thog mar ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad
358b1(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ste/ 'di ni/ mtshams so/ /yang na yungs
358b2(rgyud): kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ji tsam 'dod pa sems kyis byin
358b3(rgyud): gyis brlab par bya'o/ /yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mtshams gcad do/ /yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa la bzlas
358b4(rgyud): brjod byas la phyogs bzhir bres na/ thams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'dis len cing 'dzin nus par 'gyur na/ bdag nyid 'bras
358b5(rgyud): bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sus snying po 'di'i ming thos pa de'i bskal pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur
358b6(rgyud): na/ su 'di rjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ /gang zhing 'di rjod cing smra bar nus pa de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa du ma la mchod cing bsod nams dang
358b7(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /gal te cho ga 'dis sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed
359a1(rgyud): nus par gyur na/ mi de ni/ snying po chen po dang ldan zhing ring po mi thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o/ /
359a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang des sems can ji snyed mthong ba dang / sems can so so la brjod pa dang / de la gang dag gis thos pa dang byang chub kyi
359a3(rgyud): rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang / dge ba'i mtha' ni/ brjod mi nus par dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /gal te lus
359a4(rgyud): bsdams shing zas dus su za bar gnas la dge zhing drang po'i sems kyis brjod par nus na/ des de'i tshe sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi
359a5(rgyud): ched du sngon gyi las rnams bshags par bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags par bya'o/ /gal te de ltar goms shing rgyun mi 'chad par
359a6(rgyud): snying po 'di brjod na/ des tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur/ dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan la blo skye
359a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la mi dka' bar gyur na/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu 'thob pa lta ci smos/ ci dang ci
359b1(rgyud): 'dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
359b2(rgyud): gi snying rje chen po dang / smon lam chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu stobs rgya chen po tshe
359b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byung la/ yul der gal te rgyal pos chos
359b4(rgyud): kyis yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang / gtsang mar bya na/ sems can rnams stems las mi gcod do/ /nyes pa byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o/ /rgyal
359b5(rgyud): po des lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la/ zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na/ yul
359b6(rgyud): der yams kyi nad ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lo tog thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad bde bar
359b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang / mi yongs mi dga' bar gyur
360a1(rgyud): pa dang / der nad byung ba dang / chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang / der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por mi 'gro ba dang / gal
360a2(rgyud): te sdig pa'i las de snyed byung na/ rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la/
360a3(rgyud): gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de logs su bzhin bstan te gzhag go/ /shin du dad pas bdug pa dang / me tog dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
360a4(rgyud): mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po des snying po 'di brjod pa'i phyir nyin zhag
360a5(rgyud): bdun du brtson 'grus brtan por gnas byas na/ sa ris so sor dgra thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /rang rang gi yul la
360a6(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur/ sems 'thun par 'gyur/ phan tshun grogs su 'gyur/ mi yongs dang rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhing /
360a7(rgyud): legs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang klu rnams kyang /
360b1(rgyud): yul srung bar byed do/ /char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grub par 'gyur ro/ /yul na gnas pa
360b2(rgyud): sems kyang bde ba dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang / gnod pa sna tshogs byung ngam/ bdud dang 'byung po
360b3(rgyud): g.yon can gnas pas 'khrugs shing smra'am/ skur pa 'debs sam/ gnod pa dag byung ngam/ phyi nang gi mi mthun pa chen po'am/ chung ngu dag
360b4(rgyud): byung na de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la/ shin tu dad pas snying po
360b5(rgyud): 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
360b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ snying po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ ji ltar blang bar bgyi/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ kun dga'
360b7(rgyud): bo snying po 'di'i ming ni mang du yod do/ gcig ni rgya cher dri ma med pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /snying rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /sdug
361a1(rgyud): bsngal las yongs su bskyob pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /tshe 'phel bar byed pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par 'jigs
361a2(rgyud): pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /sems kyi rjes mthun par
361a3(rgyud): dbang ba zhes kyang bya'o/ /sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang ste/ kun dga' bo/ de ltar zungs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
361a4(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang snying po drang po 'di ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
361a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
361a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/ /mdo 'dzin pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /'od zer dang mig dang lag pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /byang chub sems
361a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'di ni/ 'das pa'i
361b1(rgyud): bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga logs su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos snang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/
361b2(rgyud): de ni/ snying rje chen po dang / smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su snang ngo / /
361b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / klu'i 'khor dang / khyed thams cad kyis
361b4(rgyud): de la mchod pa gyis shig / de la brnyas par ma byed cig /lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig /ming yang rjod cig dang /
361b5(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba skye zhing sdig pa du ma yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi
361b6(rgyud): zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
361b7(rgyud): bka' stsal to/ /su nor bu dang / 'bras bu dang / rin po che dang / yo byad 'dod pa des/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas
362a1(rgyud): te 'dug par bya'o/ /su nad sna tshogs kyis btab ste/ nad med par 'dod pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa thogs pa'i lag pa
362a2(rgyud): la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su lto na pa des rin po che lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te bsam par bya'o/ /su 'byung po rnams dang
362a3(rgyud): bgegs byed pa'i lha la sogs pa gdul bar 'dod pa des/ rin po che ral gri thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su 'dod
362a4(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug bdud 'dul bar 'dod pa des/ rdo rje thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su dgra tshar gcod par 'dod pa des/
362a5(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi gtun shing thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su thams cad du 'jigs par gyur te bde ba ma thob pa des/ mi
362a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o/ /su mig na zhing mthong ba nyams pa des nor bu rin po che me shel thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te
362a7(rgyud): 'dug par bya'o/ /su tsha ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang / dug 'thungs pa des nor bu rin po che chu shel thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o/ /su bdag
362b1(rgyud): po dang / rnyed pa dang / go 'phang 'dod pa des/ rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag pa la bsam par bya'o/ /su grogs po sdug pa myur du phrad par
362b2(rgyud): 'dod pa des/ rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag pa la dmigs par bya'o/ /su lus la nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa des me tog gi snye ma thogs
362b3(rgyud): pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su lus la las kyi sgrib pa'i sdig pa rnams zad par 'dod pa des/ rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag
362b4(rgyud): pa la blta bar bya'o/ /su nye du dang / gnyen 'dab dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams dang / sems mthun par 'dod pa des/ ril ba b+h+ring gar thogs
362b5(rgyud): pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o/ /su stag dang / spyang ki dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa spong bar 'dod pa des/ phub thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas
362b6(rgyud): te 'dug par bya'o/ /su phyogs thams cad du dbang phyug rnams kyis glags lta ba yongs su spong bar 'dod pa des/ dgra sta thogs pa'i lag
362b7(rgyud): pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bskol bar 'dod pa des/ sor mo la ri thogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lag pa la bltas te
363a1(rgyud): 'dug par bya'o/ /su bsod nams dang dge ba'i tshogs byed mi nus pa des/ pad+ma dkar po thogs pa'i lag pa la
363a2(rgyud): bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'dod pa des/ pad+ma sngon po thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te
363a3(rgyud): 'dug par bya'o/ /su ye shes chen po thob par 'dod pa des/ rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su phyogs
363a4(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa des/ pad+ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su sa'i 'og gi gter
363a5(rgyud): rnams thob par 'dod pa des/ rin po che za ma tog thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su drang srong gi lam tshol bar 'dod pa
363a6(rgyud): des/ tshon sna lnga'i sprin thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su tshangs ris kyi lha'i nang du skye bar 'dod pa des/ ril ba spyi blugs
363a7(rgyud): thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su lha'i nang du skye bar 'dod pa des/ me'i mdog lta bu'i pad+ma thogs pa'i lag pa la
363b1(rgyud): bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su yul gzhan gyi dgra phyir phyogs par 'dod pa des/ rin po che mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te
363b2(rgyud): 'dug par bya'o/ /su la dag dang / lha dang / yongs su skyong ba thams cad dgug par 'dod pa des/ dung thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug
363b3(rgyud): par bya'o/ /su lha rnams dang / 'byung po rnams la bsgo ba byed par 'dod pa des/ khri'i zur shing lta bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug
363b4(rgyud): par bya'o/ /su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis myur du lung bstan par 'dod pa des/ bgrang ba'i nor bu thogs pa'i lag pa
363b5(rgyud): la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su skad snyan cing tshangs pa'i sgra lta bur 'dod pa des/ rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par
363b6(rgyud): bya'o/ /su dgos pa thams cad dag par 'dod pa dang / lce bde ba dang / mkhas par 'dod pa des/ phyag rgya rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la
363b7(rgyud): bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rgyal po rnams kyis yongs su srung bar 'dod pa des/ lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag
364a1(rgyud): pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rjes khyab par 'dod pa des/
364a2(rgyud): 'khar gsil thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su sems can thams cad kyis sti stang bya ba dang / dran par 'dod pa des/ thal
364a3(rgyud): mo sbyar ba'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su tshe rabs tshe rabs su sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa des/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul
364a4(rgyud): pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su skye zhing skye ba na sangs rgyas rgyal po'i gnas dang / khang bzang du skye zhing ma'i mngal
364a5(rgyud): du mi skye bar 'dod pa des/ sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su mang du nyan pa dang / mang du
364a6(rgyud): slob par 'dod pa des/ glegs bam thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su tshe 'di nas bzung ste sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du
364a7(rgyud): yid mi ldog par 'dod pa des/ 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam
364b1(rgyud): pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod pas mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams myur
364b2(rgyud): du byon te phyag gis mgo la nyug cing lung ston par 'dod pa des/ mgo la sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhugs pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /su 'bru
364b3(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa btab cing bskyed pa rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar 'dod pa des/ dgun gyi snye ma thogs pa'i lag pa la
364b4(rgyud): bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ /de la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams rnam pa stong du rig par bya ste/ mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/ /de nas bcom
364b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis snying po 'di ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyun mi 'chad
364b6(rgyud): par 'gyur bar dge ba'i sems kyis zungs shig / longs shig rgyas par ston cig /de ltar na snying po 'di don chen po byed pa yin no/ /khams gsum na
364b7(rgyud): sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i lus la nad gang dag yod pa de gal te gsang sngags 'dis gso bar byed na/ nad med par mi 'gyur ba de gang
365a1(rgyud): yang med do/ /snying po 'dis shing skam po la bzlas brjod byas na de la yal ga dang / me tog gi snye ma dang / lo ma dang /
365a2(rgyud): 'bras bu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur na/ sems yod pa'i sems can bde bar 'gyur ba la lta ci smos te/ 'di la the tshom za bar mi bya'o/ /kun
365a3(rgyud): dga' bo/ /snying po 'di'i mthu stobs ni/ brtag par mi nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bas na yon tan rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin to/ /sngon
365a4(rgyud): gyi dus dag na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pas ni/ ming yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos/ khyod la sogs pa'i 'khor chen po 'di dang / lha dang /
365a5(rgyud): klu dang / mi rnams kyi snying po 'di la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /gang gis thos la spong ba de ni/ gang+ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab
365a6(rgyud): snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spong bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig snying po 'di la the tshom bskyed cing yid mi ches pa'i mi de ni/ yun
365a7(rgyud): ring po nas rnyed pa las rab tu nyams nas bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du ngan 'gro rnams su 'khyams par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par 'byung
365b1(rgyud): bar mi thob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mi mthong ba dang / chos mi mthong ba dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub
365b2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi mthong bar shes par bya'o/ /de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor chen po de dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs
365b3(rgyud): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / 'byung po gnas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas
365b4(rgyud): thams cad rab tu dga' ste/ bka' bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis rig sngags de bsrung ba'i phyir gsang sngags
365b5(rgyud): 'di smras so/ /sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsum la rtag tu phyag
365b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /sus tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod na/ de sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs byed pa bdud dang mi 'phrad par 'gyur
365b7(rgyud): ro/ /yams kyi nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig la dus gsum du brjod cing dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des
366a1(rgyud): tshe rabs gzhan na gzugs dang ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems
366a2(rgyud): dpa' zla 'od kyis rig sngags 'chang de bsrung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so/ /sha ma ta te tu su te/ A dz+nya ba te/ u tu te/ shaM khri ste/ barmaM
366a3(rgyud): n+ya te/ a tu Te/ ku la ta Te/ khi ma Te swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di ni/ zhal nas gsungs pa'o/ /gsang sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas brjod byas
366a4(rgyud): la/ tshon sna bdun pa'i skud pas bcing bar bya ste/ gsang sngags 'chang gang du na bar gyur pa der bcing bar bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'di ni/
366a5(rgyud): sngon gyi sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs te/ bdag gis kyang de rig sngags 'chang rnams bsrung ba'i phyir smras so/ /
366a6(rgyud): bgegs dang yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /sdig pa thams cad dang nad thams cad byang bar byed do/ /'jigs pa thams cad dang
366a7(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad
366b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di ni/ de bzhin no/ /ma nor ba de bzhin no/ /don
366b2(rgyud): yod pa'o/ /su byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs par 'dod pa des/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsregs na/
366b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' der 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ pyi la'i mgo rus blangs te bsregs la sa gtsang ma
366b4(rgyud): dang / thal ba zhib mo dang bsregs te chus sprus la byi la'i gzugs byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du ur mo'i ral gri
366b5(rgyud): la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ ral gri des byi la'i gzugs de brgya rtsa brgyad du gtubs la dum bu re re la yang lan re bzlas brjod
366b6(rgyud): byas shing ming nas kyang brjod na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi ldang ngo / /su zhig ha la ha la'i dug zos na/ des gu gul gyi bdug pa dang / ga pur cha
366b7(rgyud): bsnyams te khron pa'i chu lhag mar ma gyur pa dang / bskol pa khyor gang tsam lus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan brgya
367a1(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na/ dug las sos par 'gyur ro/ /su zhig sprul dang / srog chags u ca lang
367a2(rgyud): gas zin par gyur na/ sgo phye la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te rma khar btab na sos par 'gyur ro/ /su zhig sdig pa'i 'chi ba dang / skur pa
367a3(rgyud): 'debs pas mi gzhan la 'tshe na/ des sa gtsang ma 'am/ bag phye'am/ spra tshil las de'i gzugs byas la/ byang chub sems dpa' mig
367a4(rgyud): stong ldan gyi mdun du ur mo'i ral gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad dus gcig du bzlas brjod byas te snying po brjod la dum bur gtubs te/ de'i
367a5(rgyud): ming nas brjod cing lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ dga' bar 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig mig
367a6(rgyud): nyams te ldongs pa'i bar du gyur pa dang / su zhig mig gis 'bras bu'i steng du ling tog byung ba dang / mig tu skyes te mi mthong bar gyur
367a7(rgyud): pa des a ru ra gcig dang / ba ru ra gcig dang / skyu ru ra gcig zhib tu btags la sbrang rtsi dkar po dang / khye'u nu ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya
367b1(rgyud): ste/ sbyor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing / bu gsar du btsas pa'i bud med dang / khyi dang / phag gis ma mthong bar byas la ril bur
367b2(rgyud): byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ gnas dben pa rlung mi 'ong bar 'dug ste nyi
367b3(rgyud): ma bdun gyi bar du sman de mi'i 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang brdar ba mig tu blugs na/ mig gi 'bras bu skye'o/ /ling tog med par 'gyur zhing legs
367b4(rgyud): par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /su grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa'i ched du stag lpags sam/ gzig lpags sam/ dred lpags sam/ dom lpags
367b5(rgyud): sam/ spyang lpags la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa la bskon na/ rims sos par 'gyur ro/ /seng+ge'i
367b6(rgyud): pags pa ni/ thams cad kyi mchog go /gal te sbrul gyis zin na/ mi de nyid kyi skra bcad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te dug gi rma
367b7(rgyud): khar bzhag na sos par 'gyur ro/ /su zhig snying na zhing mi dran nam/ 'chi 'dod par gyur na/ shing sle ma ta ka'i thang chu star ka tsam chu gtsang ma dang
368a1(rgyud): bskol te phyed du ba dang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'thungs na/ thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyis bskol
368a2(rgyud): bar mi bya'o/ /su zhig 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin tam/ mi ma yin pas btab pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur na/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan
368a3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te snar blugs so/ /yang na ri bong gi rtug pa tsam gyi ril bur byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas
368a4(rgyud): te bza'o/ /sha dang / chang dang / sgog pa dang / 'thab mo spang ngo / /'on tang sos par 'gyur/ yang na ldong ros dang / yungs kar dang / lan
368a5(rgyud): tshwa dkar po bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te nad pa'i mal gyi 'og nas bdug na/ nad gtong ba'i 'byung po myur du 'bros te/
368a6(rgyud): lus 'jig cing der 'dug mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /gal te gzhogs phyed na'am/ gzhogs phyed nyams sam/ rna ba 'on nam/ rkang lag
368a7(rgyud): 'gul mi nus par gyur na/ til mar gyi nang du ru rta btsos la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus na/ sos par 'gyur ro/ /yang
368b1(rgyud): na ba mar gcig pu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus na/ sos par 'gyur ro/ /bud med la la zhig bu 'byung shin tu dka' na/ til
368b2(rgyud): mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te lto ba'am/ lte bar bskus na/ myur du 'byung ngo / /gang gi mngal du bu 'chi na shing a ba marga srang gcig
368b3(rgyud): chu khyor do'i nang du bskol la phyed lus pa dang / de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na/ gnod pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur
368b4(rgyud): ro/ /sha ma mi 'byung na yang sman de la bzlas brjod bya'o/ /la la zhig shi la thug pa tsam du snying na ste mnags mi bzod na/ du ru ka dang / dbyi mo
368b5(rgyud): cha bsnyams te bsregs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te so la bsku zhing mid la skyugs skyugs kyi bar du byas na/ sos par 'gyur
368b6(rgyud): ro/ /sgog pa rnam dgu dang / sha dang / chang spang bar bya'o/ /mes tshig na/ ba nag mo'i lci ba dron po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te rma
368b7(rgyud): khar glan na sos par 'gyur ro/ /la la zhig srog chags ring po snying la za na/ rta dkar po'i gcin khyor phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
369a1(rgyud): byas te 'thungs na/ srog chags de 'byung ngo / /gal te na tshabs che na khyor gang 'thungs na/ srog chags thag pa srig
369a2(rgyud): 'byung ngo / /gal te 'bras drag po byung na/ ram gyi lo ma brdungs te khu ba btsir la de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas te rma
369a3(rgyud): khar gtor na/ rtsa ba dang bcas te 'byung ngo / /la la zhig mig la sbrang bus zos par gyur na/ bong bu'i rtug pa gsar du byung ba btsir te khu ba la
369a4(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te dgong du nyal kar mig tu blugs na sos par 'gyur ro/ /la la zhig lto ba na na/ khron pa'i chu lhag
369a5(rgyud): m ar ma gyur pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i nang du lan tshwa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la btab ste khyor
369a6(rgyud): phyed 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro/ /su'i mig la mig nag chags sam/ rab rib bam/ rtsa dmar bar gyur na/ shing sham mya ka'i lo ma btsir te/
369a7(rgyud): de'i khu ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la nang du mgron bu bcug ste zhag gcig bzhag la nang par yang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mig
369b1(rgyud): tu blugs na phan no/ /su zhig mtshan mo 'jigs shing mi bde la skrag na/ skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa

369b3(rgyud): po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma sor gnyis kyi tshad du gtubs pa stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ ba mar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi snod gcig tu blugs pa drung bzhag
369b4(rgyud): ste lcug ma'i dum bu gcig blangs la lan gcig bsngags te rtse mo gnyis mar du bsnyugs la bsreg go / de bzhin du lcug ma'i dum bu thams cad
369b5(rgyud): bsregs na/ yams kyi nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /las 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya'o/ /shu dag dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
369b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te dpung pa g.yas par thogs na/ 'thab mo'am/ 'gyed pa'i tshe rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /shing sham mya ka'i lo ma dang bcas pa sor

370a1(rgyud): bdun du de bzhin byas na/ dngos grub 'thob bo/ /'phags pa'i lam yang skye'o/ /gal te 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po las

370a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i mdun du bya'o/ /glang dkar po'i gi'u wang srang gcig mthil bu'i snod du bcug la byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad

370a5(rgyud): gang dag nyes byung ste lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug na/ phug ron gyi rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te lag pa la
370a6(rgyud): yang bsku'o/ /lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog la yang reg par byas na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyo shug me dang chu ltar mi mthun par gyur na/

370b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gal te srog chags dag lo tog phung bar byed na/ thal ba gtsang ma'am/ bye ma gtsang ma la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la
370b2(rgyud): me tog kun tu gtor na/ srog chags rnams phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gal te srog chags dag shing thog la za na/ chu la bzlas brjod byas te shing
370b3(rgyud): rnams la gtor na 'bras bu la mi za'o/ /de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
