371a1(rgyud): mtshan lan gsum 'dzin nus na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'grub
371a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran par bgyi ste/ grong khyer ram/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ nags tshal gang na rig sngags
371a3(rgyud): 'chang gnas pa la/ gal te de na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams 'tshe bar bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu der mchi zhing kun tu bsrung bar bgyi ste/ yongs su
371a4(rgyud): spong bar mi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
371a5(rgyud): gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa thams cad sems can phal cher rnyog pa can du 'gyur te/
371a6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing rtag par rgyun du dge ba'i phyogs bgyid mi nus pa dang / gal te 'dzin na yang de'i tshe lha dang / 'byung po 'tshe bar 'gyur
371a7(rgyud): bas/ bdag gis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bar bgyid pa'i slad
371b1(rgyud): du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis gzungs 'di'i cho ga da bshad par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'das pa'i bskal
371b2(rgyud): pa du mar gzungs 'di la mchod pa bgyis so/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa rnams kyis
371b3(rgyud): kyang gzungs 'di la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag
371b4(rgyud): tu gzungs 'di 'dzin cing 'chang na/ de'i tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi rgyun thogs pa med par 'gyur/ /dbang po rno zhing mkhas par 'gyur/ spobs pa
371b5(rgyud): myur bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /gang su'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / grags pa yang thos shing bde ba dang / dga'
371b6(rgyud): bar yang 'gyur ro/ /phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skyes par yang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang mthong bar
371b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshig la yang yid ches shing yid rton par 'gyur ro/ /de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu lags par bgyi yi/
372a1(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi ni/ ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
372a2(rgyud): dbang phyug la bstod nas legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ khyod ni/ lha dang mi la sogs pa la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bas las
372a3(rgyud): kyi lam la sbyor bar nus so/ /gal te yun ring por phyir mi ldog pa lta na/ da ngas ye shes kyi phyag rgyas gdab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
372a4(rgyud): la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dran pa/ bdag ri
372a5(rgyud): gru 'dzin la gnas shing 'das pa'i bskal pa du mar gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi sgo 'di brjod do/ /de'i tshe bdud der mchis nas bdud des 'khor
372a6(rgyud): bsdus nas ci nas kyang gsangs sngags kyi gzhi 'di mi 'grub par bdag gis chos de la mtho btsam par bsam pa dang / de'i tshe bdag gis gsang
372a7(rgyud): sngags kyi chos de'i chogs bdud pham par bgyis/ /rnam par pham par bgyis so/ /gsang sngags 'di'i mthu ni/ brtag mi nus shing bsam gyis
372b1(rgyud): mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba
372b2(rgyud): thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes rtsa ba'i gsangs sngags 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba dz+nyA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha
372b3(rgyud): te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo gi te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prap+ta ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
372b4(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi bu la/ bi ma na su pra ti Sh+Thi ta a saM gA ya/ aR+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka/ pra b+hA a ba b+hA si ta mU rta ye/ ma hA ma
372b5(rgyud): Ni mu ku Ta ku N+Da la/ a laM kA ra d+hA ri Ne/ b+ha ga ba te/ pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a pa sha ma ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha mu kha sa mA be sha/ a b+ha Sh+Ta sarba satwa pa ri
372b6(rgyud): mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hu r+b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA A lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mi ra pa Ta la bi nA sha ka rA ga dwe Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka /sha sa ka /sa mA shwA sa na ka
372b7(rgyud): ra/ rak+Sha ka /sarba a pA ya du rga ti pra sha ma na ka ra/ sarba sa twAM sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/ sarba A shwA pa ri pU ra ka /sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ma pa dA na ka ra/ e h+ye
373a1(rgyud): hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa pa ra pad+ma A lo ka saM b+hu ta ma hA kA ru Ni ka / dza TA ma ku TA/ a laM kr-i ta/ shi ro ma Ni ka na ka /rA dza ta badzre
373a2(rgyud): bai DUR+ya a laM kr-i ta/ sha rI ra a mi tA b+hA dzi na ka ma la/ a laM kr-i ta pra b+ha ra NA ra dza na sha ta sa ha sra a b+hi la Shi tA kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa pha ba ra ba
373a3(rgyud): ra da/ bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yan+t+raM/ kle sha ka b+ha ta/ a ba ba d+ha bi bi d+ha satwA/ saM sa ra tsa ra ka /pra ma tha na ka ra/ pu ru Sha
373a4(rgyud): pad+ma/ pu ru sha nA ga /pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha sid+ha/ bI ra bI ra dza su daN+Da ta pa ri bri ti/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra sha sa ya/ pra
373a5(rgyud): sha sa ya/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ bi bi ri bi bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri bi shi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu kha mu
373a6(rgyud): kha/ mu ya mu ya/ mu ny+tsa mu ny+tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA ya/ ga d+ha ya ga d+ha ya/ sa ha sa ha/ pra sa ha pra sa ha/ na na
373a7(rgyud): bi bi d+ha kle shi bA sa na/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ d+hu ru tu d+hu ru tu/ ma hA maN+Da la ka ra Na sha ta pra se ka/ a ba b+hA si ta bi bi d+ha bA sa na sha mi
373b1(rgyud): ka/ sha sa ka /rak+Sha ka/ ma hA bo d+hi s+t+wa ba ra ba ra da swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma'i phyag gi rgyan gyi yu ba zhes bya
373b2(rgyud): ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / klu dang / mi 'am ci du mas yongs su bskor bas/ rdo rje chen po dang ldan zhing dga' ba'i rgyu las
373b3(rgyud): byung ba'i khang bzang du thams cad kyi mchog gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du gsungs te/ sgrib pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /
373b4(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis mnyan pa dang / blta ba dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa thob na/ mi de'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ji snyed mchis pa thams
373b5(rgyud): cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig dad par gus pas snga dro brjod na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu de'i
373b6(rgyud): slad bzhin srung ba bgyid do/ /gang ci 'tshal ba dag kyang de bzhin du 'grub bo/ /su zhig gal te bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
373b7(rgyud): par 'thob par 'tshal ba des gcig pu phyogs dben par mchis la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid
374a1(rgyud): la dran par bgyi zhing gzhan bsam par mi bgyis par gzungs sngags 'di lan bdun brjod na/ yid la bsam pa
374a2(rgyud): gang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de gang yang ma mchis so/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
374a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu rjes su mngon du dran na/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang
374a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong du tshang ba'i bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /gar skyes gar skyes kyang byang
374a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig snyim pa
374a6(rgyud): spos kyis bkang ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gtor la/ gzungs sngags 'di yang lan bdun brjod na/ stong gi
374a7(rgyud): bsod nams kyi mchog dang / snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yang 'thob bo/ /de mi'i 'jig rten 'dir yang stobs chen po yongs su rdzogs pa
374b1(rgyud): 'thob bo/ /su zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du blta zhing / gzungs sngags 'di brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa'
374b2(rgyud): mtshan rgyas pa mthong nas sa dri ma med pa yang 'thob bo/ /'jig rten na yang snang bar bgyid do/ /tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
374b3(rgyud): rnams kyang mthong / /ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gar skyes gar skyes kyang sngon gyi tshe rabs
374b4(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrub pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa des/ /tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya pa
374b5(rgyud): la bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad bzung ste/ gos gtsang ma bgos la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du'am/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
374b6(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la der me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bgyi/ bdug pas kyang bdug par bgyi/ mar me yang
374b7(rgyud): bud par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe gzungs sngags 'di yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
375a1(rgyud): brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor der 'dug ste mtshams
375a2(rgyud): med pa la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams
375a3(rgyud): kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang 'thob bo/ /'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyang 'thob bo//
375a4(rgyud): sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te char dbab par 'tshal na/ gyen du nam mkha' la bltas la gzungs
375a5(rgyud): sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na char 'bab bo/ /gal te sa la bltas te gzungs sngags brjod na/ sa bon thams cad rnam par brgyar phun
375a6(rgyud): sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'bab chu bskams pa'i shul lam/ /'bab chu chen po'am/ /'bab chu'i dngo 'am/ /mtsho 'am/ 'tshe 'u'am/
375a7(rgyud): mtsho bran gyi 'gram du mchis te brjod na/ chu thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad kyi don du gzungs sngags brjod de lag
375b1(rgyud): pas byabs na sos par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nyams pa'i me'i mdun du brjod na/ dran pa slar 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bru bas nyen pa'am/ skom pas nyen
375b2(rgyud): pa'i mi'i gdong du bltas te brjod na/ bkres pa'am skom pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshams gcad par 'tshal na/ des mtshe'u chu'i nang du
375b3(rgyud): zhugs te der mchis la/ gzungs sngags 'di yi ge ra bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ dpag tshad brgyar mtshams bcad par
375b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ der nyes pa rnams mi 'byung ngo / /mtshams kun tu srung ba rdzogs so// //da ni/ lus thams cad bsdu ba'i phyag rgya brjod
375b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /lus drang por 'greng ste rkang pa nye bar mnyam du gshibs la rkang pa g.yas pa yid tsam bskums te lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang /
375b6(rgyud): gung mo dang srin lag gnyis lag mthil du dgug /mdzug mo dang / mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung brkyang la lag mthil bkan te gzhag go /lag
375b7(rgyud): pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /lag pa gnyis ka'i gung mo bkug pa lag pa phrag pa dang mnyam par gzhag go /lag mthil ni/ mdun du
376a1(rgyud): bstan te gzhag go / 'di ni/ lus bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o/ /su zhig bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / dgra rnams
376a2(rgyud): pham par bgyi ba dang / lam dang po la gnas par 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par
376a3(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta/ a bat+te/ pa ri bat+te/
376a4(rgyud): e h+ye hi swA hA/ gang gong du phyag rgya ji skad smos pa de bzhin du lus gnas par bgyis la snying gar thal mo sbyar te sor mo thams cad phan tshun
376a5(rgyud): thad kar bsnol la/ /g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa rnams la 'khyud par bgyi/ mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng la/ rtse mo gnyis
376a6(rgyud): sprad do/ /mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po la reg par bgyi'o/ /lag mthil ni/ mi 'byar bar bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ gzungs
376a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gnyis pa'o/ /bskal pa du mar che rabs su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba thams cad 'byang bar
376b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /tshe phyi ma la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang
376b2(rgyud): chub brnyes par mdzad par brtsams pa'i tshe bdud kyis mtho brtsams pa'i tshe phyag rgya 'dis btul/ de'i tshe zhi ba'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan
376b3(rgyud): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yang brnyes par gyur to/ /gzungs sngags 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ sarba d+hA ra Ni/ maN+Da lA ya/ e h+ye
376b4(rgyud): hi pa ra ma shu ma shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ yang thog mar lag pa g.yas pa 'byin pa ltar bgyis la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mgo
376b5(rgyud): bor thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad/ mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis pa la sbyar ro/ /'di ni/ chos kyi phyag
376b6(rgyud): rgya ste/ rnam par grol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ phyag rgya gsum pa'o/ /sngon de
376b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mthun par bsgoms te/ de'i tshe bsam gtan rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par grol ba
377a1(rgyud): brnyes so/ /yang 'di ni/ gzhan te/ 'greng la rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gzhib bo/ /lag pa'i gung mo dang / srin
377a2(rgyud): lag dang / mthe'u chung rgyab sbyar te sen mo phrad par bgyi/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rtse mo phrad par bgyi/ mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs
377a3(rgyud): gnyis pa la reg par bgyi/ lag mthil nang nas sor bcu tsam gyis bkyed la smin mtshams su gzugs so/ /'di ni/ mig stong gi phyag rgya ste/
377a4(rgyud): bzhi pa'o/ /gal te phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs sngags brjod na/ skad cig de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
377a5(rgyud): dag pa dkrigs pa bye ba phrag stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag rig sngags 'chang de dang lhan cig spyod cing grogs su gyur ba ni/ zhing re re na
377a6(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs pa bye ba phrag 'bum dang / bzhi stong nyi shu mchis so/ /gang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa des ni/ blta bar
377a7(rgyud): mi rigs te/ phyag rgya de'i chos nyid do/ /su la rigs she na/ gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid la'o/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
377b1(rgyud): rnams kyi chos kyi sbyin pa ye shes kyis rtogs par 'tshal ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags ni/ 'di lags te/ tad+ya thA/
377b2(rgyud): oM b+hu sarba tsak+Shu kA rA ya d+ha ra NI na drA ya swA hA/ yang 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par gshibs te lag pa g.yas pa bkan la sor mo lnga gshibs te
377b3(rgyud): brkyang la/ lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te bkan la lag pa g.yas pa'i rgyab la sbyar te snying gar gzhag go /'di ni/ lag pa stong
377b4(rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ste/ lnga pa'o/ /'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang / dgra mchis pa rnams thul
377b5(rgyud): lo/ /gzungs sngags ni/ 'di lags te/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba duSh+Ta oM ha ya me swA hA/ yang 'greng ste rting pa phrad par
377b6(rgyud): bgyis la/ lag pa g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyis te lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la/ lag mthil bdag logs su
377b7(rgyud): bstan par bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ste/ drug pa'o/ /'dis ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos kyi sgo
378a1(rgyud): mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'dis thams cad kyang
378a2(rgyud): 'thob bo/ /gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags snga ma na ma sarba dz+nyA zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /yang 'greng la rkang pa nye bar gshibs te lag pa
378a3(rgyud): g.yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo mnan to/ /g.yas pa yang de bzhin te/ mthe'u chung dang / gung mo rnams rtse mo sprad la/ lag
378a4(rgyud): rting drang por bsrang ste dgug pa ni/ mdzub mo gnyis dgug go /slar gtang na ni/ brkyang ngo / /de ltar mchis la sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /lag
378a5(rgyud): pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni/ dgug go /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni/ slar gtang ngo / /mgo'i thon 'khor g.yas nas bskor bar
378a6(rgyud): bgyi ste/ 'bod pa'o/ /g.yon pas ni/ bsal ba ltar bgyis te/ slar gtang ngo / /phyag rgya 'di ni/ lha dang / klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad bsdu
378a7(rgyud): ba'i slad du dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ bdun pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ 'di lags te/ oM sarba de ba nA ga a na le swA hA/ phyag rgya snga ma la rtse mo bskyed
378b1(rgyud): de lag rting gnyis sbyar ba las yid tsam bzung / mdzub mos g.yab ste/ snga ma bzhin no/ /'di ni/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa chos mnyan pa'i slad du
378b2(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ brgyad pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ 'di lags te/ oM ma hA brah+ma ye/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di dang / gsang sngags 'di ni/
378b3(rgyud): gzungs sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / chos kyi sgo du ma gzung ba'i slad du bsdu ba'o/ /nyi ma spyang kis zin pa dang / zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba mar la
378b4(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te phyag rgya 'dis phyag rgyas btab la 'thungs na/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du chos kyi
378b5(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa khri lobs nus par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di dang / chos kyi sgo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems
378b6(rgyud): dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ched du gsungs pa'o/ /yang 'greng ste rkang pa nye bar gshibs la lag pa thal mo sbyar te snying
378b7(rgyud): gar bzhag la mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bkug ste rtsa ba'i sngags chen po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems
379a1(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi rang rang gi nor bu'i yid bzhin lta bu'i phyag rgya ste dgu pa'o/ /'dis nges par lha'i gzhal med khang
379a2(rgyud): rnams su 'jug go / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su yang mchi'o/ /mchod pa'i don du rin po che brgya stong dag kyang bsam pa bzhin rnyed
379a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di'i las bgyid nus na/ de nang par sngar langs la khrus bgyi zhing kha gdong bkrus te phyag rgya de'i dam tshig
379a4(rgyud): bgyis na/ des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa du mar tshe rabs
379a5(rgyud): su bsags pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya de'i yon tan dang / bsngags pa rab tu mang ngo / /yang
379a6(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo'i sen mo la bcar te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo yang phan tshun du rgyab
379a7(rgyud): sprad la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems la 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu pa'o/ /ci 'tshal
379b1(rgyud): pa de bzhin du 'grub bo/ /nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /yang thal mo snga ma las mthe bong
379b2(rgyud): dang / mdzub mo so sor brkyang ste lag mthil dbye bar bgyi'o/ /'di ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
379b3(rgyud): kyis bdag la stsal ba ste/ 'dis bdag byang chub kyi lam rab tu rtogs so/ /'dis rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /'di ni byang chub
379b4(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu gcig pa'o/ /yang thal mo snga ma las mdzub mo gnyis bskum zhing brkyang
379b5(rgyud): bas bskul bar bgyi'o/ /'di byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'thob pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ /gzugs
379b6(rgyud): sngags ni 'di lags te/ oM sarba bud+d+ha sa ma ya e h+ye hi pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwA swA hA/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
379b7(rgyud): phyug mig stong dang ldan pa/ lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa'i cho ga brjod par bgyi'o/ /thog mar ri rnams dang nye ba/ sa
380a1(rgyud): gzhi bkra shis pa'i phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o/ /der sa brkos te gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / rus pa dang / mi gtsang ba
380a2(rgyud): rnams bsal la/ dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci ba dang / 'jim par bsres te byug par bgyi'o/ /der mchu zheng du khru bcu drug pa'i stegs
380a3(rgyud): bu bgyi'o/ /'phang du ni/ mtho gang gi tshad du bgyis la sgo bzhi btod de/ shar gyi sgor ni/ yul 'khor srung / lha'i sgor ni/ 'phags skyes
380a4(rgyud): po/ /nub kyi sgor ni/ mig mi bzang / byang gi sgor ni/ rnam thos kyi sras te/ de dag gi gam yor rang rang gi 'khor thams cad bri'o/ /dkyil
380a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus su ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa/ lag pa stong dang ldan pa
380a6(rgyud): gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i mdun du khri'u bzhag ste khri'u'i steng du gzungs sngags kyi cho ga gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis
380a7(rgyud): bdug go / me tog sna tshogs dkram mo/ /lha bshos sna tshogs dbab bo/ /der mchod pa de rnams bzhag ste sgog pa rnam dgu dang / sha dang /
380b1(rgyud): chang mi dbab bo/ /gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi na/ nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa thams cad kyang gsar pa gzhan gyis brje'o/ /cho ga 'dis nyi ma
380b2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dngos po thams cad kyis mchod par bgyi'o/ /sgrub pa po gang dag sngon mthong ba de dag gis bri bar bgyi'o/ /de sgrub pa po shar phyogs
380b3(rgyud): su bltas te 'greng la gzungs sngags snga ma dang po nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthar phyin gyi bar du skyo bar mi bgyi'o//
380b4(rgyud): thog mar phyag rgya dang po lan gcig bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par bgyi'o/ /bcu gnyis pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du bgyi'o//
380b5(rgyud): der de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa brtan po'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /cho ga 'dis de bzhin du dgug par bgyis na/ thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /de
380b6(rgyud): tshe sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du nges par drang po'i sems kyis drang por bgyi'o/ /gsang sngags dang / lha thams cad rjes su dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar
380b7(rgyud): na mdun na mig lam na gnas pa lta bu dang / phan tshun gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /dmigs pa gzhan la dmigs par mi bgyi'o//
381a1(rgyud): de'i tshe rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan stong brgyad cu bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /'on tang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
381a2(rgyud): dbang phyug kun dga' bo'i gzugs kyis der mchis te/ sgrub pa po la ci 'dod ci slong zhes dri zhing phan tshun smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa pos
381a3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis mchod pa bgyi bar bsam la/ bdag la ji skad dris pa lan gdab par bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
381a4(rgyud): chub kyi don du gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin 'tshal lo/ /zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ /yang na 'di skad du 'di ni/ lung bstan pa'i dus lags pa
381a5(rgyud): bgyid na/ thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges par thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol/ /bdag ni/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa
381a6(rgyud): mi 'tshal gyi/ nam zhig na sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta ba dang / yongs su skyob par 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /yang 'byung
381a7(rgyud): po gnyug mar gnas pa thams cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam du sems so/ /zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ /gal te yid
381b1(rgyud): la bsam pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na/ gzhan la mi brjod par bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /gal te cho ga 'di 'grub na/ bzlas
381b2(rgyud): par bgyi/ gcig tu gzung bar bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ bslab pa gcig tu gsang ngo / /su zhig sna tshogs 'tshal ba des a ga ru nag po'i chab kyis dkyil
381b3(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i phyag
381b4(rgyud): rgya bcu pa yang bcing bar bgyi'o/ /'on tang 'tshal ba yongs su rdzogs par rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe glegs bam 'di bzhin du sems shing / su
381b5(rgyud): zhig 'di bzhin du mchod pa bgyid na/ gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //yang cho ga gzhan te/ su zhig
381b6(rgyud): b de ba thams cad thob par 'tshal ba des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i phyag rgya dgu pa bcings la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod
381b7(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /til nag po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ mer bsregs na ci 'tshal ba bzhin du 'grub po/ /ci nas rgyal po dga' bar
382a1(rgyud): bgyi 'tshal na/ des rgyal po gnas pa na mchis pa'i shing las lcug ma blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
382a2(rgyud): brjod bgyis la/ rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba der bor na/ dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sems can sdig pa can rnams dang / dgra rnams
382a3(rgyud): tshar gcod par 'tshal na/ des shing nim pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsregs na/ dbang du 'gyur ro/ /yang cho ga
382a4(rgyud): gzhan te/ lha dang / 'byung po ma dul ba de'i slad du gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsregs
382a5(rgyud): na/ 'byung po thams cad bdag nyid tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang du nad byung na/ chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bskyes te/
382a6(rgyud): der ba mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la mer bsregs na/ nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mar de nyid las nyung zhig nad pa la blud na/ 'tshe
382a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon yul ko bi nang nad byung ste/ nad pa rnams gdugs gcig gnyis bro 'tshal nas gum mo/ /de'i tshe dbus kyi yul gyi mi bden
382b1(rgyud): gyur ces bgyi ba der mchis te/ des gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga bgyis nas bsgrags pa dang nad chad do/ /'byung po'i rgyal po yang yul de nas
382b2(rgyud): byung ngo / /thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i stobs 'tshal te/ gang du rang gi 'khor du pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mchi ba der thog ma'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
382b3(rgyud): bcings la gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ dgra bo chom rkun rnams bdag nyid ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /su zhig tshe zad pa
382b4(rgyud): des 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing par bgyi/ nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa bgyi/ a ga ru nag po'i bdug pas bdug par
382b5(rgyud): bgyi zhing / gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang zhig bu mi phyin na/ ba mar la lan
382b6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te de la blud na zhi ba dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gang bskyed pa'i bu dang / bu mo dag kyang yongs su rdzogs
382b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bzang po sngon gyi bsod nams rnams kyis brgyan cing / sems can rnams dga' ba dang / mir skyes pa na rtag tu mchod
383a1(rgyud): pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing bde ba mchog rnams myong bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig mig na ba des mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag
383a2(rgyud): rgya bcings la gzungs sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgyas mig la phyag rgyas btab na/ sos par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar steng gi phyogs kyi lha bde ba
383a3(rgyud): myang ba rnams mthong ba de lta bu'i mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /da ni/ ri mo bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ ri mo bri ba'i ched du ras dkar
383a4(rgyud): po bgyis la byang chub sems dpa' mdog 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser lta bu bri bar bgyi'o/ /lag pa stong dang ldan par bgyi'o/ /lag pa so so'i
383a5(rgyud): lag mthil na mig re re mchis par bgyi ste/ spyin ma mchis pa'i tshon gyis bri bar bgyi'o/ /tshon rtsi yang ka ping tha dad bsra bar bgyi'o/ /mgo
383a6(rgyud): la rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan bri bar bgyi'o/ /yan lag dang / nyid lag rnams su rgyan gyis brgyan par bri bar bya'o/ /yang na ras la byang
383a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' srid du khru gang ba bris te lag pa gnyis bri bar bgyi'o/ /gong du smos pa'i lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya lnga pas rig sngags
383b1(rgyud): 'chang gis mchod pa bgyi'o/ /gal te lag pa dang / mig stong dang ldan par ma gyur na/ dpral par mig gcig bgyi'o/ /yang 'di ni/ cho ga gzhan
383b2(rgyud): te/ su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mchod par 'tshal na/ thog mar ras la bri bar bya'o/ /de ni/ 'di ltar bri bar bgyi ste/ cho ga snga ma bzhin du dkyil
383b3(rgyud): 'khor bgyi'o/ /de nas ri mo mkhan bslab pa brgyad bzung ba chab khung sar mchis te slar log nas legs par dkrus pa gtsang mas bri bar bya'o/ /
383b4(rgyud): tshon rtsi rung bas cho ga bzhin bris la/ de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchis te/ der smyung ba bgyis la nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod pa'i las
383b5(rgyud): rgya cher bgyis na/ de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste/ de la the tshom mi bgyi'o/ /slad kyis zla ba dang / nyi ma lta bu'i 'od kyang
383b6(rgyud): bgyid do/ /gang dge ba dang / dad pas mi bgyid pa des ni/ ma gtogs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o/ /de bzhin
383b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par gzigs byung ba'i tshe yang bdag gis bdud 'dul ba'i lus mig stong dang ldan pa sprul pa'o/ /mig re re las kyang sangs rgyas
384a1(rgyud): re re sprul te/ de dag ni/ bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba lags so/ /lag pa stong las lag pa re re
384a2(rgyud): la yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po re re sprul te/ de dag ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong 'byung ba lags so/ /bdud 'dul ba'i
384a3(rgyud): tshogs kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni/ thams cad kyi mchog go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
384a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ngas gsang sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas par bshad na /bskal

384a7(rgyud): mo rat+na ra sh+mi tsan+d+ra a la kA ra mArga te dza pu N+ya tsak+Shu ri ba ShA ya rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+na rat+na/ ta ta sha ra ta/ rat+na pra ti ma te/ rat+na bra b+ha rat+na da ka
384b1(rgyud): te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs sngags 'di brjod nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
384b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la thug gi bar du rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /'og min gyi
384b3(rgyud): lha'i ris na dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar gyur to/ /lha'i gnas der 'jigs pa chen po yang byung ngo / /ngan song du gyur pa thams cad kyang sdug
384b4(rgyud): bsngal chen po rnyed do/ /zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing / phar 'bros tshur 'bros te/ gang song mi shes so/ /de'i tshe sprul pas ngan song du gyur pa'i
384b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te gsang sngags 'di las 'da' zhing 'gras par byed na/ mgo bo rdul phra rab bzhin du bgyid
384b6(rgyud): do/ /gsang sngags 'di'i mthus ni/ ri 'thor ro/ /rgya mtsho chen po skem mo/ /lha ma yin gyi dmag pham par bgyid do/ /'byung po rnams tshar gcod
384b7(rgyud): do/ /sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kyang tshar gcod do/ /nad chen po dag kyang chad par bgyid/ yul srung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams
385a1(rgyud): kyang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de'i gzi brjid dang / stobs

385a7(rgyud): na 'grub bo/ /las de dag la yang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod do/ /phyag rgya yang bcing bar bgyi'o/ /lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar la mthe
385b1(rgyud): bong gnyis brkyang ngo / /phyag rgya 'di ni/ ji ltar bdag srung ba de bzhin du gzhan yang srung ngo / /mtshams bcad pa yang bgyi'o/ /gang zhig tu mchi
385b2(rgyud): na/ chab bam/ thal ba lag par blangs te lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis la bdag gi steng du gtor na/ phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par yang
385b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'byung po rnams sam/ bgegs dang / log 'dren rnams kyis mtho brtsams par
385b4(rgyud): gyur na/ bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te dal gyis bzhus na sosa par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems
385b5(rgyud): dpa'i so so'i rig pa'i phyag rgya thogs pa med pa ste/ bcu gsum pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ 'di lags te/ na ma sarba bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA
385b6(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya bo d+hi satwa s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ bo d+hi sa twa s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu bi d+hu bi/ kA ya d+hu pi/ bra sha ma ni swA hA/ log par lta ba gzhan mu stegs
385b7(rgyud): can rnams 'dul bar nus so/ /su zhig dus gsum du gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag bcu
386a1(rgyud): la mchod pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bud med du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus

386a6(rgyud): bzhis mnan te khu tshur 'di rna ba g.yas pa'i gong du bzhag la mdzub mo bsgul bar bgyi/ brkyang bar bgyi/ bskum par bgyi/ /phyag rgya 'di

386b1(rgyud): ni/ nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bdun brjod na/ mtshams med pa lnga po dag dang / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi
386b2(rgyud): po dag kyang 'byang bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed na/ las kyi rtsa ba thams cad tshig par 'gyur ro/ /
386b3(rgyud): gang gi tshe tshe 'di 'dor ba na sangs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /dpag tu med cing mi zad pa'i snying po'i
386b4(rgyud): gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus la ltas rnam pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus la
386b5(rgyud): gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad mi 'byung ngo / /phyi dang nang gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon
386b6(rgyud): gyi las mi dge ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te char mi 'bab na til nag po la e raN+Da'i mar gyis sprus te ril bur bgyis la lan brgya
386b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te mtshe'ur stsal na/ de'i mod la char dbab bo/ /gal te char ches na/ yungs kar gyis mar gyis sna ma'i me tog sbrus
387a1(rgyud): la ril bur bgyis te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la mtshe'ur stsal na char 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /sor
387a2(rgyud): m o lnga phan tshun bsnol te g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams dam du 'khyud la mgo bo'i steng du bzhag ste rtsa ba'i gsang
387a3(rgyud): sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten du bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bco lnga pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'dis
387a4(rgyud): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du smyung bar bgyi/ gdugs nyi shu rtsa dgu'i bar du tsan+dan dkar po'i 'dag gus dkyil 'khor
387a5(rgyud): byug / me tog gtsang ma dgram mo/ /de'i tshe khrus bgyis la gos gtsang ma bgos te a ga ru nag po'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o/ /rtsa ba'i
387a6(rgyud): gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ sngar bsnyen par bgyi'o/ /de nas yungs kar dang / til nag po lhan cig btags
387a7(rgyud): la/ pho sum gang tsam la lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhugs su dor ro/ /de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig cing yang
387b1(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ ci 'tshal ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'greng la rkang pa mnyam par nye bar gshibs te lag pa
387b2(rgyud): g.yas pa thur du thams cad brkyang la bkan te pus mo'i steng du bzhag / lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
387b3(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa stsol ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bcu drug pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcings la/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
387b4(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na shu ta'i sa bon dang / yungs kar
387b5(rgyud): dang / shu dag dang / nye'u shing dang / 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga'am/ bla gab med pa'i phyogs su sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /gsang sngags lan sum
387b6(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /me tog dang / bdug pas mchod par bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga lags te/ ci rtsom pa thams cad
387b7(rgyud): de bzhin du 'grub bo/ /gsang sngags gang mi 'grub na/ gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub bo/ /rmi lam mthong bar 'tshal na/ gsang
388a1(rgyud): sngags 'di yang brjod cing phyag rgya 'di yang bcings na/ ci 'tshal ba rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mi bsod nams dang
388a2(rgyud): mi ldan pa gang zhig dngos grub mi thob na/ gsang sngags 'di gdug bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad
388a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na/ ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo/ /de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i khang par
388a4(rgyud): 'dug ste chos bshad do/ /der klu sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dag mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te/ gal te yongs su skyob pa zhig yod na/ sdug
388a5(rgyud): bsngal gyi gnod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de'i tshe der klu'i bu mo chos 'dod pa zhig gis rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
388a6(rgyud): gcig ri ba zhig phul ba dang / des kyang sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed pa'i chos bshad do/ /de'i tshe der gsang sngags

396a7(rgyud): 'di skad du btab lags te/ gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyid pa'i 'os su 'gyur yang dag
396b1(rgyud): pa zhig lags/ deng bdag gi lus 'di nyid lag pa stong dang / mig stong tshang bar 'gyur bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu lus las sug
396b2(rgyud): pa stong dang / mig stong tshang bar byung bar gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i sa chen po rnams kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs
396b3(rgyud): r gyas rnams kyis kyang 'od zer bkye bas bdag gi lus la reg cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' ma mchis pa rnams kyang gsal bar
396b4(rgyud): bgyis par gyur lags so/ /deng slan chad sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dag tu gzungs 'di yang dang yang
396b5(rgyud): du thos shing mngon sum du yang dag par blangs pa dang / gzhan yang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa tshad ma mchis pa bskyed pas bskal pa 'bum
396b6(rgyud): phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor phra mo las yang dag par 'das par gyur lags so/ /deng slad chad gzungs 'di rtag par 'don cing yongs su bzung
396b7(rgyud): n as nam du yang mi bskyud par bgyis pa'i slad du skye ba thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad ma la rdzus te skyes pas mngal du skye ba'i
397a1(rgyud): lus blangs par ma gyur lags so/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo
397a2(rgyud): g ang la la zhig 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas dang po kho nar bdag la smon
397a3(rgyud): lam 'di skad gdab par bgyi lags so/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur
397a4(rgyud): du rtogs par shog / spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du rtogs par shog /spyan ras
397a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs
397a6(rgyud): rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
397a7(rgyud): bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho
397b1(rgyud): las 'da' bar shog / spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog /spyan ras gzig
397b2(rgyud): dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
397b3(rgyud): bdag gis myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim phyin shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang
397b4(rgyud): mtshungs par shog / bdag ni ral gri ri la 'dzeg /ral gri'i ri ni rang snyil shog /bdag ni chu tshan phrad gyur na/ /chu tshan me mur rang zhi shog /sems can
397b5(rgyud): dmyal bar bdag song na/ /sems can dmyal ba rang bskams shog /bdag ni yi dwags gnas song na/ /bkres skom dag ni 'grangs par shog /bdag
397b6(rgyud): ni lha min gnas song na/ /ngan sems rang ni dul bar shog /bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na/ /rang nyid shes rab che thob shog /de skad du smon lam btab
397b7(rgyud): nas sems rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rjes
398a1(rgyud): su dran par bgyis nas de'i rjes la gzungs sngags 'di mtshan gcig la lan bdun tshang bar 'don par bgyid na/ bskal pa
398a2(rgyud): 'bum phrag brgyad stong snyed du 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams yongs su bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
398a3(rgyud): la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i tshig 'di 'don cing 'dzin par bgyid
398a4(rgyud): na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du
398a5(rgyud): skye bar 'tshal ba ji ltar smon pa bzhin du de dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
398a6(rgyud): 'das/ sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'jin pa dag gal te ngan 'gro gsum po dag tu ltung
398a7(rgyud): bar gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag
398b1(rgyud): gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnams su skyes par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig
398b2(rgyud): sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par
398b3(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad
398b4(rgyud): ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na/ snying rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba rnams dang / sems rtse gcig
398b5(rgyud): tu ma bgyis pa ni/ ma gtogs lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus kyis yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba
398b6(rgyud): g ang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung bas gal te bud med kyi dngos po las yongs su
398b7(rgyud): gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /the tshom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig
399a1(rgyud): bskyed par gyur na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ /
399a2(rgyud): sems can gang la la zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang dkor 'phrog cing chud gson pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas stong 'jig
399a3(rgyud): rten du byung ba dag la 'gyod pas mthol zhing bshags na yang 'byang zhing tshangs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags
399a4(rgyud): 'di bton pa tsam gyis de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ba lags te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal zas dang / dkon mchog gsum kyi
399a5(rgyud): dkor nor 'phrog cing chud gson pa de dag ni/ phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyan sngar bshags na gdod yongs su 'byang
399a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur lags la/ thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams der gshegs nas dbang mdzad par 'gyur bas
399a7(rgyud): kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / gang zag la skur
399b1(rgyud): ba btab pa dang / chos la skur ba btab pa dang / gso sbyong bshig pa dang / tshul khrims bshig pa dang / mchod rten bshig pa dang / gtsug lag
399b2(rgyud): khang bshig pa thams cad dang / dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa sun par bgyis pa 'di lta bu la sogs
399b3(rgyud): pa sdig pa'i las lci ba ci bgyis pa thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /rig sngags 'di la the tshom 'tshal ba'i dngos po gcig ma
399b4(rgyud): gtogs te/ the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na/ tha na kha na ma tho ba chung ngu'i las yang ba cam yang yongs su 'byang bar mi 'gyur na/ kha na ma tho ba lci ba lta
399b5(rgyud): smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ kha na ma tho ba lci ba dag yongs su 'byang bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub kyi ring ba'i rgyu ni/ bgyid par 'gyur
399b6(rgyud): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha dang mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyis rig
399b7(rgyud): sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga 'thob par gyur zhing / gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa bco lnga len par mi
400a1(rgyud): 'gyur lags so/ /gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba de yang 'di lta ste/ gang zag de bkres pas nyon mongs te 'chi bar mi
400a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang lcag dbyug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 'khon mchis pa'i dgra'i sug par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
400a3(rgyud): g.yul ngor 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i khar 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sprul gdug pa dang /
400a4(rgyud): rtsangs pa dang / sdig pa'i khar 'chi bar mi gyur ba dang / chab dang / zhugs kyi nang du 'bying zhing tshig ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dug gis 'chi
400a5(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byad stems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / smyos nas dran pa nyams te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ri
400a6(rgyud): dang / ljon shing dang / dam grog dang / g.yang sa nas lhung ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi ma rungs pa'i byad kyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
400a7(rgyud): log pa'i 'dre gdon ma rungs pas glags rnyed de 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / nad ngan pas lus la dkris te 'chi ba'i dus
400b1(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / cha ma lags pas bdag nyid la gnod pa bgyis te 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags te/ thugs rje chen po'i
400b2(rgyud): rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag ni/ gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa bco lnga po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi
400b3(rgyud): 'gyur lags so/ /dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po thob par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ skye ba thams cad rgyal po dge ba dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag
400b4(rgyud): par yul dge bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag par dus bzang po dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal bar
400b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / rtag par lus kyi dbang po tshang bar 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi sems la goms par 'gyur ba dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims nyams par mi
400b6(rgyud): bgyid pa dang / 'khor rnams drin gyis 'dre zhing 'dum par 'gyur ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams rtag par 'byor cing ldan par gyur ba dang / rtag
400b7(rgyud): par gzhan gyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / yo byad bdog pa rnams gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid la smon pa rnams
401a1(rgyud): bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu dge ba rnams kyis rtag tu srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba
401a2(rgyud): dang / skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong zhing chos thob par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos thos nas don zab mo rtogs par 'gyur ba dag
401a3(rgyud): lags te/ lha'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyis rtag tu gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa gang lags
401a4(rgyud): pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po 'di dag thob par bgyid par 'gyur bas/ lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par bton nas yongs su
401a5(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi ste/ le lo bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras nas 'khor 'dus
401a6(rgyud): pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi
401a7(rgyud): mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di dag smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
401b1(rgyud): na ma aR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban+d+ha na tshe da na ka rA ya/ sarba pa paM sa mu drots+tsho Sha Na ka rA
401b2(rgyud): ya/ sarba byI d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra bi na sha na ka rA ya/ sar+b+ba ye Shu tA ra NA ka rA ya/ ta s+ya/ na maskri twA i daM AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA
401b3(rgyud): ya/ ta ba nI la kaN+Tha nA ma pa ra ma hr-i da ya mA brti yi Sh+ya mi/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM/ shu b+ha tse ta naM/ sarba b+hu tA naM/ bA paM mArga bi sho d+ha kaM/ tad+ya thA/ A lo ke/ a
401b4(rgyud): d+hi pa ti/ lo ka a ti kran+te/ e h+ya hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA ka ru Ni ka ma hA sma ra hr-i da yaM/ e h+ya hi/
401b5(rgyud): AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA yam/ pa ra ma mai tri tsi t+ta kA ru Ni ka ku ru ku ru/ kar+m+ma sA d+ha ya sa d+ha ya/ bid+yan de hi de hi/ me a raM ga ma bi haM ga ma/ sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra du hu
401b6(rgyud): du hu bIR+yan+te ma hA bIR+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ren+d+re shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ bi ma la mUrte AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra/ dzi na kriSh+Na dza TA/ mu ku TA/ a laM kri ta sha rI ra/ laM ba pra
401b7(rgyud): laM ba bi laM ba/ ma hA sid+d+hi bid+ya d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ ma hA tsa la/ kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/ kr-iSh+Na bak+Sha/ kr-iSh+Na pA sha/
402a1(rgyud): nIr+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma hasta/ tsa ra tsa ra ni sh+tsa re shwa re/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kri ta yadz+nyo ba bI ta/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra da ha ne shwa
402a2(rgyud): ra/ nA rA ya Na ba la rA pa be Sha d+ha ra/ he nI la kaN+The/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA ha la ha la bi Sha nirdza ta/ lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi Sha bi nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA sha nAM/ mo
402a3(rgyud): ha bi Sha bi nA sha naM/ nir mo kA Na hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu mu hu/ rA hu la rA hu la/ ha la ha re ma hA pad+ma na b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/
402a4(rgyud): bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi bA mas+thi ta ma hA siM ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hA T+TA T+Ta hA
402a5(rgyud): s+ya/ e h+ya hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra b+ha Na b+ha Na/ bA tsa sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bId+ya na sma ra sma ra twaM/ he b+ha ga wan+TA lo ka bi lo ka s+t+waM/ ta thA gA tA nAM/ da dA hi
402a6(rgyud): ma da R+sha na kA ma s+ya da R+sha nAM/ pra sA d+ha ya me swA hA/ sid+d+ha ye swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha ye swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la ka NA ya swA hA/ ba rA ha mu khA ya
402a7(rgyud): swA hA/ ma hA bA rA mu khA ya swA hA/ na ra saM ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra saM ha mu khA ya swA hA/ badzra hasta ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra hastA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha bid+ya d+ha rA
402b1(rgyud): ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha bid+ya d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma hasta ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hasta ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kri ta ya dz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/ ma hA mA la mu khu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/
402b2(rgyud): tsakra yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ sha kha shab+da ni rna da na ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+ha na kA rA ya swA hA/ bA ma skan+d+ha de shas+thi ta kr-iSh+Na dza nI ya swA hA/ bA ma hasta bya g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa
402b3(rgyud): nA ya swA hA/ lo ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ka shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrti nAM swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ Ar+yA ba lo
402b4(rgyud): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pA da ni swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
402b5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha rnams kyis kyang rin
402b6(rgyud): po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab par gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su thugs dgyes par gyur/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang / mu
402b7(rgyud): stegs can rnams ni/ 'jigs shing sdangs nas spu zing zhes byed par gyur/ 'khor 'dus pa mang po thams cad las kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs
403a1(rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gis ni/
403a2(rgyud): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gis ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gis ni/ sa dang po dang / sa gnyis
403a3(rgyud): pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa thob par gyur nas sa bcu pa'i bar du thob par gyur/ sems can tshad med pa snyed ni/ byang chub
403a4(rgyud): tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas gus par thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems
403a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye skyes bu chen po/ legs so/ /bdag gis sngon 'das
403a6(rgyud): pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa tshad med pa snyed dag tu chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzungs rnam pa sna tshogs thos par gyur mod kyi/
403a7(rgyud): sngon chad nam yang thogs pa mi mda' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs chen mo'i rig sngags kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di lta bu thos par ma
403b1(rgyud): gyur na/ skyes bu chen po/ khyod kyis bdag la gzungs 'di'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad du gsol/ /bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams shin tu thos
403b2(rgyud): par mos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs pa chen po la smras pa/ lha'i rgyal po/ khyod thabs mkhas pas sems can
403b3(rgyud): thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir de skad du dris pa yin pas/ deng khyod legs par nyon cig dang / bdag gis khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad par
403b4(rgyud): bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ de ni/ snying rje chen po'i sems yin/ mnyam pa'i sems yin/ 'dus ma byas
403b5(rgyud): kyi sems yin/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sems yin/ stong pa nyid du lta ba'i sems yin/ gus pa'i sems yin/ dam pa'i sems yin/
403b6(rgyud): 'dres pa med pa'i sems yin/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin te/ de lta bu'i sems gang yin pa de dag ni/ gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin
403b7(rgyud): par rig par bya ste/ khyod kyis 'di kho na bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor mang po
404a1(rgyud): rnams ni/ deng gdod gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa khong du chud par gyur pas ded phyin chad yongs su bzung nas
404a2(rgyud): brjed par bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
404a3(rgyud): z hig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa des byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po bskyed nas sems can thams cad yongs su mya
404a4(rgyud): ngan las 'das par dam bca' yang dag par blang bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can rnams la mnyam
404a5(rgyud): pa'i sems bskyed de rtag par rig sngags 'di rgyun chad pa med par gdon par bya'o/ /gnas khang gtsang ma'i nang du 'dug ste yongs su dag par
404a6(rgyud): khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te ba dan dpyangs/ mar me sbar te spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa byas nas sems rtse gcig
404a7(rgyud): tu gtad de dmigs pa tha dad pa gzhan la mi dmigs par chos bzhin du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi
404b1(rgyud): 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od lha dang / drang srong tshad med pa snyed dag der lhags nas dbang byed cing mngon rtags kyang ston par gyur la/ bdag
404b2(rgyud): kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis de la lta bar byed/ lag pa stong gis ni/ de la yongs su srung zhing byin gyis rlob par byed pas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug
404b3(rgyud): lag ji snyed pa de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ mu stegs can gyi chos kyi cho ga dang / smra ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rtogs shing khong du
404b4(rgyud): chud par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa des ni/ 'jig rten na gdon dang nad rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi
404b5(rgyud): stong yod pa de dag gsos nas 'tsho bar byed do/ /'dre srin thams cad la dbang byed cing lha'i bu'i bdud rnams kyang 'dul bar byed/ mu stegs can
404b6(rgyud): rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed do/ /gal te ri'am dgon pa na gnas te mdo sde kha ton du 'don pa dang / bsam gtan sgom pa na ri'i lha dang / 'dre
404b7(rgyud): srin gnod pa byed pa dag nam gyis kyal ka byas nas sems mnyam par gzhag tu ma rung bar gyur na/ rag sngags 'di lan gcig bzlas pa byas na/
405a1(rgyud): 'dre srin de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te chos bzhin du bzlas brjod byas te sems can rnams la snying brtse
405a2(rgyud): ba'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag kyang de'i tshe dge ba'i lha dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / lag na rdo rje gsang ba pa rnams la rtag par
405a3(rgyud): de'i rjes su 'brang zhing yongs su srung ba gyis shig / de'i nye 'khor na gnas nas mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du yongs su srungs shig /rang gi srog gi
405a4(rgyud): dbang po bzhin du yongs su skyobs shig ces bsgo bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag la bsgo bar byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gis
405a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang / /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sme brtsegs lcags kyu can/ /stobs ldan shaM ka ra dang sde brgyad dag /btang nas rtag tu

405a7(rgyud): srung bar byed/ /bdag gis nor srung dang ni chu lha dang / dge rgyas dang ni pa ri tsi tra dag /btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ /bdag gis
405b1(rgyud): sa sad tsa dang ma hA ra/ /ku lan tan+ta dang ni lngas rtsen dag /btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ /bdag gis pi pa ka la'i rgyal po dang / /dpal
405b2(rgyud): ldan byi ta dang ni swar ha rA/ /btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ /bdag gis tshangs pa dang ni saM b+ha ra/ /gnas gtsang sde lnga dag dang mtshe ma

405b4(rgyud): rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ /bdag gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang ni/ /ma mo lha la sogs pa mthu chen 'khor/ /btang nas rtag tu gzungs
405b5(rgyud): 'dzin srung bar byed/ /bdag gis rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang ni/ /mig mi bzang dang rnam thos bu dag kyang / /btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung
405b6(rgyud): bar byed/ /bdag gis gser mdog rma bya'i rgyal po dang / /sde dpon nyi shu brgyad dang drang srong 'khor/ /btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ /

406a1(rgyud): bsnyen dga' bo/ /klu rgyal rgya mtsho dang ni e la'i 'dab/ /btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ /bdag gis lha ma

406a3(rgyud): glog gi lha/ /grul bum bdag po dang ni sha za dag /btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ /dge ba'i lha de dag dang / klu'i rgyal po dang /

406a7(rgyud): rong dag tu gnas te lam stor bar gyur pa las rig sngags 'di bzlas par gyur na/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i lha dang / klu'i rgyal po dag dge
406b1(rgyud): ba'i mi'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas lam yang dag pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ri dang / nags tshal dang / dgon pa dag tu gnas pa

407a6(rgyud): chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/ /klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang / /shu 'bras mi bzad rnag

407b2(rgyud): pa'i mig la 'du/ /sdig 'phel snyigs mas dam chos 'jig pa na/ /'dod pa'i me chen sems ni rmongs log pas/ /khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dong zhen
407b3(rgyud): nas/ /nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe/ /gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur/ /

407b6(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag pha rol tu pa phyin pa drug mngon par sgrub pa

408a3(rgyud): d ag theg pa chen po 'di la dad pa'i dbang po ma thong pa dag gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus theg pa chen po'i sa bon dang chos kyi myu gu 'phel bar

408a7(rgyud): gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa dag ni/ myur du thob par 'gyur la/ sa bcu pa'i bar du yang ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i
408b1(rgyud): bar du yang phyin par byed pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad brgyad cu yang rang gi ngang gis 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te nyan thos kyi gang zag

408b5(rgyud): kyang g.yo zhing rdul phran bzhin du 'jig par nus so/ /de na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyang thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
408b6(rgyud): par nus so/ /sems can gang dag tshe 'di nyid la smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub par 'dod na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du gso sbyong dang / tshul

410b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rgyu ba la rang dbang thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na gang zag de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod na nam yang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /

411a4(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/ /de ltar chos bzhin du 'di yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/
411a5(rgyud): rang gi ngang gis 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams

411b1(rgyud): su 'dren pa'i ched du chos bzhin du 'don pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas ring por mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar
411b2(rgyud): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /ji tsam du sems can snang ngo cog gi ched du bzlas brjod byas te/ de dag gi rna lam du grags par byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed
411b3(rgyud): na/ gang zag de dag yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'thob par 'gyur bas brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sems dang lus
411b4(rgyud): g so sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas
411b5(rgyud): byas pa'i sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs mthol bshags te/ kha nas gzungs 'di myur du bzlas brjod byas nas sgra rgyun chad pa med par byas na/ dge sbyong gi
411b6(rgyud): 'bras bu bzhi po de dag tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnon po shes rab dang ldan pa sgom pa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhig yin na ni/ sa bcu'i 'bras bu
411b7(rgyud): yang dka' ba med par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa phran tshegs yongs su gnyer ba tsam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos
412a1(rgyud): kyang ci dgos te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthu shin tu zab pa'i phyir dang / gzungs 'di'i
412a2(rgyud): byin gyi rlabs shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe yul
412a3(rgyud): de'i rgyal pos yang dag po'i chos kyis yul 'dzin cing mi rnams bag yangs su bkod de/ sems can stangs las mi gcod cing / nyes pa byung ba rnams yongs
412a4(rgyud): su skyabs nas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs sngags 'di 'don par byed na/ yul de'i gnod pa dang /
412a5(rgyud): bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal bar 'gyur/ 'bru rnams legs shing mi mang po bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang phas kyi rgol
412a6(rgyud): ba'i dgra dag yang nas yang du 'ongs te gtses pas 'bangs mang po mi bde bar gyur tam/ blon po chen pos rku bshams nas log par gyur tam/ rims
412a7(rgyud): nad byung bar gyur tam/ than chen byung bar gyur tam/ nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe snying rje chen
412b1(rgyud): po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas nas de'i phyogs su kha bstan te spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i bla re rnam pa sna tshogs
412b2(rgyud): dang / ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson
412b3(rgyud): 'grus bskyed de gzungs kyi tshig nom pa 'di 'don par byed na/ phas kyi dgra rnams rang dul bar gyur nas slar log ste so so nas tshul bzhin du yul skyong zhing yul
412b4(rgyud): yang 'dre bar gnas par byams pa'i sems kyis phan tshun gcig la gcig blta bar 'gyur/ rgyal bu dang blon po rnams kyang sri zhu dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur/
412b5(rgyud): btsun mo dang slas rnams kyang rgyal po la sri zhu dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ lha dang klu dang 'dre srin rnams kyang yul de srung zhing skyong bar 'gyur/ char chu
412b6(rgyud): dus bzhin du 'bab cing 'bru rnams legs pas mi mang po rnams kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang khyim du nad chen ma rungs pa dang phrad par gyur tam/
412b7(rgyud): ltas ngan sna tshogs byung bar gyur tam/ 'dre srin dang log pa'i bdud rnams kyis khyim dkrugs par kyur tam/ mi ma rungs pa dag gis gleng skur btab nas
413a1(rgyud): rku bshams te gnod pa byas par gyur tam/ khyim mi che chung rnams phyi nang mi 'dum par gyur na/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
413a2(rgyud): m ig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byas nas
413a3(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di lan stong tshang bar bzlas na/ gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe
413a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
413a5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags 'di la ming rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /thogs pa med
413a6(rgyud): pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o/ /sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su skyob pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ /tshe bsring ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ /ngan 'gro
413a7(rgyud): yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ /smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i
413b1(rgyud): gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ /sems kyi rjes su rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ /sa gong ma rnams las myur du 'da' ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ /de
413b2(rgyud): ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
413b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci lags na/ 'di lta bu'i gzungs bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang
413b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming ni/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces kyang bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /'od stong pa'i mig can zhes bya ste/
413b5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i ming dang / gzi byin dang / mthu stobs ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'das pa'i bskal pa
413b6(rgyud): t shad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin kyang
413b7(rgyud): thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus mngon du bstan pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
414a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyed dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha dang / klu rnams kyis gus pas bkur sti byas
414a2(rgyud): nas brnyas par mi bya'o/ /lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te sems rtse gcig tu ming nas rjod par byed na/ bsod nams tshad med pa
414a3(rgyud): snyed 'thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba tshad med pa snyed yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams
414a4(rgyud): su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gal te rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyug por 'gyur bar
414a5(rgyud): 'dod na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i lag la mchod pa bya'o/ /mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses par gyur na/ zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /

414a7(rgyud): ral gri thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad gdul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra
414b1(rgyud): gzhom par 'dod na/ rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad las thar bar 'dod na/ 'jigs pa med pa sbyin
414b2(rgyud): pa'i lag la mchod do/ /mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/ me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /tsha ba'i rims kyis thengs te bsil
414b3(rgyud): bar 'dod na/ chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /blon thabs mthon po 'dod na/ rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /grogs po
414b4(rgyud): mdza' bshes dang myur du phrad par 'dod na/ rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur na/ lcug ma thogs

414b6(rgyud): 'gyur bar 'dod na/ bum pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /stag dang 'phar spyang dang dom dred gcan gzan ma rungs pa thams cad spong bar 'dod na/ phub

415a7(rgyud): dang mdung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /dge ba'i lha 'dre thams cad dgug par 'dod na/ rin po che'i dung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lha 'dre thams
415b1(rgyud): cad 'khor bar 'dod na/ thod pa'i khar ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur du gshegs nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na/

415b6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba'i lag la mchod do/ /skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'dod na/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i

416a1(rgyud): gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /mang du thos pa'i shes pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na/ rin po che'i mdo sde'i
416a2(rgyud): glegs bam thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /da ltar gyi lus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thug pa'i bar rtag par byang chub kyi sems las ldog par mi 'gyur
416a3(rgyud): bar 'dod na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gser gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas spyi
416a4(rgyud): bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na/ spyi bo na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /shing thog dang 'bru rnams grub par 'dod
416a5(rgyud): na/ rgun 'brum thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i cho ga stong yod kyang deng mdor bsdus nas mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/ /bcom
416a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis shin tu yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis gzungs 'di gzungs la 'dzam bu'i gling du rgya cher yongs
416a7(rgyud): su spel nas rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/ /gzungs 'di khams gsum gyi sems can nad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pas
416b1(rgyud): gzungs 'dis yongs su gsos na/ mi 'tsho ba gang yang med do/ /rig sngags chen mo 'dis shing skam po la btab na yang yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
416b2(rgyud): bu skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i sems can la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams gsos na/ mi 'tsho ba'i gnas nges

416b4(rgyud): ro/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa ma yin na/ tha na 'di'i ming tsam yang thos par mi 'gyur na mngon du mthong ba lta smos kyang
416b5(rgyud): ci dgos/ lha dang mi dang klu la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po khyed rnams ngas gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar
416b6(rgyud): bya'o/ /gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di la skur ba btab par gyur na/ gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag la skur ba btab
416b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /gal te gzungs 'di la the tshom dang yid mi ches pa skyes par gyur na/ gang zag de ni/ phan yon chen po dang gtan du 'bral bar 'gyur bas bskal pa
417a1(rgyud): brgya stong snyed du ngan 'gror 'khor zhing 'byung ba'i dus med de/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyang mi mthong / chos kyang mi thos/ dge 'dun
417a2(rgyud): yang mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje

417a5(rgyud): 'od kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'dzin pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du rig sngags chen po 'di smras so/ /na mo bud+d+ha gu ra be/ na mo d+ha rmA mahA te/ na maH
417a6(rgyud): saM g+hA ya Ni tri bu bi sa tu taM nA ma/ rig sngags 'di bton na/ kha na ma tho ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bdud spong bar byed/ bgegs rnams sel
417a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur bas lan re bton nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lan re bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin re bzhin dus gsum du rig sngags bzlas nas sangs rgyas la phyag
417b1(rgyud): byas na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye ba thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan shin tu mdzes pa re re'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
417b2(rgyud): dpa' zla 'od kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs 'di smras so/ /sin+te te du soSh+Ta/ Adz+nyA mi te a tuSh+Ta/ si na khi ta pa li tiSh+Ta/ ya mi dz+nyA ta oM
417b3(rgyud): d+huSh+Ta/ ku la ti maSh+Ta khiSh+Ta swA hA/ rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud byas te gang du na bar gdags par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'di

417b5(rgyud): thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang / nad ma rungs pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i

418a1(rgyud): 'dod na/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig byi la'i gdon
418a2(rgyud): kyis zin par gyur na/ byi la'i mgo rus bsregs pa'i thal bas gtsang ma dang bsres te 'jim pa la byi la'i gzugs byas nas mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur
418a3(rgyud): mo'i gri gtsang ma la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du bcad nas sngags lan re gdon cing de'i ming nas lan re brjod na/ gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /

418a5(rgyud): stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na/ 'tsho bar 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa dang sprul gyis zin par gyur na/ bca' lnga'i phye ma la lan

418a7(rgyud): bag zan nam/ spra tshil la pha rol po'i gzugs byas te mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas sngags kyis lan re brjod
418b1(rgyud): de lan re gtubs nas pha rol gyi ming na ma myong de bsregs zin nas dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du byas na/ pha rol pa dga' zhing nam mtsho ba'i bar du gus pas bkur zhing byams par 'gyur
418b2(rgyud): ro/ /gang dag mig nad kyis btab te mig gi 'bras bu nyams par gyur tam/ mdongs par gyur tam/ mi bsal bar gyur tam/ ling tog dkar po dang dmar po dag gis khebs te/
418b3(rgyud): 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/ a ru ra dang / pa ru ra dang / skyu ru ra 'brum bu re zhib tu btags te 'thug pa'i tshe gtsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med gsar dus su btsas pa dang / khyi dang phag

418b5(rgyud): gi/ /bu mo btsas pa'i nu zho ni mi rung ngo / /sman de sbyar zin nas kyang mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste mig la bskus nas zhag bdun gyi bar
418b6(rgyud): du khang pa dben par rlung bsangs na/ mig gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur bas ling tog sngon po dang dkar po bsal te gsal ba rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gdon rnams kyis btab
418b7(rgyud): ste smyos par gyur na/ stag dang / 'phar ba dang / spyang ki'i pags pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bgos gsos par 'gyur ro/ /gal te sbrul gyis zin
419a1(rgyud): par gyur na/ gang zin pa'i mi de'i rna spangs blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bslan na sos par 'gyur ro/ /gzer thabs
419a2(rgyud): ma rungs pas snying la gzer te 'chi la thug na/ ka pyi ta lag pa tsam chu gtsang ma phul gang tsam dang sbyar te bskos nas phul phyed lus pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste gcig
419a3(rgyud): car blud na sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman de yang bud med kyi drung du bskol bar mi bya'o/ /ro langs kyi gdon gyis btab nas rgyun ring du na bar gyur na/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
419a4(rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste bsregs te snar bdug par bya'o/ /yang na ri bong gi rtug pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas mig tu bcug na sos par
419a5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ sha dang / chang dang / dku ba rnam pa lnga dang / tshig ngan pa rnams srung dgos so/ /yang na ba bla dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste
419a6(rgyud): nad pa'i khri'i drung du bsregs na/ gdon de'i lus 'jig par 'gyur bas 'dug pa'i thugs mi thub ste 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gzhogs phyed na zhing rna ba dang sna sub
419a7(rgyud): par gyur tam/ rkang lag sdud mi nus par gyur na/ ru rta til mar gyi nang du bskol te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar
419b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ ba'i mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bskus na yang sos par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bu btsa' dka' bar gyur na/ til mar la lan nyi
419b2(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med sbrum ma gang dag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na/
419b3(rgyud): gi'u si srang gcig chu phul do'i nang du bskol te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas blud na/ sdug bsngal zhing na ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
419b4(rgyud): sha ma 'byung du mi btub par gyur na yang sman 'di 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /glo bur du snying ga gzer te mi bzod par gyur na/ de ni/ ro nyul gyi gzer thabs zhes bya ba yin
419b5(rgyud): pas kun tu ru dang pog dkar po ma grugs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste ci tsam 'byor pa byin nas slon du bcug na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /sha chang dang dku ba
419b6(rgyud): rnam pa lnga srung dgos so/ /mes tshig par gyur na/ ba lang gi lci ba dron po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /srin bu khong par
419b7(rgyud): zhugs te na bar gyur na rta dkar po'i gcin phul phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste blud na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /tshabs che ba la phul gang blud na srin bu thag pa
420a1(rgyud): gcus pa bzhin du rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shu chen byung ba la leng se'u hwa brdungs pa'i khu ba la lan rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste shu ba'i steng du blugs

420b1(rgyud): nar ma zad kyi/ bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim 'khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na/ bal po si'u'i shing gi yal ga

420b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /gdon mthu bo che gdul bar 'dod na/ lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste bu ram dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i

451a7(rgyud): rgya 'dis ni/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do/ /rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na/ gdugs

451b2(rgyud): sum du bzhugs pa yid la bgyis te gdugs mtshan gcig la lan drug tu mthol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur
451b3(rgyud): zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub

451b5(rgyud): bzhi khu tshur bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bong khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas lag pa g.yon pa'i
451b6(rgyud): mthe bo lag pa g.yas pa'i chang ba'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni/ phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM
451b7(rgyud): ku tsi ku tsi/ ku tsi ya ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsi re le swA hA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags 'di ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
452a1(rgyud): l a la zhig mchis nyal gar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing snying gar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa
452a2(rgyud): brgyad tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis
452a3(rgyud): nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong bar mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe
452a4(rgyud): g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur/ /g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang / mngon

452b1(rgyud): mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying gar gzhag go / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas mdzub
452b2(rgyud): mo phan tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ na mo nI la kaN+tha/ na ma AR+ya sha pa ta swA hA/ na ma AR+ya sha la swA hA/ e hi e hi swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am/
