452b4(rgyud): gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro/ /dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi
452b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig
452b6(rgyud): sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na/ 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do/ /rigs kyi
452b7(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud de

453a3(rgyud): re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas bar bsregs na/ rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
453a4(rgyud): mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo
453a5(rgyud): dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni/ brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa
453a6(rgyud): yang de bzhin du bgyis nas sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas
453a7(rgyud): lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par
453b1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs

453b3(rgyud): gang dag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan
453b4(rgyud): du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar
453b5(rgyud): po'i ngo tshes bco lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na/ gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal

453b7(rgyud): dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug
454a1(rgyud): pa rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon
454a2(rgyud): pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsir nas lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis na/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchis par

454a5(rgyud): g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas sor mo gzhan gsum ni/ so sor yan par bsgreng ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste lus po
454a6(rgyud): che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ drang srong 'phur te mchi dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub

475a1(rgyud): gyis nor bu rin po che me shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang lus yongs su dag par 'gyur sa brgyad pa la gnas par gyur/ byang

481b1(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

481b3(rgyud): nges par sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gyur cig / btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par
481b4(rgyud): gyur cig / btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
481b5(rgyud): dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal

487b4(rgyud): rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dra uts+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu ba dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu tra NA ya/ ta s+ya na ma skr-i twA i daM AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ta ba nI la
487b5(rgyud): kaN+Tha nA ma hr-i da yaM/ A brta yi Sh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na/ shu b+ha tse ta na/ sarba satwA nAM/ pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha ka /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he bo d+hi
487b6(rgyud): satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he kA ru Ni kA sma ra hr-i da yaM/ e h+ye hi/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra pa ra ma mai tri tsi t+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ karmaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yAM de hi de hi me/
487b7(rgyud): a raM ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ du hu du hu/ bI ra yan+te/ ma hA bI ra yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra NI shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma la a ma la/ mUrti AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra kr-iSh+Na
488a1(rgyud): a dzi na/ dza TA ma ku Ta/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ a laM pa/ pra laM pa/ bi laM pa/ mahA sid+d+ha/ shud+d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ mahA ba la/ mahA ma la mahA
488a2(rgyud): ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ mahA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/ kr-iSh+Na pA sha /ni r+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma hasta/ dza ya ka ra ni shA tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/ e h+ye hi bA rA ha mu kha
488a3(rgyud): tri pu ra da ha nI shwa ra nA rA ya Na pa la rU pa be Sha d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ he mahA ha lA ha ra/ bi Sha ni ra dzI ta lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi Sha nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha na/ mo ha bi Sha nA sha na/
488a4(rgyud): ni ra mo k+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu lu mu hu lu/ hA la hA la/ mahA pad+ma nA b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+h+ya/ bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi/ ta ba
488a5(rgyud): nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi bA maskri ta/ si d+ha mu kha/ sa ha sa ha/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mahA aT+TA T+TA ha sa ni ra nA di ni/ e h+ye hi/ b+ho b+ho mahA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ ban d+ha ban
488a6(rgyud): d+ha wa tsaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+yAM sna ra sma ra twAM/ he b+ha ga bA na/ lo ka bi lo ka s+t+waM/ ta thA ga tA dA dAM hi me daR+sha naM/ pra sA d+ha yA mi swAhA/ sid+d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+hA ya swA hA/ sid+d+hA yo gI
488a7(rgyud): shwa rA ya swAhA/ nI la kaN+Thaya swA hA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ si d+ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra sid+d+ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha bid+yA b+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya
488b1(rgyud): swAhA/ badzra hastA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra ha stA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra ya kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/ mahA kA la mu yu Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsa kra A yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shi kha shab+d+ha ni ra nA da na ka rA ya swA hA/
488b2(rgyud): bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ pA ma skan+d+ha de sha s+thi ta kr-iSh+Na a dzi nA ya swA hA/ bA ma ha ste byA g+h+ra tsa ra ma Ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ mahA lo ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA swA hA/ rak+Sha
488b3(rgyud): rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrtI nAM swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga wa te AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ de nas byang chub
488b4(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di bstan zin nas/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du/ gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal
488b5(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ shin tu dang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las/ stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang / /rtsangs pa sbrul dang
488b6(rgyud): 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang / /gzungs 'di 'don pa thos nas gnod mi nus/ /gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las/ /gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang / /gnod sbyin
488b7(rgyud): srin po nya dang ru sbal dag / gzungs 'di thos nas so sor 'byor bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig g.yul sprad dgra yis bskor ba'am/ /chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'phrog pa'i tshe/ /
489a1(rgyud): rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /de dag brtse sems skyes nas ldog par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la
489a2(rgyud): thogs pa dang / /lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /rgyal po brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur//
489a3(rgyud): gang zhig byad stems dug ma'i khyim zhugs te/ /zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /dug ni zil dngar
489a4(rgyud): zas skom nyid du 'gyur/ /bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe/ /bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs
489a5(rgyud): bzlas na/ /'dre gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/ /klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas/ /tsha ba'i nad kyis nyin nas 'chir nye tshe/ /rtse
489a6(rgyud): gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/ /klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang / /shu 'bras mi bzad rnag
489a7(rgyud): khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi/ /sems can rnyog pa mi dge spyod pas na/ /
489b1(rgyud): byad stems sngags dang dgras ni gtsos pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /byad ste mas gdon de gtong pa'i mi la 'dud/ /sdig 'phel snyigs ma
489b2(rgyud): dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe/ /'dod pa'i me mched sems ni rmongs log pas/ /khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas/ /nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe/ /gang
489b3(rgyud): zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur/ /bdag gis gzungs 'di mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/ /bskal bar brjod kyang
489b4(rgyud): mthar thug yid mi 'gyur/ /gal te thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung dam rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas pa las/ de na gnas pa'i
489b5(rgyud): sems can de dang de dag gi lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na sdig pa'i las dang / kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas/ zhing yongs su dag
489b6(rgyud): pa gzhan dag tu pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas mngal dang / drod gsher dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur na/ kha don du 'don pa dang 'chang ba la lta
489b7(rgyud): smos kyang ci dgos/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te gang zag de'i lus dang / spu dang skra dang / gos la
490a1(rgyud): bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de'i phyogs su song ba'i sems can gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/ de dag gi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa'i las lci
490a2(rgyud): b a thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar
490a3(rgyud): 'gyur bas na 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gis thos pa'i phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje
490a4(rgyud): chen po'i gzungs phan yon dang bcas pa zhes bya ba mdo las btus pa rdzogs so/ / //dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /
